Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NaVis_Weaselcrow: 光滑的黃毛與美麗的藍羽，長長的鳥嘴以及鋒利的牙齒，黃鼬藍鵲是您值得擁有的！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NaVis_Weaselcrow: Fur and feather, beak and fang, Weaselcrow is just the thing!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Drake: 年幼的多彩龍獸擁有模仿大自然的能力，將自己混入於像高山一般大的寶石堆，然而這也是它的種族歷年來所居住的地方。這脆弱的小龍獸利用這項能力，從此之後它就不再畏懼洞穴裡面的蜘蛛，盜取寶石的竊賊以及其他天敵了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Drake: The young Prismatic Drake displays a natural mimicry by which it blends into the mountainous piles of gems that make up its familial hoard. Thus disguised, the tiny and vulnerable young are safe from cave spiders, hoard-thieves and other predators.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diretide: 2012 年魔魘狂潮所包含介面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Knight_Wa: Description of the Dragon Knight Ward
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Shadow_D: This new item has no description.
This new item has no description.
This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Pluckin_Fid: 暗影裂隙漫遊者的皮腔提琴
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Plucki: 五隻米波能組成一個樂隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: With five Meepos you've got quite the band.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Hood: 不對稱的髮型讓北方的少女能承受最惡劣的寒冰侵襲，證明了美貌也能置人於死地的古老格言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Hood: Able to withstand the toughest onslaughts with nary a hair out of place, the Maiden of the North gives truth to the old adage that looks can kill.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Pack: 他的師父說過：「想說什麼可要講清楚，這些村民很容易在溝通中就會誤解成恐嚇和邪惡的意圖。」因此暗影薩滿為自己提供的服務製作了簡易的列表，並背在身上讓大家看見。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: His old master said, \"Be clear what you are about, for these simple village folk read menace and evil intent into poor communication.\" Therefore Rhasta created a simple visual menu of the services he offers, and wears it in plain sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Wand: 毒蛇的最後一個扭轉完成了暗影薩滿的偽裝，讓他低調的旅行。但必須承認，有時候他揮舞著它，只是因為他喜歡夥伴的感覺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: A final twist of the serpent completes Rhasta's disguise, in case he is travelling incognito. It must be admitted that sometimes he wields it just because he likes the companionship.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat: 「薩滿必須照顧好皮膚！」暗影薩滿的師傅曾教過。「因此，一定要常常戴著帽子別讓太陽照到，邪惡的月光也一樣。」然後老人總會朗聲大笑。「如果你相信我說的，我這有一包草藥，將賦予你無窮的財富和永生。」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: \"A shaman must take good care of his skin!\" Rhasta's master instructed. \"Therefore, always wear a hat to keep off the sun, and no less the evil influence of the moon.\" And then the old man always broke into laughter. \"And if you believe that, I have a bag of herbs here that will confer infinite wealth and immortality.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Conc: 儘管有些旅行的薩滿被人控訴販賣能治百病的有色藥水，但暗影薩滿從未保證過，也沒有人因為從這瓶子中倒了一大杯，被收過這麼多錢。事實上，除了暗影薩滿以外沒人能喝裡面的藥水。暗影薩滿的藥水對釀造者以外的人都是必死無疑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: Although some travelling shaman have been rightly accused of selling colored water as if it were a certain cure for all ills, Rhasta makes no such claims and has never charged so much as a pence for a swig from this bottle. In fact, no one but Rhasta may drink from it. The Shadow Shaman's brew is certain death to anyone but its maker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Wearin_Vest: 暗影裂隙漫遊者的背心
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Wearin: 額外的一層或是兩層衣物應該能迴避一些利牙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: An extra layer or two ought to be able turn back some teeth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fryin_Pan: 暗影裂隙漫遊者的平底煎鍋
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fryin_: 手中一直拿著平底鍋可以製造噪音和嚇跑野獸，如果幸運的話還能把他們煮成一頓飯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: Keeping a pan handy will let you make noise and scare off the wildlife, or cook them if you're lucky.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fine_n_Fanc: 暗影裂隙漫遊者的紳士帽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fine_n: 暗影遺跡的雨下起來就不會停。不想要淋濕的話最好戴頂帽子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: It can get rainy up in Riftshadow. Best bring along a hat if you want to keep your head dry.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Grabbin_Wra: 暗影裂隙漫遊者的綁手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Grabbi: 雖然它們不花哨，但能使雙手溫暖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: They're not fancy, but they keep the hands warm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mantle: 對於那些時候給予冷漠態度的人來說，僅僅是個開始。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mantle: For those times when giving someone the cold shoulder is only the beginning.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mittens: 冰晶聖女不需要在寒冷的天氣中保暖雙手。我們懷疑這是一種時尚的展現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mittens: Crystal Maiden hardly needs to keep her hands warm in freezing weather. We suspect these are strictly a fashion statement.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Tassels: 這些流蘇的製作材料並不是取自冰川殘骸那的白狼毛。它們完全是柔軟蓬鬆的雪所構成的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Tassels: No Wolf of Icewrack tail was harmed in the making of these tassels. They are formed entirely of soft, fluffy ice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Staff: 並不是向外展現力量，冰晶聖女了解示弱的必要性。這根輝煌的法杖只是她體內力量的象徵，而法杖的色彩暗示著她對魔法的精通。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Staff: Not one for outward displays of force, Crystal Maiden understands the necessity of putting on a show. This brilliant staff is but a symbol of her inner power, and for all its luster, barely hints at the depths of her mastery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Sight: 以眼還眼，以風暴對敵。沒有敵人可以躲避遣雷使銳利的目光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: An eye for an eye, and a storm for his enemies; no foe can escape the piercing glare of the storm rider.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Bracer: 這件鎧甲來自一個被人遺忘的年代，蘊含著遣雷使雄霸天下的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: This armor comes from an age long forgotten, and it crackles with the ancient power of the stormrider.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stormthrasher: 夏季風暴的力量摧毀了分心的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stormthrasher: The power of the summer squalls lays a thrashing on the enemies of Disruptor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Deflecto: 這件鎧甲是在杜魯德的古老寺廟中發現，擁有防禦刀劍和魔法的能力。風暴可不是那麼好躲開。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: Found in an ancient temple in Druud, this armor turns away blades and spells.  Storms are not so easily deflected.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aegis_of_the_Storm: 暴風雨在杜魯德草原上形成又散去，只有在下一個季節才會再度來臨，也是遺雷使實力永恆的道理。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aegis_of_the_Sto: As storms are born and die upon the plains of Druud, only to be born again next season, so too is the Order of the Stormrider eternal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_the_Scaled_Hunter: 身跨最後一隻傳說中的始祖鳥，一個熟練的遣雷使能夠駕馭風暴本身的憤怒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_the_Scal: Astride the last of the legendary archtyrex, a skilled stormcrafter channels the fury of the storm itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Grand_Inqui: 無論敵人如何稱呼他，不管對手向他投擲任何東西，這沉默的盾牌都能無聲地反彈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Gr: Whatever his enemies call him, whatever words his foes may cast in his direction, bounce soundlessly off this shield of silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Grand_Inqu: 這對護腕象徵著首級審判者不會對任何謊言容忍，也不需要任何辯解！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_G: These bracers bespeak a Grand Inquisitor who will brook no falsehoods and demand no answers!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_IQ_Helm: 他陰暗的雙眼閃出光芒，無聲地要求真相只能在絕對的沉默中找到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_IQ_Helm: His darksome eyes blaze out, wordlessly demanding the true answers that can only be found in utter silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Grand_Inquisi: 沉默術士以外穿上這件長袍的人，沒有人可以具備他那樣的莊嚴和雄偉。但要是誰穿上了，沒人會再聽到關於他的消息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Gran: No one wears this robe with quite the grandeur and majesty of Silencer. But if they do, no one will ever hear about it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Grand_In: 當沈重得沉默降臨，首級審判者需要一個巨人肩膀般的護肩來承擔其重量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: When a heavy silence falls, the Grand Inquisitor will need mighty shoulders such as these to bear up under its weight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Grand_Inqui: 當首級審判者結束審問之後，他的飛刀就會使出最後的封口之擊，確保沉默永遠不被打破。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Gr: Once the Grand Inquisitor has finished his questioning, a final sealing stroke of his glaive ensures that this silence will never be broken.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Slithereen_E: 這把雙刀是從克雷戰役中死亡的巨大海怪屍體中取得。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Sli: These blades were taken from the corpses of slain leviathans following the battle of Crey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slithereen_Ex: 被剝奪了頭銜和地位之後，瑟莉希斯接到指示，不得在同族之中露出頭鰭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slit: Stripped of her rank and station, the exile Slithice has been instructed to cover her headfin while among her people.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Slithereen_E: 這件黑耀石防具是在海底火山鍛造完成，克雷的居民將它贈予給瑟莉希斯以表達感謝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Sli: Fashioned in the forge of an undersea volcano, the obsidian plating was a given to Slithice as a gift from the grateful denizens of Crey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__Tail: 第三個詛咒，長尾盤繞的詛咒，落在他尾巴上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__T: The third curse, curse of the prehensile, lain upon his tail.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Sword: 第一個詛咒，火焰的詛咒，落在他的劍上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__S: The first curse, the curse of flame, lain upon his sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Head: 第十一個和最後詛咒，智慧的詛咒，落在他的角上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__H: The eleventh and final curse, the curse of wisdom, lain upon his horns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Bracer: 第六個詛咒，堅韌的詛咒，落在他的手腕上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__B: The sixth curse, the curse of fortitude, lain upon his wrists.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Wings: 第二個詛咒，墮落的詛咒，落在他的翅膀上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__W: The second curse, the curse of the fallen, is lain upon his wings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Belt: 腰帶受過詛咒的力量。將這世界的中心層層保護。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__B: A belt of cursed power.  Would that the navel of the world were so protected.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__shoulder: 第十個詛咒，力量的詛咒，落在他的肩膀上，有如全世界的重量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__s: The tenth curse, the curse of strength, is lain upon his shoulders, like all the weight of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Hood: 紅色的頭巾，紅色的獸爪，這帽子能保護獸王免受元素侵襲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Hood: Red of hood and red of claw, this headpiece shields the Beastmaster from the elements.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Guard: 獸王雙肩所承擔的責任非常沉重，而這件肩甲給予了他強大的支持。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Guard: Heavy is the burden shouldered by the Beastmaster, and strong is the mantle that supports him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Axes: 上一個笑稱這把武器破舊的人，腦袋被一刀砍下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Axes: The last person to call these weapons primitive ended up wearing one in his skull.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Bracers: 皮革，獸骨和獸毛製成的強大護腕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Bracer: A powerful bracer of leather, bone and fur.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Belt: 皮革和羽毛製成的腰帶，還綁着獸骨
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Belt: A belt of leather and feather, bound in bone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Deadly_Night: 無論是誰穿戴這條圍巾，泰瑞恩之靈鬥將保佑她擺脫一切束縛，身分和目的也將免於泄露。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Dea: Whosoever wears this mantle, the spirit Tyrian ensures they shall shrug off any burden, while their identity and their purpose remain concealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Deadly_Nights: 任何妄圖偷窺這件衣服穿着者的人都被阿特洛波斯施以痛苦和狂亂的詛咒。最好不要去看拉娜雅，甚至不要去關心她的行蹤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Dead: The spirit of Atropos inflicts dread and delirium on any who spy the wearer of this garb. Best not to see Lanaya at all, or even wonder at her whereabouts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headpiece_of_the_Deadly_N: 雖然頭巾的籠罩下一切都難以辨識，但貝拉多納讓穿戴者的視界無限擴大，似乎更加適合神祕真相的追尋者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headpiece_of_the: Although barely visible beneath the rim of this headpiece, Belladonna grants the wearer the enormous dilated eyes that so befit a seeker of mysterious truths.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Headdress: 曾給德尊教團成立初期一位暗影長老牧師戴過，此骷髏頭飾已經傳承數代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Headdr: Worn by an elder shadow priest during the very founding of the Dezun Order, this skull headdress has been handed down for generations.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Cloak: 德尊教團長老的披風，只會授予給最高超的暗影牧師。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Cloak: The elders grant this cloak only to the most skilled of the Dezun Order.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Arm_Wrap: 穿著神聖服飾，舉起那裹著的手臂，能令用者領悟到虛無之境的古老智慧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Arm_Wr: To raise an arm wrapped in such a holy garment is to channel the most ancient knowledge of the Nothl Realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Dress: 這裙子束著用纖維織物製成的繩子，還有虛無能量在裙上燃燒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Dress: Bound with rope and made of simple fabrics, this dress burns with Nothl strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Medicine_Stick: 相傳法杖中間的圖案能集中及凝聚虛無力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Medici: The pattern at its center is said to focus and channel the Nothl's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Slithereen_Exile_: 流浪魚人之刃 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Slithere: Blade of the Slithereen Exile - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Great_Safari: 取自一具屍體的簡單優雅披風。由守夜騎士旗幟布碎做成的基恩人披風。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Grea: Simple, elegant, ripped from a corpse.  The scap of banner taken from a Vigil Knight now makes a fine cape for a Keen.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_S: Rule number one, always come prepared!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sharpeyes_Momentoes: 狙擊手是射手中的專家。現在有獎牌可以證明這點！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sharpeyes_Moment: Sniper is an expert marksman.  Now he has the medals to prove it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Liferipper: 據說魔魘邪石輕盈異常，卻堅硬萬分，收割者拿著再完美不過了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Liferi: Direstone is said to be lightweight and easy to counterbalance, making it perfect for a reaper.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Boneslayer: 奧斯塔里昂統治時期，這把劍被呈上以期談判投誠。可惜沒成功。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Boneslayer: When Ostarion came to conquer, this blade was presented as a gift in hope of negotiating a peaceful surrender.  It didn't work.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastion: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為語調婉轉但銳利機智的《魔幻堡壘》敘述者，也就是盧克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastio: This item replaces the Default announcer with the euphemistic keen-eyed wisdom of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bastion: 該物品會將預設的連殺語音替換為音色祥和而世故的《魔幻壁壘》敘述者，也就是盧克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bastio: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the smooth worldly tones of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Greevil: 一個殺死帶著贓物的稀有貪魔獎勵
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Greevil: A reward for slaying a rare loot greevil.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fistful_of_Snowballs: 他們最不希望發生的是.... 打雪仗！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fistful_of_Snowb: Just when they least expect it... Snowball fight!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Warming_Campfire:
在迎霜節中可是沒有時間讓您受困於寒冷中。讓一把溫暖的火將附近的寒氣從你和你的朋友們消失吧。
僅可用於迎霜節。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Warming_Campfire:
Frostivus is no time to be caught out in the cold. Let a warming fire melt the chill away from you and your friends.
	Only usable during Frostivus.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_The_Asia_ADMIN: Dota 2 亞洲聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 2 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Se: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 2 賽季帶著 $10,000 獎金再度迴歸。來自西方的 12 支隊伍將在 11 週的賽事中每週進行 6 天比賽。比賽實況將由 Ayesee 和 Draskyl 全程解說。超過 120 場比賽即將到來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_: The RaidCall Dota 2 League returns for a second $10,000 season. The top twelve teams in the western world battle it out six days a week for eleven total weeks live with commentary by Ayesee and Draskyl. Over 120 matches guaranteed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 2 賽季管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_Dota_2_L: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 2 賽季帶著 $10,000 獎金再度迴歸。來自西方的 12 支隊伍將在 11 週的賽事中每週進行 6 天比賽。比賽實況將由 Ayesee 和 Draskyl 全程解說。超過 120 場比賽即將到來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall Dota 2 League returns for a second $10,000 season. The top twelve teams in the western world battle it out six days a week for eleven total weeks live with commentary by Ayesee and Draskyl. Over 120 matches guaranteed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_75_Battle_Bonus_2_Hours: 使用此物品能連續 2 小時給予您額外 <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成 。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_75_Battle_Bonus_: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_: 使用此物品能連續 2 小時給予您額外 <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成 。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Treasure_Key: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>寶藏箱</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Treasu: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__Naughty: 一個報答您從貪魔們的手中挽救迎霜節的禮物！裡頭有甚麼啊您問？答案無人曉得，但這個禮物看起來有被貪魔的嘴咬過，又或者被牠們的大屁股坐過。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__: A gift for saving Frostivus from the Greevils! What could be inside? It is a mystery. This gift looks like a Greevil sat on it or maybe chewed it up.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__Nice: 一個報答您從貪魔們的手中挽救迎霜節的禮物！裡頭有甚麼啊您問？答案無人曉得，但這個禮物看起來完好無損。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__: A gift for saving Frostivus from the Greevils! What could be inside? It is a mystery. This particular gift looks to be in excellent condition.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop_Set:
冰晶聖女學習寒冰技藝時有著一段不為人知的故事，她曾經深深傷害了他的寒冰巫術導師。爲了重拾恩寵並證明自己無愧於他的指導，她在藍心冰川與沸騰之海之間的融雪地帶閉關一年。在那裡從沒有落雪
----未完
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop_: It is little known of Crystal Maiden, that in her long study of the Frozen Arts, she once greatly displeased her Ice Wizard master and to restore herself to his graces and prove worthy of his instruction, she passed a year dwelling in the climes of slush where the Blueheart Glacier spends itself at the edge of the Boiling Sea. Here, where snow had never fallen, Rylai spent months in deep meditation, mastering her powers, before waking one afternoon with a single frigid word upon her lips: 'Snowdrop!' For a moment, the steam that filled the air turned to ice, and the warm precipitation became a softly falling snow. When she returned to her old teacher, she found him waiting with a smile, fully aware of the magic she had wrought, as he presented her this outfit to show her worth and mastery. Contains all of the items in the 'Snowdrop' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastion_Pack: 內含廣播語音和連殺語音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastio: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blades_of_the_Slither: Blades of the Slithereen Exile Pack
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Slithereen_: 包含流浪魚人之刃的主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Sl: Contains both the main and off-hand Blade of the Slithereen Exile.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_The_Burden_of_Eleven_: The Burden of Eleven Curses Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gear_of_the_TallyHo_H: Gear of the Tally-Ho Hunter Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Megabundle: 一個內含 11 款出自 Polycount 製模社群的大型套裝組合包。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Megabu: A massive bundle that contains 11 sets of items created by the Polycount modeling community.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GLeague_2012: 12 月 25 日 Dota 2 首度亮相著名的 G 聯賽。觀看包括 iG、LGD 和 DK 在內的 8 支亞洲頂尖強隊共同爭奪 $40,000 總獎金。遊戲風雲主辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GLeague_2012: The famous G-League Tournament makes its Dota 2 debut on Dec. 25. Watch the best 8 asian teams, including IG, LGD and DK, compete for a prize pool of $40,000. Hosted by GameFY
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GLeague_2012_ADMIN: 2012 年 G 聯賽管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_2012: 12 月 25 日 Dota 2 首度亮相著名的 G 聯賽。觀看包括 iG、LGD 和 DK 在內的 8 支亞洲頂尖強隊共同爭奪 $40,000 總獎金。遊戲風雲主辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_: The famous G-League Tournament makes its Dota 2 debut on Dec. 25. Watch the best 8 asian teams, including IG, LGD and DK, compete for a prize pool of $40,000. Hosted by GameFY

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bastion_Announcer_Pack: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為語調婉轉但銳利機智的《魔幻堡壘》敘述者，也就是盧克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bastion_Announce: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the euphemistic keen-eyed wisdom of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_Announcer_Pack: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為雙關達人斧王。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_Announcer_Pa: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the double-edged wit of Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Juggernaut_Announcer_Pack: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為浪跡天涯的大劍師：劍聖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Juggernaut_Annou: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the carefully chosen words of the traveling warrior, Juggernaut.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Prophet_Announcer: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為大自然的發聲者自然先知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Prophet_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the stern voice of Nature's Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Storm_Spirit_Announcer_Pa: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為喧鬧誇張的風暴之靈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Storm_Spirit_Ann: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the boisterous theatrics of Storm Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Pirate_Capn_Announcer: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為梅緹船長不停迴蕩的鄙劣嘶吼聲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Pirate_Capn_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with Captain Matey's scurrrrvy play-by-play.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bladed_Abdomen_of_the: Bladed Abdomen of the Brood Queen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claive_of_Unyielding_Ston: 當斯溫站在他的領域，這把巨劍也會挺他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claive_of_Unyiel: When Sven stands his ground, this blade stands with him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Dark_Implemen: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Dark: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Killing_Spree_North_Ameri: Killing Spree 是 King of the Hill 的長期比賽，集結北美的四支頂尖隊伍。每支隊伍想要獲勝必須連續贏取三場比賽，完成『大殺特殺（Killing Spree）』。比賽由 NEO Dota 主辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Killing_Spree_No: Killing Spree is a perpetual King of the Hill event featuring four premier teams from North America. Each team will battle their way to the top and attempt to win three matches in a row for a \"killing spree\". Hosted by NEO Dota.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Killing_Spree_Nor: Killing Spree 是 King of the Hill 的長期比賽，集結北美的四支頂尖隊伍。每支隊伍想要獲勝必須連續贏取三場比賽，完成『大殺特殺（Killing Spree）』。比賽由 NEO Dota 主辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Killing_: Killing Spree is a perpetual King of the Hill event featuring four premier teams from North America. Each team will battle their way to the top and attempt to win three matches in a row for a \"killing spree\". Hosted by NEO Dota.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Treasure_Key: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Treasure_Ke: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Light_of_the_Solar_Di: Light of the Solar Divine Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Light_of_the_Solar_Divine: 包含莉娜「炎陽聖光」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Light_of_the_Sol: Contains all of the items for the 'Light of the Solar Divine' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Brood_Queen_Set: 誤入育母蜘蛛狩獵場的人中很多都是騎士和貴族青年，他們嘈雜的裝甲打破了女王寧靜的生活，他們的靴子不斷抽動着光滑的蛛網。那些闖入者就如同鮮嫩多汁的甲蟲，女王把他們當作內臟吃掉，卻對他們蔽體的華麗裝甲愈發好奇。有一天一位鐵匠誤入她的網中。他向女王承諾會爲她打造這世界上最華麗的裝甲，以換取自由。協議達成，鐵匠辛苦地測量，從被蛛網包裹的騎士屍體上搜尋最佳的材料。當嶄新的裝甲打造完成後，女王履行諾言給了鐵匠自由，然後看着自己的孩子把他吃掉。包含育母蜘蛛「育母女王」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Brood_Queen_: Many are the knights and noble youths who have intruded on the hunting grounds of the Broodmother, disturbing her peace with the clatter of armor, their boots setting atwitch her silken web. The intruders are like succulent shelled insects upon whose innards she's gorged, all the while growing curious of the adornments that drape their bodies, until that day when a blacksmith found his way into her web.  Armor he promised her, the finest in the land, if only she would set him free. And so a deal was struck, and the blacksmith measured, and toiled, taking as his materials the finest steel to be found among the husked corpses of silk-wrapped knights.  When the new armor was finished, the spider kept her promise and set the blacksmith free.  Then she watched her brood devour him. Contains all of the items in the 'Brood Queen' set for Broodmother:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Obsidian_Blade_Set: 包含哈斯卡「黑曜石之刃」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Obsidian_Bla: Contains all of the items in the 'Obsidian Blade' set for Huskar:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legs_of_the_Brood_Queen: 八條腿的護甲，每一條都由一個陣亡騎士的胸甲打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legs_of_the_Broo: Eight legs of armor, each hammered from the breastplate of a fallen knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Brood_Queen: 死期降至的鐵匠用顫抖的雙手將皇冠放在蜘蛛的頭上，高呼着『女王萬歲！』
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Bro: With shaking hands, the doomed blacksmith laid a crown upon the spider's head, saying, \"A crown fit for a queen.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladed_Abdomen_of_the_Bro: 儘管她自然的甲殼已經足夠強壯，但鋼鐵裝甲輕撫她的甲殼仍能給育母女皇帶來一種難以言表的安全感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladed_Abdomen_o: Strong though her natural chitinous armor may be, there is something about the caress of steel against her carapice that privides a special sense of security for the Brood Queen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_OffHand: 巨魔戰將的預設副手武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Of: 巨魔戰將的預設副手武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_Melee_W: 巨魔戰將的預設近戰武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Me: 巨魔戰將的預設近戰武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_Melee_O: 巨魔戰將的預設近戰副手武器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Defaul: Troll Warlord's Default Melee Off-Hand Weapon
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Me: 巨魔戰將的預設近戰副手武器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_D: Troll Warlord's Default Melee Off-Hand Weapon
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Twin_Deaths: 感染瘟疫的貴族們要向羅坦德吉利獻上厚禮，因爲他手裏可怕的武器時刻提醒這他們隨時都有被人篡位的可能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Twin_D: Heavy with the gifts granted by the plagued nobility, Rotund'jere had this frightening tool fashioned to remind those in his care of the ever-present likelihood of their demise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Reliquary_of_Rotting_Doom: 黑暗主教的法袍之下只有腐爛與毀滅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Reliquary_of_Rot: Behind the sacred vestments of this dark cardinal lies little else but rot and ruin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pretiosa_of_Putrescense: 當腐朽的影響達到巔峯之時，羅坦德吉利也收藏了很多時髦的帽子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pretiosa_of_Putr: At the height of his corrupted influence, Rotund'jere had quite an assortment of fashionable hats.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_Weeping_Scorn: 鬍鬚上綁着用絲綢和金絲製成的帶子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_Weeping: Bands made from woven silk and gold tie this tainted hair together.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lichs_Black_Pool_Watcher: 它靜靜審視，密謀竊取你的魔力，和你的生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lichs_Black_Pool: Silently surveying and plotting the theft of your mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cluckles_the_Brave: 許多動物可以接受訓練來運送工具到戰場上。但會戴著噴射背包的動物僅此一隻！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cluckles_the_Bra: Many critters can be trained to ferry tools into battle.  Few will do so while wearing a jetpack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_West: 觀看 8 支頂尖戰隊爭奪國際錦標賽的最後一個席位
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_West: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_East: 觀看 8 支頂尖戰隊爭奪國際錦標賽的最後一個席位
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_East: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly_Madness_: It's Gosu Monthly Madness 是由 It's Gosu esports 舉辦的 Dota 2 錦標賽，由 Own3D.Tv、Razer 和 NOS Energy Drinks 共同贊助。賽事貫穿 6 月整月，16 支亞洲頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly: It's Gosu Monthly Madness is a Dota 2 tournament hosted by It's Gosu eSports and generously sponsored by Own3D.Tv, Razer and NOS Energy Drinks. Throughout the month of July, 16 of the best teams in Asia will clash and only the finalists will share a part of the prizepool of $1,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly_Madness_: It's Gosu Monthly Madness 是由 It's Gosu esports 舉辦的 Dota 2 錦標賽，由 Own3D.Tv、Razer 和 NOS Energy Drinks 共同贊助。賽事貫穿 6 月整月，16 支亞洲頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly: It's Gosu Monthly Madness is a Dota 2 tournament hosted by It's Gosu eSports and generously sponsored by Own3D.Tv, Razer and NOS Energy Drinks. Throughout the month of July, 16 of the best teams in Asia will clash and only the finalists will share a part of the prizepool of $1,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague: Gosuleague 推出以月為週期的賽季制度，不同水平的隊伍進行不同級別的比賽。頂級隊伍每月將獲得 $5,000 獎金。每支隊伍每週參加 2 場比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague: GosuLeague delivers seasons on a monthly basis where teams of all skill levels play in different divisions. The top division is awarded with $5000 each month. Each team play two matches a week.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague__Admin: Gosuleague 推出以月為週期的賽季制度，不同水平的隊伍進行不同級別的比賽。頂級隊伍每月將獲得 $5,000 獎金。每支隊伍每週參加 2 場比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague__Admi: GosuLeague delivers seasons on a monthly basis where teams of all skill levels play in different divisions. The top division is awarded with $5000 each month. Each team play two matches a week.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_League: 由 17173 遊戲網主辦的 G-1 冠軍聯賽是中國的首次 Dota 2 賽事。iG、LGD 和 DK 等隊伍將通過激烈的比賽爭奪 $50,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_: The G-1 Championship League, hosted by 17173 Games, is the first Dota 2 tournament in China. Exciting matches await with teams like iG, LGD and DK competing for a prize pool of $50,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_League__A: 由 17173 遊戲網主辦的 G-1 冠軍聯賽是中國的首次 Dota 2 賽事。iG、LGD 和 DK 等隊伍將通過激烈的比賽爭奪 $50,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_: The G-1 Championship League, hosted by 17173 Games, is the first Dota 2 tournament in China. Exciting matches await with teams like iG, LGD and DK competing for a prize pool of $50,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2: atoD 2 的參賽隊包含 8 支頂尖的北美及歐洲戰隊。比賽使用反隊長模式，因此每支戰隊都將使用非常規英雄，並破壞對手的陣容。聯賽部份收入將進入總獎金，因此這是首個粉絲可以提高獎金的賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2: atoD 2 features 8 top North American and European teams. Using Reverse Captain's Mode, teams will surely play unconventional heroes and sabotage each other's lineups.  With some of the proceeds going to the prize it's the first tournament to include a direct way for fans to increase the prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2__Admin: atoD 2 的參賽隊包含 8 支頂尖的北美及歐洲戰隊。比賽使用反隊長模式，因此每支戰隊都將使用非常規英雄，並破壞對手的陣容。聯賽部份收入將進入總獎金，因此這是首個粉絲可以提高獎金的賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2__Admin: atoD 2 features 8 top North American and European teams. Using Reverse Captain's Mode, teams will surely play unconventional heroes and sabotage each other's lineups.  With some of the proceeds going to the prize it's the first tournament to include a direct way for fans to increase the prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Madness: It's Gosu 攜第 3 屆 Asia Madness 迴歸。10 支亞洲頂尖隊伍將在三重淘汰賽中共同爭奪 $5,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Ma: It's Gosu returns with its third edition of the Asia Madness where the ten best teams from Asia will be competing for a prize pool of $5,000 in a triple elimination format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Madness_3__: It's Gosu 攜第 3 屆 Asia Madness 迴歸。10 支亞洲頂尖隊伍將在三重淘汰賽中共同爭奪 $5,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Ma: It's Gosu returns with its third edition of the Asia Madness where the ten best teams from Asia will be competing for a prize pool of $5,000 in a triple elimination format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2_Corsair_: 觀賞本年度 DreamHack 冬季賽的 Dota 2 海盜船復仇者盃，16 支隊伍將共同爭奪 200,000 克朗的總獎金。1100 名粉絲將見證在 DreamArena Extreme 舉行的總決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2: Watch the DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup at this year's Dreamhack Winter where 16 teams compete for the 200 000 SEK prize purse. The Grand Final is played in the DreamArena Extreme in front of 1100 fans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2_Corsair_: 觀賞本年度 DreamHack 冬季賽的 Dota 2 海盜船復仇者盃，16 支隊伍將共同爭奪 200,000 克朗的總獎金。1100 名粉絲將見證在 DreamArena Extreme 舉行的總決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2: Watch the DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup at this year's Dreamhack Winter where 16 teams compete for the 200 000 SEK prize purse. The Grand Final is played in the DreamArena Extreme in front of 1100 fans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SEA_League: 東南亞聯賽將由來自東南亞的優秀隊伍共同完成賽事的各階段。為期兩週的緊張賽事將由來自 BeyondthesummitTV 的 GoDz 和 LD 解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SEA_League: The SEA League features SEA's finest teams as they compete in several stages of the tournament. Two weeks of intense action will be commentated by GoDz and LD of BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SEA_League: 東南亞聯賽將由來自東南亞的優秀隊伍共同完成賽事的各階段。為期兩週的緊張賽事將由來自 BeyondthesummitTV 的 GoDz 和 LD 解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SEA_Leag: The SEA League features SEA's finest teams as they compete in several stages of the tournament. Two weeks of intense action will be commentated by GoDz and LD of BeyondthesummitTV.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Bow: 這年深日久的弓，由橡木和鋼鐵製成，上面有神鷹金色羽毛裝飾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Bo: An ancient bow of oak and iron, gilded with the golden feathers of a sacred falcon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Cloak: 這漂亮的翡翠色披風繡上了遠古金鷹之印。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Cl: This beautiful emrald cloak is embroidered with the ancient sidgel of the gilded falcon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bangles_of_the_Wildwings_: 梟獸們很愛惜自己的羽毛，用它們築成巢撫養幼鳥。據說梟獸對魅惑魔女最崇高的敬意就是贈予她羽毛，讓她製成手鐲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bangles_of_the_W: The Wildwings treasure their lost feathers, saving them to line the nests where they raise their young. It speaks of their deep respect for Enchantress that they gifted her these feathers for her bangles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Necklace_of_the_Wildwings: 梟獸守衛家園毫不留情，但對魅惑魔女進入它們的領地卻歡迎至極。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Necklace_of_the_: The Wildwing are fierce and territorial, but they more than tolerate Enchantress in their realms: They welcome her.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_Yoskreth: 殤月國的時尚與世界上大多地方不同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_Yoskr: The fashions of Yoskreth are not common in much of the rest of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armguards_of_the_Penitent: 爲了懺悔過去的罪行，陳不得已穿上了全新信仰的裝甲，在過去的沙漠中四處遊蕩，尋找皈依之人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armguards_of_the: In penance for his transgressions Chen was made to don the arms of his new faith, and wander his former desert home seeking conversions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderguards_of_the_Pen: 這對肩甲反射着天堂之光，如同千里之外即可看見的信念燈塔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderguards_o: The shoulderguards reflect the heavenly light above as a beacon of salvation visible from leagues away.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Turban_of_the_Penitent_No: 哈紮達爾廢墟的人知道在沙漠中帶錯頭飾會有怎樣的危險。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Turban_of_the_Pe: Those of the Hazhadal Barrens know the dangers of wearing improper headgear in the desert wastes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Locuthi_Barding_of_th: Locuthi Barding of the Penitent Nomad
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Locuthi_Barding_of_the_Pe: 這些獸甲更加輕巧，顏色也更淺，這都是在乾燥沙漠中存活的必備元素。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Locuthi_Barding_: The barding is lighter both in weight and in coloring, both necessary elements for survival in the dry wastes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Commanding_Rod_of_the: Commanding Rod of the Penitent Nomad
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Commanding_Rod_of_the_Pen: 儘管沒有傳統法杖的分量，他並不缺少潛質。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Commanding_Rod_o: Though it does not have the heft of the traditional rod, it lacks none of its potency.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Etched_Crescent_of_Yoskreth__O: 殤月國的雕刀 - 副手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Wildwings_Bl: 在梟獸這個高傲種族中出現幾個無賴是很不幸的。當需要抓捕他們的時候，魅惑魔女便會帶上從梟獸種族的智者那裏獲得的長矛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Wil: It is unfortunate that a few rogue Wildkin must spoil the proud race's reputation, but when it is time to hunt those few rascals down, Enchantress bears a spear granted her by the wisest of the Wildwing race.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the_Wildwing: 魅惑魔女帶着這條頭巾，暢通無阻地穿過了梟獸的領地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the: Enchantress passes unchallenged through Wildwing territories when she wears this headdress.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wingbelt_of_the_Wildwings: 梟獸工匠打造這條腰帶時從活體熵取下了上千根羽毛，而不是如同大家提議的一樣，從死去的梟獸身上取材。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wingbelt_of_the_: Fear not, this belt was crafted by Wildwing artisans from thousands of feathers plucked painlessly from living individuals; and not, as some have suggested, hacked from a dead Wildwing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Diretide_HUD_Skin: 魔魘狂潮 HUD 介面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_HUD_Skin: 白雪掩蓋了冰冷大地，空氣中充滿了寒意。 Frostivus 就這樣到來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_HUD_Sk: A chill fills the air as the snows blanket the cold ground.  The time of Frostivus comes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Restless_: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>寶箱鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Tidal_Power: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>寶箱鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Crystalline_: 這枝當初為了紀念北極雙星而製做的法杖已冰封在冰川之中達千年之久。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Cry: Locked frozen in a glacier for a thousand years, this great staff was carved long ago in honor of the twin northern stars.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gazing_Eye_of_the_Dem: Gazing Eye of the Demon Witch

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tuskar: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為聲線鏗鏘有力的圖斯卡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tuskar: This item replaces the default announcer with punchy lines from Tusk.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Premier_League_Season_4: The Premier League 第 4 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Premier_League_Season: 觀賞來自歐美的 10 支頂尖隊伍爭奪 $10,000 獎金。本門票至少含有 100 場比賽，並由 Blaze 和 Rainmaker 負責英文解說，Versuta 負責俄文解說。內含獨家信使「變色龍蜥」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Premier_Leag: Watch 10 of the best teams from Europe and America contend for a prize of $10,000. This ticket will entitle you to over 100 matches commentated by Blaze & Rainmaker and Russian commentary by Versuta. Also included is the exclusive courier 'Wynchell the Wyrmeleon'.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Spring_2013: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 春季賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Spring_2: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 春季賽是全新的 Dota 2 超級賽事。在數週比賽中，知名戰隊將接受即將到來的挑戰並最終參加線下總決賽，爭奪 $39,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One: The RaidCall EMS One Spring 2013 is the new premier Dota2 competition. Over the course of several weeks, established teams will face up-and-coming challengers in the fight for a spot in the playoffs and eventually at the live event finals, competing for $39,000 in prize money.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Spring_2013_A: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 春季賽管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 春季賽是全新的 Dota 2 超級賽事。在數週比賽中，知名戰隊將接受即將到來的挑戰並最終參加線下總決賽，爭奪 $39,000 總獎金。

Over the course of several weeks, established teams will face up-and-coming challengers in the fight for a spot in the playoffs and eventually at the live event finals, competing for $39,000 in prize money.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Season_V: StarLadder 的 StarSeries 第 5 賽季迴歸！以 v1lat 和 TobiWan 為首的解說將為您帶來 4 種不同語言的實況直播。總獎金高達 $15,000，打造最佳的 StarSeries 聯賽！Star Series 的主要賽事是在烏克蘭基輔的 Cyber​​Sport Arena 舉辦的區域連線總決賽。內含獨家信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Seas: StarLadder's StarSeries Season 5 is back! Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $15,000 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Courier.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Slithereen_Basher: 世上能在戰爭的波濤間留存下來的武器屈指可數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Slithere: Few are the weapons that have outlasted the wars beneath the waves.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Riptide: 讓這把刀痛飲敵人的鮮血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Riptide: Let this blade drink deep of your foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Riptide: 讓這把刀保護你免受傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Riptide: Let this blade guard you from harm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Finblade: 鰭刃劈斬敵人就如同昆卡的戰艦劈波斬浪一般易如反掌。他就在這血霧與靈魂交織的彩虹中陶醉著。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Finblade: Kunkka's ship cleaves the waves as easily as Finblade cleaves his enemies. Kunkka revels in the iridescent play of light given off by dashing spray and liberated souls alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Pool_Watcher: 它靜靜審視，密謀竊取你的魔力，和你的生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Pool_Watch: Silently surveying and plotting the theft of your mana, and your life.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellgazer: 當術士全神貫注鑽研魔法時，他的哨崗正留意地獄的擾動——和凡間的入侵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellgazer: While Warlock is deep in study, his sentry keeps an eye out for Infernal interruptions--as well as more mundane intrusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bottom_Watcher: 深海居民被迫從大海深處來到海面為您效力！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bottom_Watcher: From far below, a dweller of the deeps has been pressed into service at the surface!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Double_Vision: 強大的狂熱之龍的吉祥物有兩個頭用於偵察！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Double_Vision: This mascot of the powerful Pyrexae has two heads with which to scout for trouble!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wynchell_the_Wyrmeleon: 它究竟是一隻偽裝成強大飛龍的巨蜥，還是充作無名蜥蜴的著名飛龍？的確，真相已經亂作一團，也無法憑空臆斷。尤其是這隻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wynchell_the_Wyr: Is it a clever chameleon pretending to be a powerful Wyrm, or a celebrated Wyrm trying to pass itself off as an anonymous chameleon? Truly, the dimensions have begun to spill into each other, and nothing may be taken for granted. Especially not Wynchell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Ladder_Grillhound: 馴服炙焰獵犬的過程是一個充滿挑戰與突破的故事，而不僅僅是燒焦幾根眉毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Ladder_Gril: The taming of a grillhound is a tale filled with trials and breakthroughs, and more than a few singed eyebrows.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_4Players_League: 4PL 是歐洲的網路遊戲聯賽。與其他賽事不同，令人興奮的著名 Play4Dota2 錦標賽將召集全世界的隊伍參加。組建您自己的戰隊，贏取獎金及硬體獎勵，與最優秀的 Dota 2 玩家進行面對面的交流。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_4Players_League: The 4PL is an European online gaming league that provides, besides many other events, the exciting and well known Play4Dota2 tournaments with teams participating from all over the world. Form your team, win money or hardware prizes and meet or encounter some of the best Dota 2 players.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_4Players_League: 4PL 是歐洲的網路遊戲聯賽。與其他賽事不同，令人興奮的著名 Play4Dota2 錦標賽將召集全世界的隊伍參加。組建您自己的戰隊，贏取獎金及硬體獎勵，與最優秀的 Dota 2 玩家進行面對面的交流。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_4Players: The 4PL is an European online gaming league and provides, besides many other events, the exciting and well known Play4Dota2 tournaments with teams participating from all over the world. Form your team, win money or hardware prizes and meet or encounter some of the best Dota 2 players.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Implements_of_th: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Implements of the Tahlin Watch' set for Riki:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tail_Fins_of_the_Slit: Tail Fins of the Slithereen Nobility
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Respirator: 這個面具不是爲了讓毒氣進不來，是爲了讓毒氣出不去！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Respi: This mask is not meant to keep toxic gasses out, it's meant to keep them in!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hidden_Talent: 沉默是金，如這頂強大頭盔的尖部一樣純正。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hidd: Silence is golden, as is the point on this mighty helm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Cutter: 大多數鍊金術見證者都沒有意識到自身防護的重要性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Cutte: Most observers of Alchemy fail to realize the importance of personal defense against most observers of Alchemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Experimentalists_Unstable_Flas: 實驗家的不穩定錐形瓶
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists: Carved and formed from Radiant ore.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Great_Pipe_of_the_Fat: Great Pipe of the Father Spirits
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ritual_Skirt_of_the_F: Ritual Skirt of the Father Spirits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Skirt_of_the_Fathe: 戴佐在祭祀裙表之下還有什麼把戲？那得看儀式有何結果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Skirt_of_: What does Dazzle wear under his ritual skirt? That depends upon the ritual.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Carapace: 當創世能量變得炙熱而柔韌時，斯吉斯喀爾的甲殼也會變得如此，提醒他是時候開始編織了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Car: When the energies of creation are hot and malleable, Skitskurr's carapace responds in kind, alerting him that it is time to start weaving.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Striders: 用這幾對打造精良的後腿，  來沿着時間之絲謹慎地爬行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Str: Creep carefully along the threads of time, with these precision crafted striders.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Manipulators: 當重新編織現實之紗時，斯吉斯喀爾會帶上他最華麗的前臂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Man: When it is time to reweave the stuff of reality, Skitskurr dons his finest manipulators.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Antennae: 斯吉斯喀爾能夠敏銳地察覺到創世之紗的殘缺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Ant: Skitskurr senses are finely tuned to the slightest disruption of the fabric of creation.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Crystalli: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>混沌水晶的寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of Crystalline Chaos</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 扭曲的雙角哺育扭曲的思想。扭曲的意圖源於扭曲的思想。與拉希瑞克的邂逅成就扭曲的命運。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Twisted: Twisted is the mind that broods beneath these twisted horns. Twisted are the intentions that issue from that mind. Twisted is the fate of those who encounter Leshrac.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 有傳言稱拉希瑞克曾失去了他的尾巴，經過多方搜尋最終裝上了這條人造尾巴。這也許就是他的智慧無比冷酷的原因。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Twisted_: Rumors have it that Leshrac once lost his tail, and after much searching and despair, an artificial appendage was attached. Perhaps this was the source of his bleak brand of wisdom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 有時頓悟是如此的痛苦，由內而外地迸發，穿過肉體，痛苦的領悟便充斥着身體與心靈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Twisted: Some insights are so painful that they burst out from within, piercing flesh, filling body and mind alike with agonizing insight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vines_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 人們常說智慧的生長離不開明媚的陽光、新鮮的空氣和純淨的水。但有一種扭曲的智慧，如同這些藤蔓一樣，需要極度的痛苦，陰暗的思想和愚蠢的行爲方能茁壯成長。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vines_of_Twisted: They say that wisdom grows not without bright light, fresh air, clean water. But a twisted sort of wisdom, like these vines, may feed and thrive on anguish, black thoughts, and foul deeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__FebMarch: GEST Dota 2 - 二三月階段賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__2013: 技嘉電競聯賽由 Gigabyte 贊助，DotaTalk 主辦。GMPGL 東南亞資格賽的 8 支獲勝隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,500 的現金大獎。勝者還將與中國的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪額外 $1,500 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__201: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__FebMarch: GEST Dota 2 - Feb and March ADMIN

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dot: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will have the privilege to compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Armageddon_Dota_2: 亞洲頂尖 Dota 2 隊伍上演大戰！觀賞他們激烈對決爭奪大型企業聯盟贊助的機會！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Armagedd: The battle between the best Dota 2 teams in Asia is on! Watch as they game fiercely to win a chance to be sponsored by the big names in corporate alliance!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV 隆重推出 WePlay Dota 2 聯賽，Logitech、Western Digital 和 Inno3D 鼎力支持！今年 3 月開始 32 支西區頂尖 Dota 隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 獎金及硬體獎勵。全部賽事將由 Beyond the Summit 和 WePlay.TV 實況解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV proudly presents the WePlay Dota 2 League, brought to you by Logitech, Western Digital, and Inno3D! Beginning this March, thirty-two of Western Dota's best will duke it out online for $20,000 in cash & gear prizes with professional commentary from Beyond the Summit and WePlay.TV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV 隆重推出 WePlay Dota 2 聯賽，Logitech、Western Digital 和 Inno3D 鼎力支持！今年 3 月開始 32 支西區頂尖 Dota 隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 獎金及硬體獎勵。全部賽事將由 Beyond the Summit 和 WePlay.TV 實況解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlay_D: WePlay.TV proudly presents the WePlay Dota 2 League, brought to you by Logitech, Western Digital, and Inno3D! Beginning this March, thirty-two of Western Dota's best will duke it out online for $20,000 in cash & gear prizes with professional commentary from Beyond the Summit and WePlay.TV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota2_Invitatio: DreamHack Dota2 邀請賽將集結 8 支歐洲頂尖隊伍，在線上賽中共同爭奪 $6,000 獎金及 DreamHack Dota 2 夏季盃的入圍資格。每週將有 5 場賽事，又 GD Studio 承辦，Draskyl、2GD、Wagamama、Weppas 和 Bruno 共同解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota2_: DreamHack Dota2 Invitational Features 8 of the top European teams, battling online for $6000 and the opportunity to qualify to DreamHack Summer Dota 2 Cup. 5 action packed weeks of content, produced by The GD Studio, with commentary by Draskyl, 2GD, Wagamama, Weppas and Bruno.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Omexe: 總有人會問，爲什麽半人馬也需要腰帶？不過他們通常都死了。好可憐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Omexe: Some ask, why does a centaur need a belt?  Those people usually die.  Badly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Armor: 以眼還眼只會讓所有英雄變成瞎子。只有狼人例外，因爲他不會再讓第二個眼睛瞎掉了。信不信由你。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Ar: An eye for an eye makes leaves all the heroes blind.  Except for Lycan, because he's darn sure not going to lose his second eye.  You can be sure of that.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Belt: 總有些人會對用顱骨做腰帶釦這種時尚觀念提出質疑。上一個提出質疑的人已經變成了下一個腰帶釦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Be: Some have questioned the fashion sense of using a skull for a belt buckle.  The last guy who questioned it became a second belt buckle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Head: 這才不是什麼眼罩，這是保護視界的護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_He: That's not an eye-patch.  That's armor for his vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Shoulder: 多很多英雄來說，護肩並不是什麼剔骨抽筋的利器。狼人卻是個例外。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Sh: For some heroes, a shoulder isn't a deadly weapon capable of eviscerating enemies.  Lycan isn't one of those heroes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Armor_of_the_Sanguine: Armor of the Sanguine Moon Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Sanguine_Moo: 在猩紅血月的耀眼光芒下，這些物品將狼人變成了終極的殺戮之獸。包含狼人「猩紅血月」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_San: By the blinding light of the blood moon, these items transform Lycan into the ultimate killing beast.  Includes all of the items in the 'Sanguine Moon' set for Lycan:

Tokens.DOTA_Item_G1_Champions_League_Season_5: G-1 冠軍聯賽第 5 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_League_Seaso: G-1 冠軍聯賽第 5 賽季將舉行網路資格賽，選拔頂尖的西方隊伍並提供往返機票參加中國的區域網路決賽，與 iG、LGD、DK 和 Orange 等隊伍正面較量。亞洲區資格賽也將通過資格賽爭奪區域網路決賽的資格。總獎金將超過上賽季的 $53,000。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_Lea: The 5th G-1 Championship will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool exceeds $53,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_G1_Champions_League_Season_5_A: G-1 冠軍聯賽第 5 賽季 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_G1_Champions_Leag: G-1 冠軍聯賽第 5 賽季將舉行網路資格賽，選拔頂尖的西方隊伍並提供往返機票參加中國的區域網路決賽，與 iG、LGD、DK 和 Orange 等隊伍正面較量。亞洲區資格賽也將通過資格賽爭奪區域網路決賽的資格。總獎金將超過上賽季的 $53,000。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_G1_Champ: The Fifth Season of the G-1 Championship league will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool will exceed last season $53,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Rarities: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>寶藏鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Rari: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Cursed_Wo: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Vindicator: 對不起斧王是件十分危險的事情。他扯平的方法足以致死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Vindicator: To wrong Axe is dangerous.  To suffer his vindication is deadly.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Captain_Bamboo: 不僅是隻熊貓，他還是個隊長呢！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Captain_Bamboo: Not just a Panda, He's a Captain!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Inky_the_Hexapus: 基王海盜在絕望角一帶被捕獲，並被一夥劫掠海盜徵用，在船隻間來來往往遞送消息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Inky_the_Hexapus: Inky the hexapus was fished from the waters of the Horn of Despair and pressed into service by a fleet of marauding pirates, carrying messages to and fro between ships.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snelfret_the_Snail: 作為一支叛逆的蝸牛，迅疾蝸牛拒絕遵守毫無生機的社會準則。這個世界越是要他放慢腳步，他越是要背上蝸殼前往更加活力四射的國度。他誓要重新定義蝸牛的步速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snelfret_the_Sna: The original rebel snail, Snelfret refused to conform to a social order that enforced lethargy, a world that told him he must not move too fast. So he loaded up his shell and headed for more dynamic climes, determined to redefine the meaning of snail's pace.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl: 月之女神征服了眾多森林中的生物為她服務。這隻靈巧而機警的小雪梟總是傾盡全力為銀葉森林的守衛提供幫助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl: The Goddess of the Moon presses many forest creatures into her service.  Always crafty, ever vigilant, little Snowl would give his all to aid the guardians of the Nightsilver.
