Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_C: Treasure Key of the Cursed Wood
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Curse: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>天譴之木的寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of the Cursed Wood</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_S: Treasure Key of the Shaper Divine
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Shape: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>巧匠聖物的寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of the Shaper Divine</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Netolic_Pro_League_2nd_edition: 第二屆 Netolic 職業聯賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_League_2nd_ed: 8 支受邀隊伍與 8 支資格賽選拔隊伍，共 16 支隊伍將共同爭奪 $4,000 總獎金。Orange、Zenith、Vici Gaming 和 MUFC 等隊伍將參賽。比賽提供英文、西班牙文和葡萄牙文解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_Leag: 16 teams, 8 from direct invitation and 8 from qualifiers, will compete for $4000. The tournament will feature teams like Orange, Zenith, Vici Gaming and MUFC. Commentary will be provided in English, Spanish and Portuguese.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Netolic_Pro_League_2nd_edition: 第二屆 Netolic 職業聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Pro_Leagu: 8 支受邀隊伍與 8 支資格賽選拔隊伍，共 16 支隊伍將共同爭奪 $4,000 總獎金。Orange、Zenith、Vici Gaming 和 MUFC 等隊伍將參賽。比賽提供英文、西班牙文和葡萄牙文解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: 16 teams, 8 from direct invitation and 8 from qualifiers, will compete for $4000. The tournament will feature teams like Orange, Zenith, Vici Gaming and MUFC. Commentary will be provided in English, Spanish and Portuguese.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Shaper_Di: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crasher: 這對塵封的彎刃終於重見天日。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crasher: These dusty old blades find use once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crescent: 這對塵封的彎刃終於重見天日。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crescent: These dusty old blades find use once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Axes_of_Karroch: 他的斧頭甚至受過訓練。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Battlejug_of_the_the_: Battlejug of the the Drunken Warlord
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Mailed_Skirt_of_the_D: Mailed Skirt of the Drunken Warlord
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercup: 沙場上的死屍上滋生了許多蘑菇，很合毛茛獸的胃口。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercup: The dead of battle can breed many an odd fungus.  That suits Buttercup just fine.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercups_Barding: 把毛茛獸這麽兇殘的生物調教得如此溫順也真是件怪事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercups_Bardi: It is a strange thing that such a calm and gentle creature as Buttercup be made to seem so fierce.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Akakiryu_of_a_Thousand_Fa: 這把劍以傳説中的神龍命名，並在主宰成爲劍聖的那一天被賦予了他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Akakiryu_of_a_Th: Named after a legendary dragon, this sword was given to the Juggernaut on the day he became a swordmaster.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hakama_of_a_Thousand_Face: 一件來自遮面之島的傳統長袴。是尤涅若在遭到流放的很久以前由尤涅若當初的劍術師傅所贈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hakama_of_a_Thou: A traditional hakama from Isle of Masks. It was given to Yurnero by his late swordmaster, long before his exile.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kataginu_of_a_Thousand_Fa: 一件遮面之島上的偉大戰士們所穿的傳統無袖夾克。上頭有著尤涅若的旗幟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kataginu_of_a_Th: A traditional sleeveless jacket worn by the great warriors of Isle of Masks. It carries the banner of Yurnero.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacier_of_Eldritch_Ice: 冰冷的巫妖之心在一池黑暗的死水底部環繞著溺斃的死者，使周遭凍結。而隨著邪惡的冰晶破碎，浮出水面的是位心中憤恨無可淹沒的溺斃亡騎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacier_of_Eldri: Drowned but not dead, deep in the Black Pool, the cold hatred in Lich's heart froze the water around him. These ice-shards, formed of evil, hold a hatred that will never melt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Subtle_Demon__Off: 敏銳惡魔之刃 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Subtle_D: Blade of the Subtle Demon - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore_the_: 他只是想再聽她唱一首歌。這把匕首是送給他的禮物，誰不讓她唱歌，他就讓誰永遠閉嘴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore_the_: He only wanted to hear her song one more time. The dagger was gifed to him, and he keeps it with him to silence those who wish to silence her song.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League: AMD 與 DotaTalk 聯合隆重為您帶來 AMD 超級聯賽。東南亞的優秀戰隊將在本次大賽中爭奪 $5,000 的總獎金。為期 2 個月的精彩賽事將由 GoDz、LD、Luminous 和 Blaze 在 BeyondthesummitTV 共同解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: AMD, in partnership with DotaTalk, proudly brings you the AMD Premier League. The tournament features SEA's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $5,000. Two months of intense action will be commentated by GoDz, LD, Luminous and Blaze on BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_ADMIN: AMD Dota2 超級聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_: AMD 與 DotaTalk 聯合隆重為您帶來 AMD 超級聯賽。東南亞的優秀戰隊將在本次大賽中爭奪 $5,000 的總獎金。為期 2 個月的精彩賽事將由 GoDz、LD、Luminous 和 Blaze 在 BeyondthesummitTV 共同解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: AMD, in partnership with DotaTalk, proudly brings you the AMD Premier League. The tournament features SEA's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $5,000. Two months of intense action will be commentated by GoDz, LD, Luminous and Blaze on BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_E2Max_L33T_Championship: 首屆 E2Max L33T 錦標賽（ELC）將提供 13,000 新加坡元的現金獎池。線上及區域網路資格賽將從五月持續至六月，總決賽將於 6 月 7 日在新加坡國泰烏電影娛樂城的 E2Max 舉行！ELC 由 Cathay 呈現，Rapture Gaming Network 主辦，e-Club 和 CM Storm 鼎力支持。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_E2Max_L33T_Champ: The inaugural E2Max L33T Championship (ELC) will feature a prize pool of SGD13,000 cash. online and LAN qualifiers from May to July, with the Grand Finals on 7th July at E2Max, Cineleisure, Singapore! ELC is presented by Cathay, hosted by Rapture Gaming Network, supported by e-Club and CM Storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_E2Max_L33T_Championship_ADMIN: E2Max L33T 錦標賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_E2Max_L33T_Champi: 首屆 E2Max L33T 錦標賽（ELC）將提供 13,000 新加坡元的現金獎池。線上及區域網路資格賽將從五月持續至六月，總決賽將於 6 月 7 日在新加坡國泰烏電影娛樂城的 E2Max 舉行！ELC 由 Cathay 呈現，Rapture Gaming Network 主辦，e-Club 和 CM Storm 鼎力支持。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_E2Max_L3: The inaugural E2Max L33T Championship (ELC) will feature a prize pool of SGD13,000 cash. online and LAN qualifiers from May to July, with the Grand Finals on 7th July at E2Max, Cineleisure, Singapore! ELC is presented by Cathay, hosted by Rapture Gaming Network, supported by e-Club and CM Storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__April_and_May: GEST Dota 2 - 四五月階段賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__April_and_Ma: 技嘉電競聯賽由 Gigabyte 贊助，DotaTalk 主辦。GMPGL 東南亞資格賽的 8 支獲勝隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,500 的現金大獎。勝者還將與中國的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪額外 $1,500 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__Apr: The Gigabyte E-sports tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL Qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will then compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__April_and_May_ADM: GEST Dota 2 - 四五月階段賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dota_2__Apri: 技嘉電競聯賽由 Gigabyte 贊助，DotaTalk 主辦。GMPGL 東南亞資格賽的 8 支獲勝隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,500 的現金大獎。勝者還將與中國的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪額外 $1,500 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dot: The Gigabyte E-sports tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winneres of 8 GMPGL Qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will then compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spottin_Goggles: 能夠在百步之外看到一只老鼠的抽動，狙擊手的護目鏡就是這麽厲害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spottin_Goggles: Able to see a tic on a mouse's back at a thousand paces, Sniper's Spottin' Goggles are a marvel to behold.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Set: 包含哈斯卡「神聖骸骨」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Set: Includes all of the items in the \"Sacred Bones\" set for Huskar.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Spoils_of_the_Bone_Ru: Spoils of the Bone Ruins Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_of_the_Bone_Ruins_: 包含米波「骸骨廢墟戰利品」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_of_the_Bo: Contains all of the items in the 'Spoils of the Bone Ruins' for Meepo:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Set: 此組合包內含斯拉達「深海蛟龍」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Sea Dragon' set for Slardar:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kupu_the_Metamorpher: 雅美蝶庫普別來無恙！誠實而勇敢，庫普為你遞送物品時也是最時髦的舞姿。有保障！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kupu_the_Metamor: All hail Kupu the Metamorpher!  Honest and forthright, Kupu with delivery your items in a most timely fashion.  Steadfast!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_livery_llama_courier: 有了草泥馬拉瑪，名字都要變成倆！似飛箭健步如飛，如小薇微笑服務...您復何求？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_livery_llama_cou: The Llama Llama courier... with a courier THIS good, you name him TWICE!   \"Fleet of Foots\" and \"Service with a Smile!\" ... What more can you ask for?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Ben: 阿班在這裡！阿班在那裡！阿班無處不在！一聲令下，阿班隨時出發！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Ben: Nimble Ben here! And there! And everywhere! Send me where you want me and I'm already there!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Princess_Penelope_the_Por: 粉嫩肥美的殿下，您忠實的僕人來了！請好好對待他，他是如此迷戀您。事實上，無人能撼動他的忠心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Princess_Penelop: Attention, Your Pink and Portly Highness, your loyal bearer has arrived! Treat him well, for he is very attached to you. In fact, there's really no way to shake him.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bandanna_of_the_Bone_: Bandanna of the Bone Ruin Bandits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Armlet: 深海蛟龍的鱗片是少有的比斯拉達的皮膚還堅硬的物質。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Arml: The scaly hide of the Sea Dragon is one of the few substances tougher than Slardar's own integument.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Basher: 在深海中搜獵蛟龍只是魚人一族的日常運動。這把鎚就是用一次搜獵的戰利品打造的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Bash: For sport, the Slithereen hunt the great Sea Dragons of the ocean abyss. This basher is fashioned from the spoils of one such hunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Crown: 只有在與深海蛟龍角逐中證明自己的人才敢於佩戴這頂皇冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Crow: Only those who prove themselves in hunt against the great Sea Dragon dare wear such a crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Fins: 在斯拉達身上似乎是鰭，但實際上是深海巨龍最渺小的腮甲邊緣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Fins: What appear as fins on Slardar are but the edge of the mighty Sea Dragon's tiniest gill-guards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Caustic_Steel_Set: 此組合包內含鍊金術師「腐蝕鋼鐵」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Caustic_Steel_Se: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Caustic Steel' set for Alchemist:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Vesture_Set: 此組合包內含魅影刺客「半影霓裳」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Vestur: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Penumbral Vesture' set for Phantom Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ancient_Sovereign_Set: 此組合包內含沙王「遠古君王」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ancient_Sove: This set contains all of the items in the 'Ancient Sovereign' set for Sand King:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Caster_Set: 此組合包內含莉娜「戰鬥法師」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Caste: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Battle Caster' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Moon_Rider_Set: 此組合包內含蜜拉娜「銀月騎士」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Moon_Rider_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rider' set for Mirana:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_East_Qualifi: 國際錦標賽東區資格賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_East_Qu: 觀看 8 支頂尖戰隊爭奪國際錦標賽的最後一個席位
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_West_Qualifi: 國際錦標賽西區資格賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_International: 觀看 8 支頂尖戰隊爭奪國際錦標賽的最後一個席位
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Inte: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Malignant: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Blinders: 食人魔的腐蝕鋼鐵眼罩
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Blind: 視界減小了，但防禦增強了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: What it may lack for vision it makes up for in protection.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Bracers: 食人魔的腐蝕鋼鐵護腕
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Brace: 如果你要和不穩定的材料打交道，那就要保證操作失誤也不會斃命！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: If you're gonna work with unstable materials, make sure you can survive a mistake!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Choppers: 食人魔的腐蝕鋼鐵砍刀
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: Good for stirring mixtures, great for chopping dinner!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists_Knot: 有了這個新髮型，重返青春不是夢！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists: Ah, to be young again.  This haircut should help!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Young_Alchemists_Protection: 青年鍊金術師的防護服
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists_Protecti: 當你剛剛開始的時候，配方可能不準確，而且很危險。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists: When you're just starting out, your formulas are a little braver, a little less precise.  And a lot more dangerous.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Spider_Shuffle: 跳個蜘蛛舞來慶祝一個關鍵的推進或是殲滅敵方隊伍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Spider_Shu: Celebrate a critical push or an enemy team wipe with this spidery dance.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Braided_Tail_of_the_C: Braided Tail of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Brutal_Crescent_of_th: Brutal Crescent of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Death_Mask_of_the_Con: Death Mask of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Mask_of_the_Conquer: 這張帶著面具的臉，將是你在戰場上的最後所見。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Mask_of_th: Wear this mask, and it will be the last face your enemies ever see.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Spiked_Pauldrons_of_t: Spiked Pauldrons of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Shredding_the_Lute_: 秀一段空氣吉他速彈來慶祝一個關鍵的推進或是殲滅敵方隊伍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Shredding_: Celebrate a critical push or an enemy team wipe by shredding some hot licks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_22_Keys_of_AnzarAnzulii: 安札安祖力的廿二金鑰
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bandana_of_the_Bone_R: Bandana of the Bone Ruin Bandits
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Fluted_Guard_of_the_M: Fluted Guard of the Moon Rider
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Lion_Drape_of_the_Moo: Lion Drape of the Moon Rider
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Lion_Quiver_of_the_Mo: Lion Quiver of the Moon Rider
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Sandworn_Visage_of_th: Sandworn Visage of the Ancient Sovereign
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Vestigial_Wings_of_th: Vestigial Wings of the Ancient Sovereign
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Celebration_of_Deat: 讓列祖列宗注意到您的勝利！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Celebratio: Draw the eye of the ancestors upon your victory!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deepest_Depths: 一個在寒冷深淵的人，必須相當的聰敏且能夠適應環境，否則就落為他人的食物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deepest_Depths: Within the coldest depths one must be clever and adaptable, or become food for one that is.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tempest_Wing: 那些未能飛上天空的，將面臨到的是漫長的墜落。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tempest_Wing: Those who fail the skies face nothing but a very long fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_Dota_2_Invitational: 由 Alienware 贊助的 Curse Dota 2 邀請賽，是一個歷時三個週末的邀請賽。8 支受邀隊伍將在雙敗淘汰制的比賽中爭奪 $10,000 的總獎金。（冠軍 $5,000；亞軍 $3,000；季軍 $2,000）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_Dota_2_Inv: The Curse Dota 2 Invitational, sponsored by Alienware, is an invitational bracket tournament that spans 3 weekends. 8 Teams were invited to compete in a double elimination format with a $10,000 prize pool. (1st $5,000 2nd $3,000 3rd $2,000)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Curse_Dota_2_Invitational__ADM: Curse Dota 2 邀請賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Curse_Dota_2_Invi: 由 Alienware 贊助的 Curse Dota 2 邀請賽，是一個歷時三個週末的邀請賽。8 支受邀隊伍將在雙敗淘汰制的比賽中爭奪 $10,000 的總獎金。（冠軍 $5,000；亞軍 $3,000；季軍 $2,000）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Curse_Do: The Curse Dota 2 Invitational, sponsored by Alienware, is an invitational bracket tournament that spans 3 weekends. 8 Teams were invited to compete in a double elimination format with a $10,000 prize pool. (1st $5,000 2nd $3,000 3rd $2,000)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil: 據說不管是藝術家還是戰士所能找到最好的僕人就是一位信得過的惡魔鐵匠。然而，當一個英雄選擇了惡魔鐵匠作為他們的信使後，他會發現這些聰明的小傢伙會自我進化形態。因為它們親眼見證到偉大戰鬥而被激勵，惡魔鐵匠可能將會進化成為從未有過的珍奇異獸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil: Tis said among artisan and warrior alike that there is no finer servant than a trusty smeevil.  However, a hero who chooses a smeevil as their courier may soon find these clever critters taking new forms in order to gain assistants of their own. Inspired by the great battles they bear witness to, a smeevil may become emboldened to press ever more exotic beasts to their cause.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered:
榮耀之戰的開端，
重踏地面的馬蹄，
血流成河的土地，
超凡力量流動著。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered:
The thrum of war,
the stomp of hooves,
the bloodstained earth,
grim forces move.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Ticket:
此物品將邀請玩家在 2013 年 8 月 7-11 日期間前往華盛頓州西雅圖市觀賞 Dota 2 國際錦標賽。前往參加的玩家將獲得現場預定座位。

此門票必須從遊戲內您的背包中啟用。一旦啟用後門票就會被兌換並從背包中移除，同時註記在 Steam 帳戶中。門票資訊將在 2013 年 6 月 30 日之前以電子郵件的形式傳送到您 Steam 帳戶相連的電子郵件中。

本次購買還包含 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊和惡魔鐵匠信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20:
This item is an invitation to personally attend the Dota 2 International Tournament, August 7 - 11 2013, at Benaroya Hall in Seattle, WA. Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.

This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed no later than June 30th, 2013 to the email address associated with your Steam account.

This purchase also includes a International 2013 Interactive Compendium and Smeevil Courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_International_2013_Battle_Bonu: 2013 年國際錦標賽 戰點加成
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Battle: 使用此物品能在國際錦標賽結束以前給予您額外 <font color='#9da1a9'>125%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成 。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>125%</font> until the end of the International. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_International_2013_Interactive: 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Intera: 使用這本 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊來關注今年比賽的動態。還附贈一支免費的惡魔鐵匠信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_2013_Interac: 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊組合包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_In: 使用這本 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊來關注今年比賽的動態。還附贈一支免費的惡魔鐵匠信使以及達成 2013 年國際錦標賽目標獎勵的戰點加成！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier and International 2013 Battle Bonus stretch goal reward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunter_Set: 包含圖斯克「北極獵人」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunter_Se: Includes all of the items in the 'Arctic Hunter' set for Tusk
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_M: Treasure Key of the Malignant Amanita
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Malig: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_League: 10 支本土及外國隊伍在中國上海進行為期兩個月的比賽，爭奪百萬人民幣的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_Lea: Ten top teams from home and abroad compete for two months in Shanghai, China for a total prize pool of 1.05 million yuan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Super_League__ADMIN: Dota 2 超級聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_League__ADMI: 10 支本土及外國隊伍在中國上海進行為期兩個月的比賽，爭奪百萬人民幣的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_Lea: Ten top teams from home and abroad compete for two months in Shanghai, China for a total prize pool of 1.05 million yuan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_2013_Battle_: 2013 年國際錦標賽 戰點加成
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_2013_Interac: 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_In: 使用這本 2013 年國際錦標賽互動手冊來關注今年比賽的動態。還附贈一支免費的惡魔鐵匠信使與特殊戰點加成道具！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier and Battle Bonus stretch reward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Glove: 重量上的不足彌補了觸覺的精準性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_G: What it lacks in heft it more than makes up for in tactile precision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Hood: 在寒冰之冬最最漆黑的夜晚，冰川殘骸的狼唱響了它們的輓歌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_H: In the darkest nights of icy winter, the wolves of Icewrack howl their dirge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Ice_Axe: 想要快過冰川殘骸的巔峯，就必須帶上這特別的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_I: To brave the peaks beyond Icewrack requires tools specific to the job.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Parka: 沒有什麼比冰川殘骸的狼皮更能抵禦嚴寒了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_P: There is no better guard against the arctic cold than the pelt of an Icewrack wolf.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Snack: 沒有零食怎麼去白色荒原！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_S: Never brave the white without a snack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Tusks: 正當他的破冰錐找到起重裝置之時，冰開始碎裂，圖斯克重新回到了寒冰凍土中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_T: As his pick found its purchase the ice began to crack and shatter, and Tusk was sent back to the icy tundra below.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_East_Qualifi: 國際錦標賽東區資格賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_West_Qualifi: 國際錦標賽西區資格賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_International: 觀看 8 支頂尖戰隊爭奪國際錦標賽的最後一個席位
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Inte: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_Tooth: 創造力強化了戰爭機器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_Tooth: Ingenuity powers the machinery of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival_Sum: 觀賞 5 支菲律賓戰隊在 2013 年菲律賓夏季遊戲節上守衛榮耀，共同對抗 Neolution.Orange、Neolution.International 和 PMS|Asterisk* 等強隊，爭奪 $1,750 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Gaming_Fes: Watch 5 Filipino teams defend their home turf against Neolution.Orange, Neolution.International and PMS|Asterisk* at the Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly 2013 for a prize pool of $1,750.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival_Summer_A: 菲律賓夏季遊戲節 - 管理員
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival: Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly - ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Gaming_Fest: 觀賞 5 支菲律賓戰隊在 2013 年菲律賓夏季遊戲節上守衛榮耀，共同對抗 Neolution.Orange、Neolution.International 和 PMS|Asterisk* 等強隊，爭奪 $1,750 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Ga: Watch 5 Filipino teams defend their home turf against Neolution.Orange, Neolution.International and PMS|Asterisk* at the Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly 2013 for a prize pool of $1,750.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapture_Gaming_Network_Le: 2013 / 2014 Rapture Gaming 網路聯賽門票包含 10 支亞洲超級隊伍在為期 9 個月的 198 場比賽，爭奪 19,000 新加坡幣總獎金。這將是亞洲地區最大規模的 DOTA 2 聯賽！RGN 提供英文、菲律賓文、泰文和越南文解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapture_Gaming_N: Rapture Gaming Network League 2013/2014 ticket gives you access to 198 matches over 9 months of the 10 premier teams in Asia vying for a prize pool of SGD19,000 cash, this is one of the biggest DOTA 2 leagues in Asia! Commentary in English, Filipino, Thai, and Vietnamese will be provided by RGN.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Rapture_Gaming_Network_League_: Rapture Gaming 網路聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rapture_Gaming_Ne: 2013 / 2014 Rapture Gaming 網路聯賽門票包含 10 支亞洲超級隊伍在為期 9 個月的 198 場比賽，爭奪 19,000 新加坡幣總獎金。這將是亞洲地區最大規模的 DOTA 2 聯賽！RGN 提供英文、菲律賓文、泰文和越南文解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rapture_: Rapture Gaming Network League 2013/2014 ticket gives you access to 198 matches over 9 months of the 10 premier teams in Asia vying for a prize pool of SGD19,000 cash, this is one of the biggest DOTA 2 leagues in Asia! Commentary in English, Filipino, Thai, and Vietnamese will be provided by RGN.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2_Super_League__ADMIN: 由完美世界和遊戲風雲共同舉辦，10 支亞洲頂尖強隊將在中國上海進行為期 5 週、規模宏大的區域網路賽事，爭奪 $171,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2_Super_Leag: Hosted by Perfect World and Gamefy, 10 top teams from Asia will be playing in this huge LAN event for 5 weeks in Shanghai, China, competing for a $171,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Pyrion_Flax: 該物品會將預設的連殺語音替換為特立獨行風格幽默的 Dota 2 諷刺家 Pyrion Flax。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Pyrion: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the unique and unruly humor of Dota 2 satirist Pyrion Flax.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyrion_Flax_Announcer_Pac: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為特立獨行風格幽默的 Dota 2 諷刺家 Pyrion Flax。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyrion_Flax_Anno: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the unique and unruly humor of Dota 2 satirist Pyrion Flax.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Driftwood: 橫放在沙灘旁的勝利之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Driftwood: Upon a sandy shore lie the tools of victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Touch: 寒冬之中亦有寒冰的智慧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Touch: There is cold wisdom in the core of winter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malice: 有些事能賜與你勇氣，就好比是怨恨的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malice: Few things confer courage like the power of malice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nature: 在綠意盎然的春天裡，茁壯出根深蒂固的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nature: In the verdant spring grows deep-rooted strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Powered_Star: 力量才是致勝之道。此物品包含 Star Seires 第 6 賽季的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Powered_Star:
With power comes victory.
	
	Included with Star Series Season VI pass..
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stone_Ruin: 謹防久經歲月的混沌力量。包含於 Premier League 第 5 賽季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stone_Ruin:
Beware the chaos of ages past.
	
	Included with Premier League Season 5 pass.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_Season_5: TPL 與 Norton 合作，以全新面貌迴歸。8 支來自歐洲的頂尖戰隊將爭奪 $15,000 總獎金超級盃賽的參賽資格。該門票包含 8 輪淘汰賽，巨石遺蹟 HUD 介面和邪惡魅魔進化套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_S: In cooperation with Norton, TPL returns with a new format. 8 best teams from Europe fight for entry to the $15,000 SuperCup by contesting each other in smaller cups. This ticket grants you entry to a total of 8 knockout tournaments, Stone Ruin HUD and the Wicked Succubus evolving set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Premier_League_Season_5__ADMIN: Premier League 第 5 賽季 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_Season_5__: TPL 與 Norton 合作，以全新面貌迴歸。8 支來自歐洲的頂尖戰隊將爭奪 $15,000 總獎金超級盃賽的參賽資格。該門票包含 8 輪淘汰賽，巨石遺蹟 HUD 介面和邪惡魅魔進化套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_S: In cooperation with Norton, TPL returns with a new format. 8 best teams from Europe fight for entry to the $15,000 SuperCup by contesting each other in smaller cups. This ticket grants you entry to a total of 8 knockout tournaments, Stone Ruin HUD and the Wicked Succubus evolving set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Summer_2013: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 夏季賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Summer_2: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 夏季賽將集結全世界的隊伍共同爭奪 $39,000 總獎金。知名戰隊及挑戰者將參加 4 個盃賽，小組賽及最終總決賽 - TobiWan 及其他解說將為您帶來大量精彩賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One: The RaidCall EMS One Summer 2013 features teams from all over the world in a battle for 39,000 US dollars in prize money. Established teams and challengers meet in four cups, followed by group stage playoffs and live event finals - giving you dozens of great matches casted by TobiWan and others.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Summer_2013__: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 夏季賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: 2013 年 RaidCall EMS One 夏季賽將集結全世界的隊伍共同爭奪 $39,000 總獎金。知名戰隊及挑戰者將參加 4 個盃賽，小組賽及最終總決賽 - TobiWan 及其他解說將為您帶來大量精彩賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall EMS One Summer 2013 features teams from all over the world in a battle for 39,000 US dollars in prize money. Established teams and challengers meet in four cups, followed by group stage playoffs and live event finals - giving you dozens of great matches casted by TobiWan and others.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Season_VI: 以 v1lat 和 TobiWan 為首的解說將為您帶來 4 種不同語言的實況直播。總獎金高達 $22,500，打造最佳的 StarSeries 聯賽！Star Series 的主要賽事是在烏克蘭基輔的 Cyber​​Sport Arena 舉辦的區域連線總決賽。內含獨家的 Starladder HUD 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Seaso: Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $22,500 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Starladder HUD Skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_StarSeries_Season_VI__ADMIN: StarSeries 第 4 賽季 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeries_Season: 以 v1lat 和 TobiWan 為首的解說將為您帶來 4 種不同語言的實況直播。總獎金高達 $22,500，打造最佳的 StarSeries 聯賽！Star Series 的主要賽事是在烏克蘭基輔的 Cyber​​Sport Arena 舉辦的區域連線總決賽。內含獨家的 Starladder HUD 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeri: Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $22,500 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Starladder HUD Skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloomblade: 請時刻留心幽暗之地，那是刺客永恒的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloomblade: Beware the gloom, for it is ever the friend an assassin's ally.
Tokens.DOTA_WearableType_International_HUD_Skin: 國際錦標賽 HUD 介面造型
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Valor: 勇氣帶來了榮譽。榮譽帶來了不朽
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Valor: With courage comes glory. With glory comes immortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Wings: 生出這對翅膀，蛻化就算完成了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Wing: With these wings, your final transformation is complete.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2L_Steambear: 在杜魯徳的草原之上，風暴巫師以馴服馱獸而為人所知。但是面對好鬥的蒸汽熊，也只有風暴巫師膽敢嘗試。年輕的小熊麥斯米蘭至今沒有夥伴同行，所以對於風暴巫師來說，馴養過程並不順利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2L_Steambear: High on the steppes of Druud, stormcrafters are known to press beasts of burden into their service.  Rare though is the stormcrafter who dares try and control the pugnacious steambear.  That the young bear Maximilian now travels unaccompanied is proof that the domestication process did not go well.  For the stormcrafter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Succubus_Set: 此組合包內含痛苦女王「邪惡魅魔」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Succubus_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Wicked Succubus' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 3 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Se: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽（D2L）是為期 7 週的 Dota 2 線上聯賽，集結了西區頂尖的 8 支隊伍共同爭奪本賽季 $10,000 獎金和參加 DreamHack Valencia 現場賽的資格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_: The RaidCall Dota 2 League (D2L) is a 7-week online Dota 2 league featuring the top eight Dota 2 teams in the West battling it out for a portion of the $10,000 seasonal cash prize and the opportunity of competing live at DreamHack Valencia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽第 3 賽季 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_Dota_2_L: RaidCall Dota 2 聯賽（D2L）是為期 7 週的 Dota 2 線上聯賽，集結了西區頂尖的 8 支隊伍共同爭奪本賽季 $10,000 獎金和參加 DreamHack Valencia 現場賽的資格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall Dota 2 League (D2L) is a 7-week online Dota 2 league featuring the top eight Dota 2 teams in the West battling it out for a portion of the $10,000 seasonal cash prize and the opportunity of competing live at DreamHack Valencia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup: Dota 2 加拿大盃即將迴歸，集結衛冕冠軍 WAND 和亞軍 AWT Happen？進行最終角逐。由 Kawa、NYJohn 等人為您帶來實況解說！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Dota_League: 美洲 DOTA 聯賽集結了來自北美及南美的頂尖隊伍在為期一月半的聯賽中爭奪 $10,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Dota_Le: AMERICAN DOTA LEAGUE features the best teams in North and South America competing for $10,000 in a month and a half long league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_American_Dota_League__ADMIN: 美洲 Dota 聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_American_Dota_Lea: 美洲 DOTA 聯賽集結了來自北美及南美的頂尖隊伍在為期一月半的聯賽中爭奪 $10,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_American: AMERICAN DOTA LEAGUE features the best teams in North and South America competing for $10,000 in a month and a half long league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Beautiful_Snowangel: 冰晶聖女畫出了美麗雪天使！你最好相信她就是雪天使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Beautiful_: Crystal Maiden makes a snowangel!  You better believe it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Get_Burned: 莉娜的公共服務通告...『熱心！熱情！熱辣！』。已經警告過你了哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Get_Burned: Lina's Public Service Announcement ... \"Hot Hot Hot!\".  You have been warned!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore: 他只是想再聽她唱一首歌。這把匕首是送給他的禮物，誰不讓她唱歌，他就讓誰永遠閉嘴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore: He only wanted to hear her song one more time. The dagger was gifted to him, and he keeps it with him to silence those who wish to silence her song.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Sharp_Blade: 萬萬沒想到，劍聖磨劍是通過砍殺敵人！小心！真的很鋒利！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Sharp_Blad: Watch as Juggernaut sharpens his blade by cutting down his foes!  Watch out!  That's a Sharp Blade!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt__Shake_Your_Money_M: 敵人不敢看別處，所以只能看著帕吉搖晃『搖錢樹』！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt__Shake_You: Watch as Pudge \"Shakes his Money Maker\" while his foes cannot look away!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato:
堅決果敢，勇往直前，聰慧至極，即使強大的羅煞也無法阻止靈貓。

靈貓隨著您觀賞 Beyond The Summit 團隊實況解說賽事可進行升級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato:
Fiercely determined, ever courageous, and always clever, not even the mighty Roshan may frighten El Gato from his mission.

El Gato will level up as you watch games that include casters from the Beyond The Summit team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Itsy: 她還不夠玲瓏，你說呢？她龐大的兄弟姐妹們正晃動下顎，一對對眼睛注視著她渺小的身軀。爲了證明她的價值，這隻小蜘蛛快馬加鞭為您服務，用蛛網溫暖你的心房！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Itsy: Not so itsy, say you? Her enormous elder siblings click their mandibles and roll their many eyes at their sister's puny proportions. To prove her worth, this fleet-footed spiderling will eagerly scuttle to your service and weave her web around your heart!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_League_Seaso: G-1 冠軍聯賽第 5 賽季將舉行網路資格賽，選拔頂尖的西方隊伍並提供往返機票參加中國的區域網路決賽，與 iG、LGD、DK 和 Orange 等隊伍正面較量。亞洲區資格賽也將通過資格賽爭奪區域網路決賽的資格。總獎金將超過上賽季的 $53,000。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_Lea: The Fifth Season of the G-1 Championship league will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool will exceed last season's $53,000.

Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Axe: 寒鐵部落的鐵匠技藝讓許多敵人陷入了困境。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: The blacksmithing skill of the Frostiron Tribe has kept many a foe at bay.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Cape: 尤米爾在北方荒原上遊蕩時，曾在寒冰部落停留。離開時他接受了禮物作爲紀念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: As Ymir wandered the great northern wilderness, he spent time among the Frostiron Tribe.  Upon his departure, he was given gifts to remember them by.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Fist: 這雙手套輕巧耐用，送給尤米爾希望他能安全歸來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Deceptively light yet incredibly durable, this glove was gifted to Tusk with the hope that it might ensure Ymir's safe return.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Helm: 身爲北方大海的居民，寒鐵部落是一個有着悠久歷史的民族。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Denizens of the northern sea, the Frostiron Tribe are a proud people with a rich history.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Set: 此組合包內含圖斯克「寒鐵雄風」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Frostiron Raider' set for Tusk:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Shield: 在寒鐵部落停留期間，尤米爾曾經嘗試打造裝甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: During his stay with the Frostiron Tribe, Ymir tried his hand at crafting armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Tusks: 寒鐵部落的巧匠，金屬大師，爲尤米爾打造了一堆鋼鐵長牙，這是他勇氣的象徵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Masters of metals, the artisans of the Frostiron Tribe crafted steel tusks for Ymir as a symbol of his bravery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarab_Pendant_of_the_Pri: 這個聖物可不是假的，有朝一日蘊含在內的聖甲蟲將會破殼而出，展出它金黃的翅膀飛翔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarab_Pendant_o: This is no false idol, but an idol true, from which the sacred scarab of the faith may one day spread its golden wings and fly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Incandescent_: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Inca: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alienware_Cup__2013_Seaso: Na'Vi 與其他 9 支國際錦標賽東區隊伍共同爭奪 $60,000 總獎金。共計 58 - 78 場精彩比賽，將由 Beyond The Summit 及嘉賓共同為您呈現。賽事由 Alienware 和 Mastercard 贊助，DPM Interactive 主辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alienware_Cup__2: Na`Vi joins all nine TI3 East teams to compete for a share of the USD 60,000 prize pool. The 58-78 premium games will be casted by Beyond The Summit and special guests. Sponsored by Alienware and Mastercard. Organized by DPM Interactive.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurys_Guardian: 先兆面紗後的神秘森林中，守衛正在深處保護他的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurys_Guardian: From deep within the mystic woods behind the veil of augury, the guardian watches over and protects its allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brawlers_Hard_Helm: 他向來都是如此頑強，這頂硬甲頭盔將讓他更加不屈不撓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brawlers_Hard_He: He always was a hard-head. Now he's even harder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24: CDEC 是由中國玩家組成的內戰聯賽。每天三場最佳比賽將進行直播，每週還將評選十佳玩家。通過這種特殊的形式您將有機會看到各職業玩家齊聚一堂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24: CDEC is an in house league consisting if the best Chinese players. Each day the top three games will be broadcasted. There will also be a top 10 players match each week. This is a unique format that allows you to see different pro players working together.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24__ADMIN: CDEC 是由中國玩家組成的內戰聯賽。每天三場最佳比賽將進行直播，每週還將評選十佳玩家。通過這種特殊的形式您將有機會看到各職業玩家齊聚一堂。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Armpl: 深穴守衛的封印就雕刻在腕口之上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: The sigil of the Deep Vault Guardians is engraved upon the cuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Headf: 看到這對閃耀的鰭，很少有人膽敢挑戰深穴守衛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: With fins flared, few would dare challenge a guardian of the Deep Vault for his charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Spine: 這些背鰭是對同族的身分認證，對敵人的警告。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: A guardian's spinal display serves as an identifier to his peers, and a warning to his foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Tride: 深海生物中鮮有人能夠舉起這件沉重的武器，更別說是揮舞起來了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: Few creatures of the deep are able to heft such a heavy weapon, let alone weild it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Dota_2: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 錦標賽將在 6 月 15 - 17 日全球最大電子盛會 DreamHack 夏季賽舉行。16 支戰隊將共同爭奪 300,000 克朗的總獎金。該錦標賽由 ASUS ROG 和 Plantronics GameCom 鼎力支持。Draskyl 和 Ayesee 全程直播。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_R: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 Tournament is run on the 15-17th of June at DreamHack Summer 2013, the world's largest Digitial Festival. 16 teams will fight for 300 000 SEK. The tournament is supported by ASUS ROG and Plantronics GameCom. Casted by Draskyl and Ayesee.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Dota_2: 萬衆矚目的 AMD Premier League 第二賽季已經迴歸。觀賞 Orange、Zenith、Mufc 和 更多來自東南亞的優秀戰隊共同爭奪 $5,000 總獎金。DotaTalk 將為您帶來為期一個月的激烈賽事，AMD 提供硬體支援。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_R: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 Tournament is run on the 15-17th of June at DreamHack Summer 2013, the world's largest Digitial Festival. 16 teams will fight for 300 000 SEK. The tournament is supported by ASUS ROG and Plantronics GameCom. Casted by Draskyl and Ayesee.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Sacrif: It is an honor to be sacrificed on Phantom Assassin's scythe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywrath_Sentinel: 也許她永遠不能回到蒼白之巢的山巔，但仙德爾莎需要之時總有盟友伸出援手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywrath_Sentine: Although she may never reach the lofty hights of the Ghastly Eyrie again, Shendelzare still has allies that will grant her assistance when she requires it.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch the top 16 teams from around the world compete in The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Peacebringer: 他帶來和平，並畢生守護。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Peacebringer: He brings the peace, and then he keeps it.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_: 萬衆矚目的 AMD Premier League 第二賽季已經迴歸。觀賞 Orange、Zenith、Mufc 和 更多來自東南亞的優秀戰隊共同爭奪 $5,000 總獎金。DotaTalk 將為您帶來為期一個月的激烈賽事，AMD提供硬體支持。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: The highly anticipated AMD Premier League Season Two is back. Watch as SEA's finest teams; Orange, Zenith, Mufc, Vici Gaming and more compete for a total prize pool of $5000. This one month of intense action will be brought to you by DotaTalk and powered by AMD.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Corsair_Summer_20: Corsair 與 GosuGamers 聯合舉辦 2013 年夏季聯賽，16 支隊伍將爭奪 $10,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Corsair_: Corsair hosts Summer Tournament 2013 together with GosuGamers, where sixteen teams will compete for the total of $10,000 USD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_June_and_Jul: 技嘉 E-Sports 錦標賽由 Gigabyte 贊助，DotaTalk 主辦。勝出 GMPGL 資格賽的 8 支東南亞隊伍將會互相比拼，爭奪為數 $1500 的現金獎金。贏家將獲得與中國的頂尖隊伍一戰和贏得 $1500 獎金的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Jun: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Starter_Lea: Nexon 韓國將首度為您呈現開幕大賽 Nexon 啟動大賽（NSL），GOM TV 為您帶來實況直播。NSL 將集合 8 支資格賽選拔戰隊共同爭奪 2300 萬韓元的總獎金。獲勝隊伍將獲得免費往返第 3 屆國際錦標賽的獎勵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_St: Nexon Korea presents its inaugural Nexon Starter League (NSL), brought to you live by GOM TV. NSL will feature the top 8 teams advanced from Open Qualifier as they compete for a prize pool of KRW 23 million cash. The winning team will also be rewarded with an all-expenses-paid trip to TI3.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Defense_Seaso: The Defense 即將進入第 4 賽季，由贊助商 EIZO 提供 $25,000 總獎金。觀賞全球的 20 支頂尖戰隊在為期 2 個月的賽事中為大家呈現精彩比賽。門票中包含變色龍蒙克，一隻隨著您的陣營變換色彩的勇敢信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Defe: The Defense is going into its fourth season, powered by EIZO and offering USD 25,000 prize money. Watch 20 of the best international teams compete in a two-month long spree of action packed high-class games. Ticket holders will also recieve Munk the Melyon, a fearless courier that adapts to the players current faction.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shagbark: 核桃樹精靈是森林中最值得信賴的密友，遞送的快樂就能讓它維持生計。它喜歡祕密和寶藏，它的願望是你永遠農兵無所顧慮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shagbark: Shagbark is a trusty forest familiar who lives for the thrill of delivery. Fond of secrets and artifacts, he hopes you'll never finish farming.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_The_Magic_Ends_Here: 展示粗鄙魔法應得的下場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_The_Magic_: Show their foul sorcery the regard it deserves.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_What_did_y: Did your enemy make a sound?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Liquid: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Liquid: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對 Alliance 隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在 Valve 所支援的比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。Alliance 旗幟能夠與其他 Alliance 旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance: Show your support for Team Alliance by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Team Alliance pennants can be combined with other Team Alliance pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Covenant_Pack: 此組合包內含鮮血契約之刃的主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Covenant_P: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Blood Covenant Blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_of_the_Ancesto: 這塊打炫著明亮感激之情的石頭是給予那些曾經吟唱著詩詞且召集同伴一同開始屬於他們的聖戰的人們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_of_th: For those who came before and sang the word, gathering friends as they began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodstone_of_the: 這塊打炫著明亮感激之情的石頭是給予那些曾經吟唱著詩詞且召集同伴一同開始屬於他們的聖戰的人們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodsto: For those who came before and sang the word and gathering friends began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodstone_of_the: 這塊打炫著明亮感激之情的石頭是給予那些曾經吟唱著詩詞且召集同伴一同開始屬於他們的聖戰的人們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodsto: For those who came before and sang the word and gathering friends began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_Grid_Announcer_Pa: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為《防禦陣型》中樂觀聰慧的弗萊徹將軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_Grid_Ann: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the upbeat wisdom of Defense Grid's very own General Fletcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Impending_Transgressions_: 內含末日使者「迫近僭越」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Impending_Transg: Contains all of the items in the 'Impending Transgressions' set for Doom:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LGDs_Golden_Skipper: 金色飛魚的傳說流傳已久，卻很少有人親眼目睹。千百年來在公海的海員中流傳著一個故事，講的是一種生物得可愛程度前無古人後無來者。眼前這隻也許就是那罕見的動物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LGDs_Golden_Skip: The Golden Skipper is a species long-rumored to exist, but rarely seen in the wild.  Among sailors of the high seas, there have been tales passed down through the centuries of a creature whose cuteness is legend, and whose adorableness rises to a level that defies mortal understanding.  It can only be assumed that this is one such rare beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Set: 包含克林克茲「失落群山」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Lost Hills' set for Clinkz:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Luminary_of_the_Dreadful_: 包含變體精靈「恐懼深淵」的光體套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Luminary_of_the_: Includes all of the items in the 'Luminary of the Dreadful Abyss' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Defense_Grid: 該物品會將預設的連殺語音替換為《防禦陣型》中樂觀聰慧的弗萊徹將軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Defens: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the upbeat wisdom of Defense Grid's very own General Fletcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mok: 史羅姆王國隕落時逃離動物園的兇猛野獸之一，這隻兇猛的山魈將摩克作為自己的名字，以為居民預警的呼號是預報它的到來。現在他將頑皮的天性用於正途，跋山涉水穿越險境只爲將你所需帶到眼前。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mok: One of the wildest beasts of the escaped menagerie that ran amok during the fall of Slom, this wily mandrill took Mok for his name, thinking the citizenry's cries of warning were a herald of his arrival.  Now he puts his mischievous nature to good use, wading into any chaotic situation in order to bring you what you need.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Key: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>寶藏箱</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Ke: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Stash: 聲名狼藉的竊賊西斯爾據說遺失了一箱含有一堆掠奪品的貯藏箱！您需要<font color='#9da1a9'>西斯爾是盛夏鑰匙</font>才能開啟寶箱。您可以前往 DOTA 2 商店找到這把鑰匙。注意！在 <font color='#9da1a9'>2013 年 9 月 16 日</font>之後，寶箱會化為毫無用處的塵土。該寶箱可能包含其中一項神秘的全新物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_St: That disreputable scoundrel Quirt has lost a chest of plundered loot! You will need <font color='#9da1a9'>Quirt's Summer Key</font> to open the chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Beware! At the end of <font color='#9da1a9'>September 16, 2013</font> this chest will crumble into useless dust. This chest contains one of several mysterious new items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reaper_Set: 包含斧王「紅霧死神」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reaper_: Includes all of the items in the 'Red Mist Reaper' set for Axe:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nomad_Protector_Set: 內含敵法僧「遊民守衛」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nomad_Protec: Includes all of the items in 'The Nomad Protector' set for Anti-Mage:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrath_of_the_Blood_Covena: 包含血魔「鮮血契約之刃」套裝的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrath_of_the_Blo: Includes all of the items in the 'Wrath of the Blood Covenant' set for Bloodseeker:  It is time for blood.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_aghanims_basher: 還有什麽比阿哈利姆神杖更厲害？當然是這個。這個厲害多了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_aghanims_basher: What could be better than an Aghanims scepter?  This.  This is better.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_dragon_scale: 以利劍維生，以龍之意志而死！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_dragon_scale: Live by the sword, die by the dragon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_evildoer: 行善之名隨我們一起入土，奸佞之名卻久不能忘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_evildoer: The good we do dies with us, while our evils echo long after.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_flying_desolation: 死亡總在毫無防備之時來臨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_flying_desolatio: Death flies when you're having fun.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_wavecutter: 這背鰭會割裂水流，就想它的主人割裂你的喉嚨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_wavecutter: This fin will slice the water like its owner's blade will slice your throat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Flamestitched_Suitings_Wrap_an: 炎紉衣料掛飾與汽油彈
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Luminary_of_the_Dread: Luminary of the Dreadful Abyss Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Wrath_of_the_Blood_Co: Wrath of the Blood Covenant Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Batalha_Gamer__ADMIN: 巴塔利亞大賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bite_of_the_Slithereen_Knight_: 魚人騎士之勢- 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bite_of_the_Slitheree: Bite of the Slithereen Knight - Off-Hand
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blue_Stone_Shoulder_o: Blue Stone Shoulder of the Voyager
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Chaos_Knights_Armlet_of_Mordig: 混沌騎士的莫爾迪基安臂章
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Claddish_Voyagers_Elegant_Paul: 鐵帆遠航者的優雅肩甲
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Claddish_Voyagers_True_North: 鐵帆遠航者的極北海刀
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow: 在振顫群島的首戰之中，昆卡擊敗了敵方艦長，這船首也被呈上來作為貢物。統帥艦首是昆卡最引以為傲的戰利品，也是與遠航大師最般配的帽子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow: Taken as tribute from the head of a defeated captain after the first battle of Trembling isles, the Admiral's Prow is one of Kunkka's proudest war trophies, and a hat worthy of a master sailor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida: 在萊卡希達的綠蠅領地經過幾個世紀的繁衍生息，寄生在樹精的枝幹上，汲取這些上古生物的養料。在巢穴中有一隻蚜蟲，靈活的身手及好奇的天性使它格外與衆不同。一天夜裡，他離開了領地，前去追尋自己的命運，他堅信自己超凡的速度和無私的奉獻精神會讓他在戰場上大顯身手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaci: The greenfly colony of Lecaciida had lived and thrived for centuries, inhabiting the trunks of Treants and nourishing themselves on the sap of those ageless giants. Among the hive was a young greenfly named Alphid who had distinguished himself through his agility, swiftness, and curious nature. One night, he left the colony and set out to find his own destiny, convinced that his exceptional speed and dedication could be put to good use on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune: 神聖的雙手刻下神聖的印記。為物品鑲嵌此神符以完成簽名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune: A sacred mark from hallowed hands. Socket this into an item to autograph it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Batalha_Gamer: 巴塔利亞大賽（BG）將集結來自巴西的 16 支頂尖戰隊共同爭奪 2,800 雷亞爾的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Batalha_Gamer: The Battle Gamer (BG) is a tournament that features 16 of the best Brazilian teams fighting for a prize of R $ 2,800.00.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BladeBiter: 有如鯊魚牙齒般銳利，宛如覆鋼般堅硬，巨螯之劍對任何水手來說都是價值不斐的戰爭利器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BladeBiter: Sharp as shark's teeth, and strong as Claddish steel, the great sword Bladebiter is an asset to any sailor facing battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick: 從前那個奸詐的賭徒現在正慢慢洗心革面，他擔負起信使的職責，只爲賺幾個金幣，還不忘帶上心愛的手杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick: A former gambler and shyster, the antics of Blotto were once known in every watering hole, gambling den and sleaze pit from here to Slom.  Now on the slow path to reform, he's taken up courier duties to con a bit of extra coin and brought his trusty Stick along for the ride!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonds_of_Vincere_Set: 此組合包內含痛苦女王「勝利之縛」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonds_of_Vincere: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bonds of Vincere' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Broken_Shackles: 低估食人魔的力量是極其不明智的，甚至是極其危險的！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Broken_Shackles: It is unwise, and often quite fatal, to underestimate an ogre's strength!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chaos_Knights_Armlet_of_M: 力量來自犧牲。混沌源於力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chaos_Knights_Ar: From sacrifice comes power.  From power flows chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Boreal_Watch: 能抵禦北極刺骨寒風的三層厚重皮毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Bor: Three layers of cloth and fur help to guard against the northern winds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Batalha_Gamer: 巴塔利亞大賽（BG）將集結來自巴西的 16 支頂尖戰隊共同爭奪 2,800 雷亞爾的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Batalha_: The Battle Gamer (BG) is a tournament that features 16 of the best Brazilian teams fighting for a prize of R $ 2,800.00
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electronic_Sports: 2013 年電子競技世界盃將在 8 月至 10 月舉行區域網路選拔錦標賽，並於 2013 年 10 月 30 日至 11 月 3 日在巴黎舉行總決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electron: The Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 features regional online qualifying tournaments from May to September, culminating with the Grand Final tournament in Paris from October 30 to November 3, 2013.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Corruptor: 腐化巨斧染上腐爛之力後，必須要供給新鮮血肉，否則斧王將會染上難以治愈的爛瘡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Corruptor: Infused with pustulent power, Corruptor must feed on flesh or else Axe will suffer a troubling rash no apothecary's salves can soothe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Boreal_Watch: 能讓巡守人掩飾面容以防洩漏身分的面罩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Bore: For those who wish their face never to be seen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Craniomancer: 圓滾滾的腦袋惹人厭，圓滾滾的後背更是如此。黑暗賢者現在有著全宇宙最完美的頭。在智慧與意志的交鋒中，尖尖的腦袋總能笑到最后。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Craniomancer: A round head is an abomination.  So too, a round back.  Dark Seer now sports the cranium most ideal in all the universe.  In a battle of wits and wills, the pointiest head will often prevaile.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Vincere: 女王戴上了她的噩夢之冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Vincere: The Queen wears her nightmare crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Initio: 準備開始了？想要找一個比水晶水晶誘源之杖更好的觸發器實在是太困難了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Init: Care to start something? You would be hard-pressed to find a better initiator than the Crystalline Initio!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deathripper:
黑魔法與異端科學結合的恐怖產物，殘暴的死亡撕裂者是他主人的福祉，是其他人的夢魘。

死亡撕裂者來自鋼鐵王國，是不死國克利克斯的一個致命生物，正如史詩級桌面遊戲《戰爭機器》。請訪問 www.privateerpress.com 以獲取更多《戰爭機器》的諮詢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deathripper:
A terrifying combination of dark magic and science-gone-wrong, the bestial Deathripper is a boon to its master and a nightmare to all others.

Hailing from the Iron Kingdoms, the Deathripper is a deadly creation of the undead nation of Cryx, as seen in the epic tabletop miniatures game, WARMACHINE. For more information on WARMACHINE, visit www.privateerpress.com
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Set: 包含歿境毀滅者「鍛造龍獸」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Se: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragon Forged' set for Outworld Devourer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dressings_of_the_First_Li: 此組合包內含光之守衛「破曉之熹戰服」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dressings_of_the: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dressings of the First Light' set for Keeper of the Light:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESWC_Diamond: 包含在 2013 年電子競技世界盃門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESWC_Diamond: Included with the Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 league pass.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sports_World_C: 2013 年電子競技世界盃將在 8 月至 10 月舉行區域網路選拔錦標賽，並於 2013 年 10 月 30 日至 11 月 3 日在巴黎舉行總決賽。門票內含 ESWC 奪目鑽石 HUD 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sport:
The Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 features regional online qualifying tournaments from August to October 2013, culminating with the Grand Final tournament in Paris from October 30 to November 3, 2013.
	The ticket comes with the ESWC Diamond HUD
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Embers_of_Endless_Havoc_S: 包含混沌騎士「無盡浩劫之燼」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Embers_of_Endles: Includes all of the items in the 'Embers of Endless Havoc' set for Chaos Knight:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Axe: 教會大分裂之後，黑暗騎士便在不斷搜尋。他現在手握着黑鋼不斷前行——一把在星辰間的混沌中鍛鑄的熵之戰斧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Axe: Since the moment of the great schism, the dark rider has hunted.  He now rides with blackened iron in his fist--a battle axe of entropy forged in the chaos between the stars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Battlegear_of_th: 包含混沌騎士「戰爭騎士的熵戰甲」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Battleg: Includes all of the items in the 'Entropic Battlegear of Warrider' set for Chaos Knight:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Helmet: 在與凡人視界相距甚遠的位面鑄造而成，熵之盔只有黑暗騎士方可佩戴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Helmet: Forged in a plane far upstream of the mortal world, the entropic helm can be worn only by the dark horseman.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shield: 黑暗騎士揮舞着盾與斧，留下一片混沌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shield: By shield and blade, the dark horseman bequeaths chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shoulderpads: 最爲黑暗的鎧甲。騎士所到之處，屍橫遍野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shoulde: Knight in Blackest armor.  Where the horsemen ride, death shall follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ernest_Do_of_the_Voyager: 世界上只有三種人不蓄鬚：小孩，女人，還有潮汐獵人！顯然我哪個都不是！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ernest_Do_of_the: There are three kinds of people that go around beardless: boys, women and amphibians! And I am emphatically none of these things!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_the_Scorching_: 此組合包內含莉娜「熱情公主的時尚」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_the_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Fashion of the Scorching Princess' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_FezzleFeez_the_Magic_Carp: 菲茲和其他鐵匠惡魔一樣，連打開魔法飛毯的空地都沒有，所以只能在半空中展開魔毯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_FezzleFeez_the_M: Fezzle-Feez, like most smeevils, has no floor on which to spread his magic carpet, therefore he unrolls it in mid-air.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garrad_Drywiz_and_Galacta: 這個卑鄙的二人組的每個姿勢都透露著邪惡的不良企圖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garrad_Drywiz_an: Evil and ill intention are obvious in every gesture of this despicable duo.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the_Boreal_W: 這雙手套曾是一位射箭大師的東西。據說上頭奇特的符文大大地增進了穿戴者在戰鬥期間的準頭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the: A great archer once wore these magical gloves.  It is said that the strange runes there inscribed greatly improve the wearer's accuracy in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Instruments_of_the_Claddi: 包含昆卡「鐵帆遠航者」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Instruments_of_t: Includes all of the items in the 'Instruments of the Claddish Voyager' set for Kunkka:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Treasure_Ke: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>冠軍的珍品寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Tr: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Champions</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legplates_of_the_Boreal_W: 既輕巧又耐用，這對富有彈性的護脛已通過時間和累人戰鬥的考驗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legplates_of_the: Lightweight and durable, these resilient legplates have stood the test of time, and grueling battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Longbow_of_the_Boreal_Wat: 唯有適應冰霜的人才能拉得動凍原行者的弓弦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Longbow_of_the_B: Only those attuned to frost may pull back the bowstring of the Tundra Walker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_the_Chosen: 在地獄聖泉的原始迷霧之中鑄造的武器只有聖泉選中的守護者才能使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_the_Chos: Weapons forged in the primal mists of the Font of Avernus may only be wielded by those the Font has chosen to defend it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightblades_of_the_Hypnos: 夜神為刺客綱之下的成員。而雖然在此類別下夜神乃隻身一人無親無嗣，但將要小心瀕臨絕種卻是你。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightblades_of_t: Nyx is a member of the assassin caste.  The caste of one.  Soon you will be a caste of none.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nyx_Dagon: 司夜女神對她恩澤的刺客施以祝福，使他經常會獲得奇特的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nyx_Dagon: The blessings of Nyx upon her anointed assassins oft bring with it strange energies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Osky_the_Ottragon: 『敖斯基！敖斯基！多好的孩子啊！』他玩耍嬉戲，但好動的外表下卻掩藏著悲傷。他思念著兄弟姐妹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Osky_the_Ottrago: \"Osky! Osky! What a good boy!\" He capers and sports, but underneath the playful exterior is an abiding sadness. He misses his siblings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Boreal_W: 這對肩甲是由北方的卓爾人用冰谷中的礦石製成的，上頭有著巡守隊「北風之查」的標誌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: Forged by the Northern Drow from the ore of the chasm, these pauldrons bear the mark of the Boreal Watch.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prisoners_Anchor: 他們說帶上這個你就逃不掉了，那就大錯特錯了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prisoners_Anchor: They say you won't go far with one of these. They're wrong.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Boreal_Watc: 尾部冠有極地大鳥的羽毛，並放入藍心冰川洗禮，這些箭矢據說有著能使目標凍心的威力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Bo: Fluted with the plumes of the great arctic arcoch, and bathed in the runoff of the blueheart glacier, these arrows are said to freeze targets to the core.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Claive: 在它鋒利到難以置信之際，難以揣測的聖輝之刃意味著只有極少數的對手可以存活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Claive: While known as much for its incredible sharpness, the unpredictable structure of Radiant Ore means that very few such blades survive their first encounter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Screeauks_Talon: 斯奎奧克之爪由一位長著雙翼的法師打造，在陰影中傾盡全力，沖淡悲傷，用傾慕者的黯然之淚淬煉而成。可惜的是她餘下半生都在用這武器獵殺他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Screeauks_Talon: Scree'auk's Talon was fashioned by a certain winged Mage, forged from shades of unrequited passion, tempered in grief, and quenched in the secret tears of her admirer. More's the pity that she uses it now, approximately half the time, to hunt him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard: 在黑暗的角落，已經準備好刺穿肉體以及榨乾靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard: A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard__OffHand: 在黑暗的角落，已經準備好刺穿肉體以及榨乾靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard__Off: A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshards: 在黑暗的角落，已經準備好刺穿肉體以及榨乾靈魂。包含力丸暗影碎片匕首的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshards:
A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
	
	Contains both of the Shadowshard Daggers for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spell_Surveyor: 法術搜查師一直都在尋找值得竊取的法術！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spell_Surveyor: The Spell Surveyor is always on the lookout for spells that might be stolen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Set: 此組合包內含力丸「塔林玄學」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Se: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Tahlin Occult' set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Fnatic: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Fnatic: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Atniws_Fury_Set: 包含德魯伊『雪熊之怒』套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Atniws_Fury_: Contains all of the items in \"The Atniw's Fury\" set for Lone Druid:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Might_and_Bi: Contains both the main and off-hand bladse of the Slithereen Knight.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Slithereen_K: This bundle contains all the items in the 'Slithereen Knight' set for Naga Siren:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Throes_of_Anguis: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Throes of Anguish' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinkbot: 厭倦了傳統的分送方式，修補匠開始著手研發更讓他感到可靠的東西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinkbot: Fed up with conventional delivery methods, Tinker set to work on something he felt was a bit more reliable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trapjaw_the_Boxhound: 在隔斷密室中有一個被遺棄許久的寶箱。許多探險者覬覦其中的寶藏，卻很少有人生還。只有一位活著回來，不斷重複著可怕的故事，一夥迷人的寶箱黃金四溢，卻將他的同夥一一吞噬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trapjaw_the_Boxh: Within the dungeons of the Severed Keep there sits a treasure hoard long abandoned. Many are the raiders who have set their sights on its wonders, yet only one has ever returned, telling grisly tales of a family of enchanted chests brimming with gold, devouring his friends.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Champions_201: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>國際錦標賽鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。此寶箱會在 2013 年 8 月 12 日當天消失。此寶箱開出的獨特信使為國際錦標賽期間限定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Cham: You will need an <font color='#9da1a9'>International Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. This chest will disappear at the end of August 12th, 2013. The unusual couriers that may drop from this chest can only be found during the International.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Luck_S: Includes all of the items in the 'Ancestral Luck' set for Ogre Magi:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Bladebreaker_: 包含力丸「碎刃者行會鎧甲」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Blad: Includes all of the items in the 'Arms of the Bladebreaker Order' set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_Armor_Hood: 頭巾改染成了碎刃者行會的代表顏色。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_Armor_Hood: The hood is colored to represent the Bladebreaker order.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Dagger: 根據碎刃者行會的守則，只有應得之人方該死。刀把上凹槽的目的就是用來擄獲敵人的刀劍，使其轉向對敵，藉此希望遭繳械的對手不戰而逃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Dag: According to the Bladebreaker Order, only those that must will die. The notches atop the hilt are meant to capture and turn enemy swords in the hopes that the disarmed opponent might flee instead of fight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Guards: 碎刃者行會的每個成員均在手腕上裝備了倒鉤，用來抓住敵人的刀劍並將其粉碎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Gua: Each member of the Bladebreaker Order is equipped with barbs along their wrist, meant to catch and shatter an enemy sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Offhand_Dagg: 根據碎刃者行會的守則，只有應得之人方該死。刀把上凹槽的目的就是用來擄獲敵人的刀劍，使其轉向對敵，藉此希望遭繳械的對手不戰而逃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Off: According to the Bladebreaker Order, only those that must will die. The notches atop the hilt are meant to capture and turn enemy swords in the hopes that the disarmed opponent might flee instead of fight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Spaulders: 碎刃者行會喜歡在肉搏戰中，將敵人繳械後再饒恕他們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Spa: The Bladebreaker Order favors disarming and sparing their opponents over direct combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Mistress_Set: 包含痛苦女王「鎖鏈妖婦」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Mistress: Includes all of the items in the 'Chained Mistress' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Insomnia49_Dota_2: Insomnia49 Dota 2 錦標賽將在英國泰爾福特的 Insomnia49 舉行。來自英國的頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪 £2,000 的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Insomnia: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of ÃÂ£2,000 or more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Pro_Leagu: Netolic 職業聯賽將帶著 $2,000 總獎金迴歸！本賽事將有八支選拔賽隊伍與八支受邀隊伍共同參與！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: Netolic Pro League returns with a prize pool of $2000! The tournament will have eight qualified teams compete against eight invited teams!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Wraith_Set: Includes all of the items in the \"Dark Wraith\" set for Phantom Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Haul: 包含斯拉克「深海守望者」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Haul: Includes all of the items in the 'Deep Warden Haul' set for Slark:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Arms: 在贈予變體精靈的厚禮之中，這些精良的鎧甲能將有形的身體和無形的靈魂分割開來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Among the greatest of gifts offered to Morphling, these fines that separate tangible body from ineffable soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Dorsal_Wi: 大海的首個厚禮便是迅捷，它被注入了這如同雙翼一般的背鰭中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: The sea's first gift was swiftness, imbued in these winglike dorsal fins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Fin: 這是深海巨蟒的一段尾巴？還是深海能量的結晶？即使是高深莫測的變體精靈也不敢妄自揣度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: A fragment of a sea-serpent's tail? A crystalline imprisonment of the sea's energy? Not even the enigmatic Morphling would hazard a guess.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Head: 頭頂勃勃雄心和與生俱來的深海智慧，變體精靈無比自豪地帶上這閃閃發光的鱗冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Crowned with ambition and innate knowledge of the depths, Morphling wears these shimmering scales with eldritch pride.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Shoulders: 誰會對這充滿力量的榮耀之禮說不呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Who can say no to such a glorious gift of strength and power?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_2_Cup: Insomnia49 Dota 2 錦標賽將在英國泰爾福特的 Insomnia49 舉行。來自英國的頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪 £2,000 的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of Â£2,000 or more!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malicious_Efflor: Includes all of the items in the \"Malicious Efflorescence\" set for Spectre:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_League_3rd_Ed: Netolic 職業聯賽將帶著 $2,000 總獎金迴歸！本賽事將有八支選拔賽隊伍與八支受邀隊伍共同參與！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_Leag: Netolic Pro League returns with a prize pool of $2000! The tournament will have eight qualified teams compete against eight invited teams!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ocula_the_Observer: 有這麼大顆的眼睛，沒有什麼是可以躲過大眼君的！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ocula_the_Observ: With an eye that big, there's no hiding from Ocula!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Euro_Cup: Steelseries 歐洲盃是一項開放賽事，最終的 2 支頂尖歐洲隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Euro: Steelseries Euro Cup is an open tournament where 2 of the top European teams compete for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Bl: 此組合包內含處刑學徒之刃的主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Gallows Understudy blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Set: 此組合包內含帕吉「剁肉達人」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Ol' Copper's Set' for Pudge:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Waldi_the_Faithful: 在銀夜森林的邊緣被遺棄後，瓦爾迪被一夥幽居的遊騎兵救下來，並被訓練加入戰鬥。瓦爾迪總是被敵人輕視，但他低調的外表下是他的堅韌不拔和忠誠不二。他是最強大戰士的可靠夥伴和信使，是真正的忠犬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Waldi_the_Faithf: Orphaned and abandoned on the fringes of the Nightsilver Woods, Waldi was rescued by a reclusive band of rangers and trained in the ways of war. Waldi is often underestimated by his foes, but his unassuming appearance belies his relentless tenacity and unfailing loyalty. He is a worthy courier and companion for the mightiest of warriors, a true dog of duty.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gift_of_the_Sea_Dorsa: Gift of the Sea Dorsal Wings

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_August_and_S: 技嘉電競聯賽將集結 8 支 GMPGL 東南亞資格賽的獲勝隊伍共同爭奪 $1,500 的現金大獎。勝者將與中國的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪額外 $1,500 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Aug: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament will have the winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia compete against one another for a cash prize of $1500. The winners then compete against the top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_NA_League_and: MLG 北美線上聯賽將集結北美最優秀的隊伍在福賽大學爭奪 $15,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_NA_L: The MLG North American Online League will have the best teams in North America vie for a chance to compete for $15,000 at Full Sail University.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: 在 RaidCall EMS One 秋季賽中，世界各地的頂尖戰隊將共同爭奪 $39,000 鉅額獎金。網路賽季之後 8 支頂尖戰隊將進行實況總決賽。此外，門票持有者將收到官方信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: In the Fall 2013 season of the RaidCall EMS One, the world's best teams compete for a massive prize fund of $39,000 US. After an online season, the eight best teams get to battle it out at the live event finals. Besides lots of matches, ticket holders also receive our official courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeries_Season: SLTV 的傳奇賽事 StarSeries 進入了新賽季！觀賞 120 場比賽和烏克蘭基輔 Cyber​​Sport Arena 區域網路總決賽，共同爭奪 $22,500 總獎金。首席解說 v1lat 和 TobiWan 全程直播。內含 Starladder 獨家拉比克進化套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeri: The new season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries is here! Watch 120 matches and the Kiev Cybersport Arena LAN finals where teams will compete for a total prize pool of $22,500. Caster headliners - v1lat & TobiWan. Includes an exclusive evolving Rubick set from Starladder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSeries_Euro_: Steelseries 歐洲盃是一項開放賽事，最終的 2 支頂尖歐洲隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSer: Steelseries Euro Cup is an open tournament where 2 of the top European teams compete for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_TriniDota_2_Leagu: 來自千里達及托貝哥的頂尖戰隊共同爭奪冠軍榮譽！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_TriniDot: The top teams of Trinidad and Tobago compete to be crowned champions!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_2_Cup__AD: Insomnia49 Dota 2 錦標賽將在英國泰爾福特的 Insomnia49 舉行。來自英國的頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪 £2,000 的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of £2,000 or more!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nibbles_the_Wartoise: 在無盡的歲月中經歷無盡的戰爭，即使最頑固的戰士也會尊敬和欽佩尼布斯的領導。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nibbles_the_Wart: A veteran of countless battles spanning untold centuries, Nibbles commands the respect and admiration of even the most hardened warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Fall_201: 在 RaidCall EMS One 秋季賽中，世界各地的頂尖戰隊將共同爭奪 $39,000 鉅額獎金。網路賽季後，8 支頂尖戰隊將進行實況總決賽。此外，門票持有者將收到官方信使！

內含 Star Series 聯賽第 7 賽季門票，及隨著觀看比賽不斷進化的拉比克「共振之顫」套裝：

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2013_National_Electronic_: 全國電子競技大賽（NEST）由國家體育總局及中國體育報業總社主辦。杭州娃哈哈有限公司贊助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2013_National_El: The National Electronic Sports Tournament (NEST) is hosted by the Center of National Sports and Chinese Sports Newspaper Agency. It is sponsored by the Hangzhou Wahaha Group CO.,LTD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_2013_National_Ele: 全國電子競技大賽（NEST）由國家體育總局及中國體育報業總社主辦。杭州娃哈哈有限公司贊助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_2013_Nat: The National Electronic Sports Tournament (NEST) is hosted by the Center of National Sports and Chinese Sports Newspaper Agency. It is sponsored by the Hangzhou Wahaha Group CO.,LTD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sponsorship: Nexon 贊助聯賽是前所未見的賽事，它將集結優秀戰隊，為它們提供爭取 Nexon 贊助的機會。NSL 預計於 9 月開賽，比賽將進行三個賽季並有著共計 3 億韓元（$267,153）的贊助獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sp: The Nexon Sponsorship League is the first of its kind and will feature the best teams vying for a chance to be sponsored by Nexon. Starting in Sept 2013, the NSL will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WPCACE_Dota_2_Lea: 世界電子競技職業精英賽（WPC）是一項全新的國際性賽事，由上海體育總會和景瑞地產集團合作舉辦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WPCACE_D: The World E-Sports Professional Classic is a brand new international event supported by Shanghai Sports Federation and Jingrui Properties Group.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlayTV_Dota_2_L: WePlay.TV 第二賽季迴歸了！今秋 20 支西區頂尖 Dota 隊伍將共同爭奪 $25,000 獎金，並進行 6 種以上語言解說，包括 Beyond the Summit 的英文解說。內含『賈斯汀狸伯』獨家信使和 WePlay.TV 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlayTV: WePlay.TV is back for Season 2! This Fall, twenty of Western Dota's finest will compete for $25,000 in cash prizes with commentary in 6+ languages, including English commentary by Beyond the Summit. Comes with exclusive \"Justin Beaver\" courier and WePlay.TV HUD in-game skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dim_Forest: 枝葉之中有什麽被人遺忘了？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dim_Forest: What lies forgotten among the leaves and logs?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League: 2013 年 9 月 28 日開始的 Nexon 贊助聯賽持續 3 個賽季，贊助獎金共計 3 億韓元（$270,000）。觀賞第 1 賽季的頂尖戰隊相互角逐吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi: Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million(USD 270k) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WPCACE_Dota_2_League: 世界電子競技職業精英賽（WPC）是一項全新的國際性賽事，由上海體育總會和景瑞地產集團合作舉辦。
