Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlayTV_Dota_2_League__S: WePlay.TV 第二賽季迴歸了！今秋 20 支西區頂尖 Dota 隊伍將共同爭奪 $25,000 獎金，並進行 6 種以上語言解說，包括 Beyond the Summit 的英文解說。內含靈木小飛機獨家信使和 WePlay.TV 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlayTV_Dota_2_: WePlay.TV is back for Season 2! This Fall, twenty of Western Dota's finest will compete for $25,000 in cash prizes with commentary in 6+ languages, including English commentary by Beyond the Summit. Comes with exclusive Woodchopper courier and WePlay.TV HUD in-game skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodchopper: 很多人都說，這只不過是木頭嘛！但是如果它是來自於上游的魔靈森林，那可大有不同！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodchopper: Most would say a log's a log, but when you live downstream from an enchanted forest a log can be so much more!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_Manta: A blade incised with runes that sow confusion and discord among the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_Manta__OffHand: 這把雕刻符文的寶刀可以在敵人之間散播困擾與紛爭。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arcs_of_Manta: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Arc of Manta.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arnabus_the_Fairy_Rabbit: 與其他不靠譜的兔類動物不同，阿娜巴斯為您遞送物品從不遲到。值得信賴！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arnabus_the_Fair: Unlike other, less dependable lagomorphs, Arnabus shall never be late with your items. Depend on it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Izoku: 劍聖不會為已經失去的東西落淚。他只在追求榮耀的征途中淨化自己，從未動搖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Izoku: Juggernaut never weeps for what he has lost. Implacable, he purges his grief in pursuit of honor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistblade: 在地獄聖泉中鑄造，充斥著黑暗的慾望。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistblade: Forged in the Font of Avernus, and filled with a dark thirst.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Treasure_2013: 此物品內含的所有物品均由 Polycount 社群的藝術家們所打造而成的。您可以觀看那些物品的設計及製作過程，並且學習如何自己打造物品，請洽：http://www.polycount.com
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Treasu: All of the items within were crafted by artists of the Polycount community.  You can view the process by which these items were designed, as well as learn to create your own items at http://www.polycount.com
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Rubiline_: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CyberGamer_Dota_2_Pro_League__: CyberGamer Dota 2 職業聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_GLaDOS: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為《傳送門》中處處挖苦、態度消極、嘲諷攻擊的 GLaDOS，科幻小說中最致命而無禮的人工智能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_GLaDOS: This item replaces the Default announcer with the withering sarcasm and passive-aggressive taunting of Portal's GLaDOS, science fiction's deadliest insult A.I.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pirate_Captain: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為酒醉的卑鄙海盜船長。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pirate: This item replaces the Default announcer with the drunken antics of a scurvy-ridden Pirate Captain.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tusk: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為聲線鏗鏘有力的圖斯卡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tusk: This item replaces the Default announcer with punchy lines from Tusk.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aperture_Science: They can't do it while you're watching.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armory_Expander: 使用此工具爲您的軍械庫新增 240 個空格。軍械庫擴充器爲消耗品，僅能使用一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armory_Expander: Use this tool to add 240 slots to your armory. Armory Expanders are consumable items that may only be used once.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_the_Verdant_Outc: 先知在森林間不斷穿行，他的鬍鬚也生長得同樣旺盛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_the_Ver: From grove to grove did the prophet wander, and so his beard grew as wild as he.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_the_StormStea: 此組合包內含剃刀「風暴竊賊之縛」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bindings of the Storm-Steaaler' set for Razor:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CyberGamer_Dota_2: 澳大利亞的頂尖職業隊伍共同爭奪 4000 澳元的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CyberGam: The top professional Australian teams fight for a $4000 AUD prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Perfect_World_Dot: 此賽事將提供多種具有指導意義的比賽，包括英雄、遊戲機制及戰術的知道。完美世界刀塔學院將為新手提供學習 Dota 的完美路線。此外，學院還將定期實況直播完美世界舉辦的精彩活動。歡迎 Dota 新手收看這場免費的寓教於賽的精彩表演。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Perfect_: Featuring various kinds of instructive matches including guides to heroes, mechanics and tactics. Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcast exciting activities held by Perfect World. Entrance to this tutorial-competition show is completely free for Dota players of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CyberGamer_Dota_2_Pro_Lea: 澳大利亞的頂尖職業隊伍共同爭奪 4000 澳元的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CyberGamer_Dota_: The top professional Australian teams fight for a $4000 AUD prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Amulet: 遇見想打架的人，打敗他們，把戰利品留下！計劃通。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_A: You know how it goes: you meet some people who like to fight, you fight them, and you keep their best bits for yourself!
Good for mining. Great for punching.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Flail: 染上鮮血之前先讓他們見識見識原本的綠色！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_F: Make 'em see green before they're soaked in red!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Helmet: 滿是尖刺的後背固然有助於戰鬥，但在翡翠礦井中堅硬的腦袋也很重要。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_H: A prickly back might be great for a fight, but down in an emerald mine you'll need a hard head too.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Set: 此組合包內含鋼背獸「翠綠狂怒」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Emerald Frenzy' set for Bristleback:
Show those spikes off in style!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_from_the_Gl: Includes all of the items in the 'Gifts of the Gloom' set for Death Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota: 本賽事將為來自俄羅斯、烏克蘭及白俄羅斯的半職業及非職業隊伍提供機會共同爭奪 $1,000 美元的總獎金，同時獲得贊助商及合作夥伴提供的獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota: This tournament gives an opportunity for semi-pro and non-pro teams from Russia, Ukraine, and Belarus to compete for the prize of $1,000 USD as well as prizes provided by sponsors and partners.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_GLaDOS: 該物品會將預設的連殺語音替換為《傳送門》中處處挖苦、態度消極、嘲諷攻擊的 GLaDOS，科幻小說中最致命而無禮的人工智能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_GLaDOS: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the withering sarcasm and passive-aggressive taunting of Portal's GLaDOS, science fiction's deadliest insult A.I.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Outcast_Horns: 遊蕩中的先知雙角總是盛開的樣子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Outcast_: Ever in bloom are the horns of the wandering prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Oak_of_the_Verdant_Outcas: 先知在種子中誕生，在陽光中成長，在大地上遊蕩，搜尋着需要幫助的幽谷和森林。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Oak_of_the_Verda: Born of seed and sun, the Prophet wandered the lands in search of glen and grove in need of aid.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Verdant_Outca: 他從不扎根，總是在野地間遊蕩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Verd: Never to plant his roots, always to wander the wilds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Dota_Academ: 此賽事將提供多種具有指導意義的比賽，包括英雄、遊戲機制及戰術的知道。完美世界刀塔學院將為新手提供學習 Dota 的完美路線。此外，學院還將定期實況直播完美世界舉辦的精彩活動。

Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcasts exciting activities held by Perfect World.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Petals_of_the_Verdant_Out: 歲月如梭，四季更迭，落葉在他的肩上重新聚集，欣欣向榮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Petals_of_the_Ve: As ages spent and seasons changed the leaves gathered upon his shoulder, returned to flourishing life.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal: 您好，歡迎光臨光圈科學裝飾數據場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal: Hello, and welcome to the Aperture Science Cosmetic Data Enclosure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_Pack:
再次體驗時斷時續的快樂，雖然這個遊戲沒有百萬美金的獎勵。

組合包內包含：
- 廣播語音：GLaDOS
- 連殺語音：GLaDOS
- 光圈科技守衛核心
- 《傳送門》HUD 介面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_Pack:
Relive the stationary, intermittent excitement of a non-violent puzzle game with no million-dollar prize at the end.

This pack includes:
- Announcer: GLaDOS
- Mega-Kills: GLaDOS
- Aperture Science Wardcore
- Portal HUD Skin
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pride_of_the_Verdant_Outc: 這根粗糙的樹枝成了他的旅行工具，有時候也是戰鬥武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pride_of_the_Ver: Of gnarled branch was made a tool for travel, and in time, a tool for battle.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho: 白虎自西方飛來，帶著秋日的金黃落葉，帶著山間的刺骨寒風。力量與勇敢是白虎的天賦，聲聲虎嘯是您的禮物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho: From the west, the White Tiger came, as the leaves grew golden in the Fall and the first touch of frost cut like steel through the mountain air. Strength and bravery are Baekho's gifts, delivered with a growl alongside your items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho__Nexon_Sponsorship: 內含 Nexon 贊助聯賽門票及白虎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho__Nexon_Sp: Includes access to the Nexon Sponsorship League and Baekho!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Latinoamerica_Plantr: 8 支拉丁美洲的隊伍將在資格賽中證明自己的實力。本賽事由 Plantronics.Inc 和 LPD 聯合贊助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Latinoameri: 8 Latin American teams from a qualifier willl be competing to bring their best team to represent them in this tournament. Sponsored by Plantronics.Inc and LPD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copa_Latinoameric: 8 支拉丁美洲的隊伍將在資格賽中證明自己的實力。本賽事由 Plantronics.Inc 和 LPD 聯合贊助。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electronic_Sports: 六支受邀隊伍共同爭奪榮譽與 $2,000 獎金。受邀隊伍包括 Dignitas、Liquid、Rattlesnake.int、Evil Geniuses、Fnatic 和 Menace！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electron: Six invited teams and two qualifier teams face off for glory and $2,000 USD. Featuring Dignitas, Liquid, Rattlesnake.int, Evil Geniuses, Fnatic, and Menace!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_LigaBEL: 這個巴西範圍內的錦標賽將集結全國最佳的 16 之隊伍共同爭奪 500 雷亞爾總獎金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rising_Stars_Dota: 明日之星 Dota 聯賽集結了共 16 支隊伍。8 支受邀隊伍（4 支來自巴西，4 支來自南美）和 8 支資格賽隊伍。2 個小組中的前 4 支隊伍將爭奪 $500.00 總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rising_S: Rising Stars is a tournament featuring 16 total teams. 8 teams are invited (4 from Brazil and 4 from South America) and 8 more from a qualifier). The top 4 teams for 2 groups of 8 teams will compete for a total prize of $500.00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SCD_Tides_Wrath_S: 開放註冊的澳洲聯賽『潮汐之怒』第 3 賽季到來。Southern Cross Dota 作為澳大利亞及新西蘭地區的新晉賽事組織者，將繼續承辦澳大利亞地區的最佳賽事 - 潮汐之怒！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SCD_Tide: The third season of the open registration Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 Tournament \"Tide's Wrath\" is upon us. Southern Cross Dota, a news organisation for Dota 2 in Australia and New Zealand is running the third series of an event successfully run in Australia - Tide's Wrath!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Niuhi: 漁夫的刃上鑲嵌著他殺掉虎鯊後取得的眼睛。這是一種來自深海的猛獸，雖然很久以前就被人打敗了，但從未被遺忘。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2 第 3 賽季將由北美職業與業餘隊伍共同參與。為期 8 週的賽事後將進行雙敗淘汰賽，角逐現金大獎並有機會在後續賽季進入更高分級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2 Season 3 is an event that is open to both amateur and professional players in North America. Teams compete in a 8 week regular season followed by a double-elimination playoff bracket where they compete for cash prizes and a chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2 第 3 賽季將由北美職業與業餘隊伍共同參與。為期 8 週的賽事後將進行雙敗淘汰賽，角逐現金大獎並有機會在後續賽季進入更高分級。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DotaTalk: Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 teams compete for SteelSeries Na'Vi gear worth over $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Champions_: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽將集結 12 支來自歐洲和北美的隊伍共同爭奪 $50,000 總獎金！門票銷售的 25% 將匯入總獎金！

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Logitech: LAN Centers all over India compete in Dota 2 for a total prize of 25,000 INR!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSeries_Euro_: SteelSeries 歐洲盃第 2 賽季迴歸！本賽事將向全部歐洲隊伍開放，最終的 2 支頂尖隊伍將角逐 $1,000 總獎金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sunday_Evening_Cu: 週日奇妙夜盃系列賽（SECS）始於 2009 年 12 月，是迄今為止最悠久的 Dota 賽事。SECS 提供北為美及南美的隊伍提供一個開放的競技平臺，獲得真實的對戰體驗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sunday_E: The Sunday Evening Cup Series (SECS) began in December 2009 and is the longest running Dota tournament series to date. SECS provides an open competitive platform for North and South American teams to gain real tournament experience.

根據碎刃者行會的守則，只有應得之人方該死。刀把上凹槽的目的就是用來擄獲敵人的刀劍，使其轉向對敵，藉此希望遭繳械的對手不戰而逃。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Invitationa: Nexon 集結 8 支世界各地的隊伍和 4 支韓國本土戰隊在韓國首爾展開對決。從 10 月 28 日至 11 月 25 日，這項全明星賽事由 OnGameNet 全程實況直播。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_In: Nexon features eight of the best international teams and four from Korea facing off in an epic series of showdowns in Seoul, Korea. Produced and broadcast by OnGameNet, this all-star event will run from October 28 till November 25, 2013.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague: ASUS ROG DreamLeague 淘汰賽由 ASUS ROG、ROCCAT 和 TV6 贊助。11 月 4 日開始的比賽中，6 支世界頂尖隊伍將在 30 場比賽及 2013 年 28 日 至 30 日的 DreamHack 冬季賽中爭奪 5 萬美金的總獎金。包含鐵志祭服套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Kick-off season is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Starting on November 4th, 6 of the world's best teams will compete in 30 league games and a playoffs at DreamHack Winter 2013 on November 28-30th for a $50,000 prize pool. Includes the Vestments of the Iron Will Set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Azuremir__Nexon_Invitatio: 虯龍青蛟帶著他的土靈珠，在田野與溪流間穿行，守護著廣袤的大地和召喚他的人民。內含 Nexon 超級邀請賽門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Azuremir__Nexon_:
Winding through field and stream, the young dragon Azuremir carries his orbs of soil and stone, ever watchful of the lands around him, and ever helpful to those who call to him.
	
	Includes access to the Nexon Invitational Super Match league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Blood_Staine: 爲了讓這片沙漠保住名號，這把刀已經就緒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Blo: To keep the sands well-named, this blade waits at the ready.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chosen_Larva_Bundle:
內含神選幼蟲套裝及 WH Overgaming 挑戰賽第 2 賽季門票。

- 神選幼蟲的甲殼
- 神選幼蟲的頭盔
- 神選幼蟲的尖刺
- 神選幼蟲的巨螯
- WH Overgaming 挑戰賽第 2 賽季門票
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chosen_Larva_Bun:
Includes all items in the Chosen Larva Set and access to the WH Overgaming Challenge #2 league.

- Carapace of the Chosen Larva
- Helmet of the Chosen Larva
- Stinger of the Chosen Larva
- Pincers of the Chosen Larva
- WH Overgaming Challenge #2

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_ASUS_ROG: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Kick-off season is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Canada_Cup: Dota 2 加拿大盃第 2 賽季即將迴歸。集結北美及南美地區最具天賦的頂尖強隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: Dota 2 Canada Cup is back with Season 2. Featuring some of the top talent from North and South America.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_2013: G 聯賽帶著東區及西區資格賽隆重迴歸。8 支頂尖中國隊伍和 2 支西方隊伍將共同爭奪 270,000 人民幣（$44,000）總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_: The G-League returns with qualifying tournaments for Western and Eastern teams. 8 top Chinese teams and 2 top Western teams will compete for a total prize pool of 270,000 RMB ($44,000 USD)!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_NADota_Elite_Leag: NADota 精英聯賽第 2 賽季迴歸了！北美最具天賦的隊伍將在為期 8 週的比賽中參加 4 支隊伍的雙敗淘汰全明星錦標賽。總獎金高達 $3,000，共可觀賞超過 400 場遊戲。由IXDL主辦，NEO Dota 實況直播。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_NADota_E: NADota Elite League returns for its second season! The most talented teams in North America compete in the classic league format for eight weeks, culminating in a 4-team double elimination all-star tournament. $3,000 prize pool, 400+ games guaranteed. Hosted by IXDL. Broadcast by NEO Dota.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_azuremir: Winding through field and stream, the young dragon Azuremir carries his orbs of soil and stone, ever watchful of the lands around him, and ever helpful to those who call to him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Blood_Stained: 獵人遮住面容有很多理由，但在沙漠中太陽這個理由就足夠了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Bloo: The hunter hides his face for various reasons, but in the desert wastes the sun is enemy enough.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Blood_Stained: 輕裝上陣的必須之物，有了它才能穿越沒有物資沒有歇腳地的沙漠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Bloo: A necessity for traveling light across a hostile waste which offers nothing in the way of sustenance or shelter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pads_of_the_Blood_Stained: 無情的驕陽，森森的狂風，敵人的絕地反擊——肩甲可以抵禦一切。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pads_of_the_Bloo: Relentless sun, scouring winds and the enemy's desperate slashes--these pads are proof against all.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pike_of_the_Blood_Stained: 賞金獵人的長槍如同沙漠一樣渴望鮮血。無論流下什麼它都會一飲而盡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pike_of_the_Bloo: Bounty Hunter's pike shares a thirst for blood with the arid sands. Whatever it drops will be drunken greedily.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_the_Blood_Sta: 經過飛刃的撕咬，沙漠又煥然一新了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_the_: Flying edges bite, and the sand is christened anew.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stinger_of_the_Chosen_Lar: 比被神選幼蟲刺到更可怕的只有死亡。但理論上你絕不想被這個生物刺到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stinger_of_the_C: There are worse deaths than the sting of the chosen larva.  Theoretically.  You do not want this creature to sting you.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Columbus_Battle_Point: 使用此物品後您將獲得 <font color='#9da1a9'>135%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成，直至 MLG 哥倫布結束。此外，您將與其他玩家疊加共享 <font color='#9da1a9'>35%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Columbus_Bat: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>235%</font> until the end of MLG Columbus. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>35%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Scalehound: 這隻惡毒的猛獸曾在杜璐德牧場上出現，經過簡單的訓練就可以成為馱獸及營地的看門犬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Scalehound: Found on the wild meadows of Druud, these vicious beasts are easily trained as beasts of burden and camp watchdogs.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Stronghold: 即使是最強大的進攻也會敗在固若金湯的防禦之下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_Stronghold: Even the mightiest offensive may fail against firm fortification.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Watchful_Sotdae: 邪惡之靈、強勁之敵，皆難逃它的監視。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Watchful_Sotdae: Let no vile spirit or foe pass unseen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Roshan_Hunter__GLeague_Bu:
內含羅煞獵人套裝的全部物品及 2013 年 G 聯賽門票。

- 羅煞獵人的手臂
- 羅煞獵人的背部
- 羅煞獵人的腰帶
- 羅煞獵人的頭部
- 2013 年 G 聯賽門票

這些物品是和 G 聯賽聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Roshan_Hunter__G:
Includes all items in the Roshan Hunter's Set and access to the G-League 2013.

- Roshan Hunter Arms
- Roshan Hunter Back
- Roshan Hunter Belt
- Roshan Hunter Head
- G-League 2013

These items were created in partnership with G-League, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Roshan_Hunter__GLeague_Bundle: 羅煞獵人與 G 聯賽組合包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Vestments_of_the_Iron: Vestments of the Iron Will Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Alliance: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_All: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Artillery_of_the_Cres: Artillery of the Crested Cannoneer Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Australian_ESports_League__ADM: 澳洲電子競技聯賽 - 管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Black_Blades_of_the_Qaldin_Ass: 刺客卡爾丁的黑刃套裝
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Black_Blades_of_the_Q: Black Blades of the Qaldin Assassin Set

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornments_of_Blight_Set: 包含痛苦女王「摧殘之飾」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornments_of_Bl: Includes all the items in the \"Adornments of Blight\" set for Queen of Pain.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alloy_Wristplates: 當你設計新的合金時，永遠不要低估巨龍飽含怒氣的火腺的用處！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alloy_Wristplate: Never underestimate the usefulness of an angry dragon's flamegland when designing new metals!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Scroll_Case: 一個上鎖的古老卷軸容器。能以寶藏鑰匙打開來獲得一些作為設計圖的卷軸並有機會獲得稀有設計圖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Scroll_C: An ancient locked scroll case. Open with a Treasure Key to receive several crafting recipes including a chance of special rare recipes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Trine: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為《魔幻三俠》中語調飽含慰藉的故事敘述者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Trine: This item replaces the Default announcer with the soothing tones of Trine's tale-weaving narrator.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurs_Curse_Set: 包含死亡先知「預言者的詛咒」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurs_Curse_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Augur's Curse' set for Death Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_ESports_League: 澳洲電子競技聯賽是由 E-Sports Daily 主辦的電視遊戲聯賽，包含網路和離線部份。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_ESpor: The Australian E-Sports League is a competitive video gaming league managed by E-Sports Daily that consists of many online and offline events.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Blades_of_the_Qaldi: 包含賞金獵人「刺客卡爾丁的黑刃」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Blades_of_: Includes all of the items in the 'Black Blades of the Qaldin Assassin' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_Blade_Pack: 此組合包內含血石之刃的主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_Blade: This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Bloodstone Blade.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bramblehorn: She who rides a tiger is afraid to dismount.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Polish_Dota_2_Onl: 波蘭 Dota 2 線上錦標賽將集結 8 支頂尖波蘭隊伍共同爭奪 1000  茲羅提總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Polish_D: The Polish Dota 2 Online Championships will feature the top 8 Polish teams competing for 1000PLN!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_South_American_El: 南美最具天賦的玩家將在為期 6 周的比賽中參加經典內戰形式的比賽，爭奪 $1,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_South_Am: The most talented players in South America compete for $1,000 in the classic inhouse league format for six weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_of_Heroi: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>寶藏鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DK_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Lyralei: Created by the elements of nature to assist a hero in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forest_Hermit_Set: 包含撼地者「石林隱士」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forest_Hermit_Se: Includes all the items in the \"Forest Hermit\" set for Earthshaker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Blue: 打開此組合包將獲得藍色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Blue: This pack will grant a Blue Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Chronosphere_Kil: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份時間結界禁封多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄時間結界禁封多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Chronos: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Multi-Hero Chronosphere Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Chronosphere Kills Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Couriers_Purchas: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份信使購買次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄信使購買次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Courier: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Couriers Purchased Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Couriers Purchased Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Enemies_Gushed: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份巨浪擊中敵人次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄巨浪擊中敵人次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Enemies: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Enemies Gushed Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Enemies Gushed Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_First_Blood: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份第一滴血寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄第一滴血次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_First_B: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a First Blood Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the First Blood Gem can be placed in a socket to count First Blood events.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Godlike: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份如神一般寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄如神一般次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Godlike: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Godlike Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Godlike Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold: 打開此組合包將獲得金色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold: This pack will grant a Gold Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold_Earned: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份賺取金錢寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄賺取金錢的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold_Ea: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Gold Earned Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Gold Earned Gem can be placed in a socket to count the total gold earned during a match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold_Spent: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份花費金錢寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄花費金錢的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Gold_Sp: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Gold Spent Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Gold Spent Gem can be placed in a socket to count the total gold spent during a match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Green: 打開此組合包將獲得綠色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Green: This pack will grant a Green Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Invisible_Jinada: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份隱身忍技攻擊次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄隱身忍技攻擊次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Invisib: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and an Invisible Jinada Strikes Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Invisible Jinada Strikes Gem can be placed in a socket to count the total jinada strikes you have performed while invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Light_Green: 打開此組合包將獲得淡綠棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Light_G: This pack will grant a Light Green Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHero_Chrono: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份時間結界禁封多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄時間結界禁封多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHe: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Multi-Hero Chronospheres Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Chronosphers Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHero_Cleave: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份巨劍揮斬擊殺多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄巨劍揮斬擊殺多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHe: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Multi-Hero Cleave Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Cleave Kills Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHero_Earths: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份震撼大地影響多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄震撼大地影響多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHe: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Multi-Hero Earthshocks Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Earthshocks Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHero_Storm_: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份風暴之錘命中多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄風暴之錘命中多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_MultiHe: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Muti-Hero Storm Hammers Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Storm Hammers Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Multihero_Powers: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份強力一擊貫穿多名英雄次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄強力一擊貫穿多名英雄次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Multihe: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Multi-Hero Powershots Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Multi-Hero Powershots Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Orange: 打開此組合包將獲得橙色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Orange: This pack will grant an Orange Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Purple: 打開此組合包將獲得紫色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Purple: This pack will grant a Purple Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Red: 打開此組合包將獲得紅色棱彩寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Red: This pack will grant a Red Prismatic Gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Roshan_Kills: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份擊殺羅煞次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄擊殺羅煞次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Roshan_: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Roshan Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Roshan Kills Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Sunstrike_Kills: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份炎陽衝擊擊殺次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄炎陽衝擊擊殺次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Sunstri: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Sunstrike Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Sunstrike Kills Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tornado_Kills: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份龍捲風擊殺次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄龍捲風擊殺次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tornado: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Tornado Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Tornado Kills Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Towers_Destroyed: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份摧毀防禦塔數量寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄摧毀防禦塔數量的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Towers_: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Towers Destroyed Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Towers Destroyed Gem can be placed in a socket to count the number of towers you have destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Track_Bounty_Gol: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份追蹤術賞金寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄追蹤術賞金的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Track_B: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Track Bounty Gold Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Track Bounty Gold Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tracked_Invisibl: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份擊殺被追蹤隱身敵人次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄擊殺被追蹤隱身敵人次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tracked: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and an Tracked Invisible Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Tracked Invisible Kills Gem can be placed in a socket to count the total number of kills of tracked foes while you are invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tracked_Kills: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份追蹤術擊殺數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄追蹤術擊殺數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Tracked: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Tracked Kills Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Tracked Kills Gem can be placed in a socket to count the number of tracked kills during a match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Wards_Placed: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份守衛放置數量寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄守衛放置數量的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gem_Pack_Wards_P: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Wards Placed Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Wards Placed Gem can be placed in a socket to count warding events.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslinger_Set: 包含狙擊手「神槍手」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslinger_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Gunslinger' set for Sniper:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kinetic_Gem: 此寶石鑲入物品後裝備該物品的英雄將修改或獲得一個或更多全新動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kinetic_Gem: Adding this gem to an item will modify or add one or more new animations to the hero equipping the item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LGD_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LGD_Pennant: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lunacy_Bringer_Set: 包含歿境毀滅者「瘋狂使者」套裝的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lunacy_Bringer_S: Contains all the items in the \"Lunacy Bringer\" set for Outworld Devourer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MUFC_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_Lunacy_Bringer: 魔杖還是武器，在這個瘋狂的國度毫無意義。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_Lunacy_B: Wand or weapon, such distinctions mean nothing in a mad realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mana_Pool: 未知的黑暗中湧出無盡的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mana_Pool: From a darkness unknown spills infinite power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Master_Artificers_Hammer: 這把強大的魔力之錘用於將棱彩寶石及虛靈寶石取出。使用後物品將被摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Master_Artificer: A powerful enchanted hammer used to extract Prismatic and Ethereal gems. This item will destroy the item it is used on.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Master_Weaver_Set: 包含編織者「編織大師」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Master_Weaver_Se: Includes all the items in the \"Master Weaver\" set for Weaver.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Trine: 該組合包會將預設的連殺語音替換為《魔幻三俠》中語調飽含慰藉的故事敘述者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Trine: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the soothing tones of Trine's tale-weaving narrator.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mousesports_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Necropolis: 那些埋葬已久的事物，殘留著被遺忘已久的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Necropolis: Those long buried hold power long forgotten.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Orange_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Phantoms_Reaper: 如果您並未惹怒地獄聖泉，那麼您也無需懼怕亞巴頓奉命奔馳而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Phantoms_Reaper: If you have done nothing to anger the Font of Avernus, then you should have nothing to fear when Abaddon rides out on his errands of correction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Piercing_Umbrage_Pack: 此組合包内含穿心之疑及副手武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Piercing_Umbrage: This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Piercing Umbrage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polish_Dota_2_Online_Cham: 波蘭 Dota 2 線上錦標賽將集結 8 支頂尖波蘭隊伍共同爭奪 1000 茲羅提總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polish_Dota_2_On: The Polish Dota 2 Online Championships will feature the top 8 Polish teams competing for 1000PLN!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Gem: 此寶石鑲入物品後將改變其虛靈效果的顏色。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Gem: This gem will change the color of the Ethereal effects on the item it is socketed in.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Forge_Rare_Item: 此任務需要您收集指定的若干物品以創造全新稀有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Forge_Rare: This quest requires you to collect several specific items in order to create a rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Seek_Exceptional_It: 此任務需要您收集指定的若干物品以創造全新珍惜物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Seek_Excep: This quest requires you to collect several specific items to an exceptional new item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Brand: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個巧匠烙鐵。烙鐵用於為信使增加效果及棱彩鑲孔使其成為獨特信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Artificer's Brand. The brand can be used to make a courier unusual bu adding effect and color sockets to it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Chisel: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個鑿刀，用於為物品增加鑲孔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an chisel that can be used to add sockets to items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Hammer: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個巧匠之錘。巧匠之錘將可以用來把寶石自鑲孔中取出，但作為代價被錘子敲過的物品將會銷毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Artificer's Hammer. The hammer can be used to extract gems from items, but at the cost of destroying the gemmed item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Common_Ite: 這個設計圖將會融合數件指定的普通物品然後隨機產生出一件特別物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_C: This recipe will combine a number of specific common items and produce a random new uncommon item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Rare_Items: 這個設計圖將會融合數件指定的稀有物品然後隨機產生出一件全新神話物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_R: This recipe will combine a number of specific rare items and produce a random new mythical item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Uncommon_I: 這個設計圖將會融合數件指定的特別物品然後隨機產生出一件全新稀有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_U: This recipe will combine a number of specific uncommon items and produce a random new rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Create_Artificers_: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個巧匠大師之錘。這種升級過後的錘子取出寶石後將不會摧毀物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Create_Ar: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an upgraded Master Artificer's Hammer. The upgraded hammer will not destroy items when used to release gems.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Dire_Reward: 這個設計圖將會融合數個魔法精髓然後隨機產生出一件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Dire_Rewa: This recipe will combine a number of magical essences and produce a random item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Hollow_Jack: 這個設計圖將會融合一件魔魘狂潮的靈異寶藏中的物品與一件詛咒品質物品，然後產生出一個空心傑克信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Hollow_Ja: This recipe will combine an item from the Ghastly Treasure of Diretide with any Cursed item to produce a Hollow Jack courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Materialize_Item: 這個設計圖將會融合數個魔法精髓然後隨機產生出一件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Materiali: This recipe will combine a number of magical essences and produce a random item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Common_I: 這個設計圖將會融合數件普通物品然後隨機產生出一件全新普通物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of common items and produce a random new common item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Mythical: 這個設計圖將會融合數件神話物品然後隨機產生出一件全新神話物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of mythical items and produce a random new mythical item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Rare_Ite: 這個設計圖將會融合數件稀有物品然後隨機產生出一件全新稀有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of rare items and produce a random new rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Uncommon: 這個設計圖將會融合數件特別物品然後隨機產生出一件全新特別物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of uncommon items and produce a random new uncommon item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redwood_Arms_Set: 此組合包内含風行者「紅木之兵」套裝中的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redwood_Arms_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Redwood Arms' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riptide_Blades_Set: 此組合包內含娜迦海妖「激流之刃」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riptide_Blades_S: This bundle contains all the items in the 'Riptide Blades' set for Naga Siren:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Brand: 這把具有魔力的鑿刀用於為信使雕刻獨特鑲孔。此鑿刀可為信使新增特效或色彩鑲孔，使其成為獨特信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Brand: A magical chisel used to add unusual sockets to couriers. This chisel will add an effect and color socket to a courier and make it unusual.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Chisel: 這把具有魔力的鑿刀用於為物品雕刻鑲孔。此鑿刀新增鑿普通鑲孔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Chise: A magical chisel used to add sockets to items. This chisel creates general sockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quickslicer_Pack: 此組合包內含亂舞快刃的主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quicksl: This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Slashing Quickslicer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectator_Gem: 將此寶石附於物品後此物品可記錄觀戰相應聯賽或戰隊的數量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectator_Gem: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track games viewed for a league or team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Double_S: 此組合包內含一份巧匠鑿刀和一份時雙重束縛次數寶石。您可以使用鑿刀為物品添加鑲孔並將記錄雙重束縛次數的寶石鑲入其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Double Shackles Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Double Shackles Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Creepers_Cruelty_Set: 包含賞金獵人「苦力帕的殘酷」套裝的全部內容：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Creepers_Cru: Includes all of the items in the 'Creeper's Cruelty' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Throe: 劇痛之使四處漂泊。它在戰鬥中有時顯而易見，有時深藏不露。他的神秘之處正是他的詛咒和帶向戰場的不安定因素。曾經由未知的惡魔指引，現在只有恐懼能指引他在戰爭中徜徉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Throe: There is no home for the wandering Throe. Apparent in some fierce battles, but hidden from others, his myth is both his curse and inconsistency brought to the battlefield. Once believed to be led by demons unknown, only fear now leads this wandering stag through the plains of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TongFu_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TongFu_Pennant: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Earth_Ess: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Ember_Ess: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Earth_Essence: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Eart: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Ember_Essence: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>餘燼精髓寶箱鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Embe: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key of Ember Essence</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Heroic_Bounty: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>寶藏鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Hero: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trine_Announcer_Pack: 該組合包會將預設的廣播語音和連殺語音替換為《魔幻三俠》中語調飽含慰藉的故事敘述者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trine_Announcer_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the soothing tones of Trine's tale-weaving narrator.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vermilion: 每一場戰役均是獨特的，正如酷夏中綻放的竹花。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vermilion: Each conflict is unique, like bamboo's bloom in summer's heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 此組合包內含死靈法師「十重瘟疫法衣」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: Includes all the items in the \"Vestments of the Ten Plagues\" set for Necrophos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vingspan: 在尋求新刺激的時候，蝙蝠騎士在遙遠的大陸征服了一只坐騎，靠的只是滿嘴的大蒜和香煙味道。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vingspan: Ever in search of new thrills, the Rider commandeered an unlikely steed in a faraway land, with nothing but grit and persuasive Garlic breath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WE_Pennant: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WE_Pennant: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Formed_Alloy_Wristplates:
當你設計新的合金時，永遠不要低估巨龍飽含怒氣的火腺的用處！

此玩家物品是與您最喜愛的玩家聯合打造的，每出售一份他都將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Formed_Alloy_Wri:
Never underestimate the usefulness of an angry dragon's flamegland when designing new metals!

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Master_Artificers_: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個巧匠大師之錘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Master_Ar: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce a Master Artificer's Hammer.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Craft_Exc: This recipe requires you to collect several specific items to craft an exceptional new item.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aerocool_Dota_2_Gaming_Ch: 來自巴西的 8 支頂尖強隊將共同爭奪 1000 雷亞爾總獎金及 Aerocool 提供的遊戲外設！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aerocool_Dota_2_: The top 8 Brazilian teams compete for a R$1,000 prize pool and gaming equipment from Aerocool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aerocool_Dota_2_Gaming_Ch: 來自巴西的 8 支頂尖強隊將共同爭奪 1000 雷亞爾總獎金及 Aerocool 提供的遊戲外設！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Artificers_Hammer: 這把強大的附魔之錘用於取出鑲入物品中的寶石。這個錘子無法用於獨特信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Artificers_Hamme: A powerful enchanted hammer used to extract gems that have been socketed into items. This hammer cannot be used on unusual couriers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_1: SDL 聯賽將集結 48 支業餘隊伍爭奪 500 雷亞爾的總獎金及不朽物品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_1: The SDL features 48 amateur teams competing for a total prize pool of R$500 and Immortal items!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hollow_Jack: 萬聖禮物好難扛？不如傑克來幫忙！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hollow_Jack:
Tired of hauling a Diretide sack?
	Just hand it off to Hollow Jack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Platinum_Baby_Roshan: 獨特而閃耀的戰利品，獎勵給在糖糖突襲戰中最英勇的英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Platinum_Baby_Ro: A unique and glistening trophy awarded to the deadliest heroes to face Sugar Rush Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Unusual_Artificers: 這個設計圖將會融合數件物品然後產生出一個獨特巧匠之錘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Unusual_A: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Unusual Artificer's Hammer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_1: SDL 聯賽將集結 48 支業餘隊伍爭奪 500 雷亞爾的總獎金及不朽物品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_1: The SDL features 48 amateur teams competing for a total prize pool of R$500 and Immortal items!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Supernova_Dota_2: 新浪盃超新星刀塔公開賽新賽季歸來！除 8 支受邀隊伍之外，將有 4 支資格賽選拔隊伍共同爭奪 65,000 人民幣總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Superno: Sina Cup Supernova Dota 2 Open is back for another season! In addition to the 8 invited teams, 4 teams will advance through qualifiers to compete for a total prize pool of 65,000RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_South_American_Elite_Leag: 南美最具天賦的玩家將在為期 6 周的比賽中參加經典內戰形式的比賽，爭奪 $1,000 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_South_American_E: The most talented players in South America compete for $1,000 in the classic in-house league format for six weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Northern_Wind_Set: 此組合包內含風行者「北風」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Northern_Win: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Northern Wind' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Artificers_Hammer: 這把強大的附魔之錘用於取出鑲入獨特信使中的寶石。使用後信使將被永久摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Artifice: A powerful enchanted hammer used to extract gems that have been socketed into unusual couriers. This item will destroy the courier it is used on.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrangers_Sylvan_Bundle: 此組合包內含 2012 年 10 月前發佈的風行者全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrangers_Sylv: This bundle contains all of the items for Windranger released in October 2012.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Anointed_Armor_of_Ruinati: 此組合包內含亞巴頓「毀滅附魔聖甲」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Anointed_Armor_o: This item includes all of the items in the 'Anointed Armor of Ruination' set for Abaddon:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birds_Stone_Set: 包含自然先知「飛鳥棲石」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birds_Stone_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Bird's Stone' set for Nature's Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coco_the_Courageous: 真的勇士不是高舉寶劍，而是高舉酒杯...有時候即使最強大的英雄也會以酒助興！歡迎可可登場，這隻來自紅爪釀造廠的勇敢信使決意不惜代價將美酒帶向戰場！英雄們再也不會為酒癮所困擾！對美酒的渴望是神聖的，請在出征的宣誓中高舉酒杯！願美酒與您同在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Coco_the_Courage: True courage is not how high you can hold a sword but how high you can hold your spirit... And sometimes, even the strongest of heroes need their spirit boosted! Introducing Coco, a courageous courier of the Redpaw Brewery, determined to bring brew to the battlefield at any cost! No longer shall a heroes thirst go unquenched! The call for brew is sacred and by oath it must be upheld! The brew must flow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sponsorship: 2013 年 9 月 28 日開始的 Nexon 贊助聯賽持續 3 個賽季，贊助獎金共計 3 億韓元（$267,153）。觀賞第 2 賽季的頂尖戰隊相互角逐吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sp: Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million ($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Dota_2_Onli: 菲律賓 Dota 為您呈現最精彩的菲律賓電子競技！本賽事將集結 2 支隊伍及 6 支資格賽隊伍共同爭奪 10,000 比索總獎金，賽事自 12 月 9 日持續至 2014 年 2 月 1 日！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Do: Pinoy Dota delivers Philippine E-sports in your hands! This tournament features 2 teams with 6 qualifiers that will compete for P10,000 prize pool on December 9th through February 1, 2014!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Darkstar_the_Mistforged: 這把地獄聖殿的先祖之劍被投入聖泉之中進行重鑄。最終得到了一把鋼鐵與迷霧的合金，能夠吞噬敵人的靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Darkstar_the_Mis: This ancestral blade of House Avernus was cast into the Font, to be forged anew. What emerged was an amalgam of steel, and mist, that feasts upon the souls of its foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gifts_of_the_Shadowcat_Se: 包含卓爾遊俠「暗影貓的饋贈」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gifts_of_the_Sha: Includes all of the items in the 'Gifts of the Shadowcat' set for Drow Ranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netherax_Nightmare_of_the: 當聖泉的力量附著在亞巴頓身體上時，也召喚出一隻同樣可怕的生物，供亞巴頓馳騁沙場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netherax_Nightma: When the Font anointed Abaddon with its power, it also conjured up a creature, equally terrifying, for its champion to ride into battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_: 2013 年 9 月 28 日開始的 Nexon 贊助聯賽持續 3 個賽季，贊助獎金共計 3 億韓元（$267,153）。觀賞第 2 賽季的頂尖戰隊相互角逐吧。內含轎伕兄弟信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi:
Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million ($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 2.
	Includes the Gama Brothers courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Paws_of_the_Shadowcat: 暗影貓的利爪致命而又有力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Paws_of_the_Shad: The claws of the shadowcat, deadly and powerful.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Dota_2_Online_Battl: 菲律賓 Dota 為您呈現最精彩的菲律賓電子競技！本賽事將集結 2 支隊伍及 6 支資格賽隊伍共同爭奪 10,000 比索總獎金，賽事自 12 月 9 日持續至 2014 年 2 月 1 日！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Dota_2_Onl: Pinoy Dota delivers Philippine E-sports in your hands! This tournament features 2 teams with 6 qualifiers that will compete for P10,000 prize pool on December 9th through February 1, 2014!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_8: SLTV 的傳奇賽事 StarSeries 第 8 賽季將集結 18 支歐洲隊伍。他們將爭奪 $50,000 起的總獎金。每購買一張 SLTV StarSeries 門票都將有 $2.5 匯入總獎金池。包括網路循環賽及基輔 Cybersport Arena 舉行的區域網路決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 8th season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries will feature best 18 teams from Europe. They will compete for growing prize pool starting at $50,000. $2.50 of every purchase will go to the SLTV StarSeries prize pool. Round-robin online tournament and LAN finals in Kyiv Cybersport Arena.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_8: SLTV 的傳奇賽事 StarSeries 第 8 賽季將集結 18 支歐洲隊伍。他們將爭奪 $50,000 起的總獎金。每購買一張 SLTV StarSeries 門票都將有 $2.5 匯入總獎金池。包括網路循環賽及基輔 Cybersport Arena 舉行的區域網路決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 8th season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries will feature best 18 teams from Europe. They will compete for growing prize pool starting at $50,000. $2.50 of every purchase will go to the SLTV StarSeries prize pool. Round-robin online tournament and LAN finals in Kyiv Cybersport Arena.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_8_Battle_Poin: 使用此物品能連續 6 天給予您額外 <font color='#9da1a9'>125%</font> 的<font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成 。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_8_Ba: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Caustic_Cons: This set contains all of the items in the 'Caustic Consumption' set for Sand King:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Exiled_Demon: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Exiled Demonologist' set for Warlock:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciple: 包含賞金獵人「次級信徒」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Includes all of the items in the 'Second Disciple' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Bast: 如果獵人另有所圖，自然不會急着去領賞。剛鐸應召進入異教徒的軍隊想要拿些過硬的裝備，同時打探拿些已經落入敵手的索魯克失竊的機密。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Sometimes a bounty does not need to be collected immediately if the hunter believes there is more to gain on a job. Gondar enlists in the army of the infidel in order to obtain sturdy gear and learn the stolen secrets of Soruq that have been bestowed upon the undeserving army.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Blad: 這把刀由戰場上的戰利品打造而成，它同時提醒着剛鐸和敵人背信棄義的下場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: This blade, fashioned of salvaged equipment from the battlefield, serves as a reminder to both Gondar and his enemies of what happens to those who betray sacred trusts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Chak: 把它背在背上，進可攻退可守。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Carried upon his back, this weapon serves as both defense and offense on the field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Dagg: 剛鐸用從叛軍手中偷來的這把武器割斷了僞軍的將領，終結了異教徒的命運。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Stolen from the betrayer himself, Gondar used this weapon to slit the throat of the deceitful war general and seal the fate of the army founded on infidelity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Satc: 剛鐸將他重要的材料和極具放在他的背包裏，時刻準備出發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Gondar carries his important materials and implements in his satchel, always prepared for future hunts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Veil: 帶着次級信徒的面紗中注入的能量，剛鐸從他師傅那裏學到了罕見而使用的技巧。藉助符文強化的利刃，獵人可以感受刀卑鄙的背叛者幾乎已經失去的強大力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: With the power imbued in the veil of the second disciple, Gondar learned a rare and useful technique passed down from his old master. With the sigil of the enchanted blade, the hunter can feel a great power that was nearly lost to the filthy traitor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Seers_Command_Set: 包含黑暗賢者「賢者之令」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Seers_Comman: Includes all of the items in 'The Seers Command' set for Dark Seer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Threads_of_Entwined_Fate_:
內含命運糾纏之絲套裝、6 天 125% 戰點加成和 Star Series 第 8 賽季門票。

每購買一張門票都將有 $2.5 匯入 Star Series 第 8 賽季的總獎金池。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Threads_of_Entwi:
Includes the evolving Threads of the Entwined Fate Set, 125% 6 day Battle Bonus and access to Star Series 8.

$2.50 of every purchase will go directly to the Star Series 8 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tory_the_Sky_Guardian: 相傳天國衛士托利在創世之初變乘風而行，成為遠古部落忠誠的信使。被托利選為盟友的人都將獲得無上的榮耀，因為它優雅地飛向目的地時清風將為他開路。它無所不能，無論高山險嶺或是硝煙戰火，托利總能完成其他飛鳥不能完成的任務。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tory_the_Sky_Gua:
It's been told that Tory, the Sky Guardian, has been riding the winds since the beginning of time, serving the ancient tribes faithfully as a proficient messenger. 
	Everlasting glory shall be provided to those who are chosen by Tory as allies, as the winds seem to open a path for him while he gracefully flies towards his destination. 
	A skilled companion who can fly above the highest mountain and glide over the bloodiest battlefield, Tory can surpass every flying being in every way possible.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wind_Rangers_Syl: This bundle contains all of the items for Wind Ranger released in October 2012.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Winter_Ope: 16 支來自中西部的隊伍將前往芝加哥在嚴冬中爭奪超過 $2,000 的總獎金！隆重邀請芝加哥本地的 Vykromond 實況解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_W: 16 teams from around the Midwest go head to head in the midst of Chicago's unforgiving winter for a $2000 prize pool and more! Also featuring live casting by Chicago-local Vykromond.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gigabyte_Premier_: 技嘉與 DotaTalk 聯合隆重為您帶來技嘉超級聯賽。集結來自東南亞的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪 $1,500 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gigabyte: Gigabyte in partnership with DotaTalk proudly brings you the Gigabyte Premier league. It features Southeast Asia's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $1,500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_Championship_:
MLG 的首次 Dota 2 國際賽事將集結來自歐洲、中國及北美的隊伍，起始總獎金為 $50,000 並不斷增加。
此組合包包含：
* 背甲獵犬信使
* 防禦要塞 HUD 介面
* 螺旋哨崗守衛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_Cham:
MLG's first International Dota 2 competition will feature the world's best teams from Europe, China and North America competing for a growing prize pool starting at $50,000.
Included in this bundle:
* Scalehound Courier
* Stronghold HUD Skin
* Tethered Sentinel Ward
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Montenegro_Nation: 蒙特內哥羅國家聯賽是蒙特內哥羅電競聯盟首次舉辦 Dota 2 聯賽。全國頂級戰隊將共同角逐冠軍大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Monteneg: The Montenegro National League is the first professional Dota 2 league in Montenegro organized by Montenegro E-Sports Association. The best teams from country will compete for the championship and prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Raidcall_Southeas: Raidcall 隆重推出東南亞超級，集結 16 支隊伍共同爭奪 $1,000 總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Raidcall: Raidcall presents the Southeast Asian Invitational League, featuring 16 of the best teams competing for $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Razer_Pinoy_Cup_S: 8 支頂尖的菲律賓隊伍將爭奪價值 $1,000 的 Razer 產品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Razer_Pi: The top 8 Filipino teams will compete for gaming equipment from Razer worth $1,000!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Saratov_: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sudamerican_Maste: 本賽事將集結 16 支來自南美的頂尖隊伍，10 支受邀隊伍及 6 支資格賽選拔隊伍。智力、秘魯、阿根廷、巴西、委內瑞拉及哥倫比亞的隊伍已蓄勢待發爭奪 $600 的獎勵！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sudameri: This tournament will feature the top 16 South American teams;' 10 invited teams and 6 qualifying teams. Chile, Peru, Argentina, Brazil, Venezuela and Colombia squaring off for the award of more than $600!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Winter_Open: 16 支來自中西部的隊伍將前往芝加哥在嚴冬中爭奪超過 $2,000 的總獎金！隆重邀請芝加哥本地的 Vykromond 實況解說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Winter_Op: 16 teams from around the Midwest go head to head in the midst of Chicago's unforgiving winter for a $2000 prize pool and more! Also featuring live casting by Chicago-local Vykromond.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_Asian_Lea: 東南亞最具天賦的選手將獨自征戰並組成隊伍爭奪冠軍頭銜！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_: The most talented players in Southeast Asia compete individually then form teams to be crowned the champion!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frosty_Treasure_of_Frosti: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>2013 年迎霜節寶藏鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。此寶箱會在<font color='#9da1a9'> 2014 年 1 月 12 日</font>當天永遠消融。寶藏箱內含下列神秘物品之一：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frosty_Treasure_: You will need <font color='#9da1a9'>Frostivus 2013 Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Beware! At the end of <font color='#9da1a9'>January 12, 2014</font> this chest will crumble into useless snowflakes. This chest contains one of several mysterious new items:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Premier_League_S: 技嘉與 DotaTalk 聯合隆重為您帶來技嘉超級聯賽。集結來自東南亞的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪 $1,500 總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Premier: Gigabyte in partnership with DotaTalk proudly brings you the Gigabyte Premier league. It features Southeast Asia's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $1,500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Barbed_Armor_Set: 此組合包內含鋼背獸「重刺戰甲」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Barbed_Arm: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Heavy Barbed Armor'' set for Bristleback:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Awakened_Se: 此組合包內含敵法僧「覺醒戰士的遺產」套裝的全部物品及覺醒戰士的遺產載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Aw: Includes all of the items in the 'Legacy of the Awakened' set for Anti-Mage plus the Legacy of the Awakened loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Montenegro_National_Leagu: 蒙特內哥羅國家聯賽是蒙特內哥羅電競聯盟首次舉辦 Dota 2 聯賽。全國頂級戰隊將共同角逐冠軍大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Montenegro_Natio: Montenegro National League is the first professional Dota 2 league in Montenegro organized by Montenegro E-Sports Association. The best teams from country will compete for the championship and prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Raidcall_Southeast_Asian_: Raidcall 隆重推出東南亞超級，集結 16 支隊伍共同爭奪 $1,000 總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Raidcall_Southea: Raidcall presents the Southeast Asian Invitational League, featuring 16 of the best teams competing for $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Razer_Pinoy_Cup_Season_1: 8 支頂尖的菲律賓隊伍將爭奪價值 $1,000 的 Razer 遊戲裝備！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Razer_Pinoy_Cup_: The top 8 Filipino teams will compete for gaming equipment from Razer worth $1,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sudamerican_Master: 本賽事將集結 16 支來自南美的頂尖隊伍，10 支受邀隊伍及 6 支資格賽選拔隊伍。智力、秘魯、阿根廷、巴西、委內瑞拉及哥倫比亞的隊伍已蓄勢待發爭奪 $600 的獎勵！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sudamerican_Mast: This tournament will feature the top 16 South American teams;' 10 invited teams and 6 qualifying teams. Chile, Peru, Argentina, Brazil, Venezuela and Colombia squaring off for the award of more than $600!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_80_Battle_Point_Booster_5:
本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高 80% ；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 16% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_80_Battle_Point_:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Welcoming_Gift: <font color='#9da1a9'>點擊右鍵並選取「拆開禮物」來開啟。</font>
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Welcoming_Gift: <font color='#9da1a9'>Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Anguilla: 像鰻鱺這樣操縱電流堪比遣雷使的坐騎屈指可數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Anguilla: There are few mounts that handle the electric currents that surround Disruptor as well as Anguilla, the amphibious electric eel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Lina: 該物品會將預設的廣播語音替換為熱情如火的莉娜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Lina: This item replaces the Default announcer with the fiery attitude of Lina.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Serpent: 一片古老的神樹在糾結的荒獄叢林中心地帶生長著，其盤根錯節的樹根與枝幹中可能含有某种異常致命的蛇毒。而荒獄叢林的部落中有人說，用這片樹林的木材製作的弓上常常被注入蛇毒的結晶。在梅杜莎的復仇之手中，這把蛇魔之弓已然如同名中的毒蛇那般迅猛致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Serpe: A grove of ancient and magical trees rises from the tangled heart of the Yama Raskav Jungle, and in its gnarled roots and branches may be found a unique and singularly deadly species of viper. The tribes of Yama Raskav tell of a bow crafted from the wood of this grove, infused with the crystallized venom of the serpents which dwell there. In MedusaÃ¢ÂÂs vengeful hands, the Bow of the Serpent is as swift and deadly as the bite of the viper for which it is named.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cap_of_the_Fungal_Lord: 注入了祖輩菌蕈的精華。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cap_of_the_Funga: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Clash_of_Heroes_: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Commission_for_Legion_Com: 右鍵點擊軍團指揮官將其加入陣容。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Commission_for_L: Right-Click and use to add Legion Commander to the roster.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Romania_IV: 觀賞各個隊伍在第四屆 Dota 2 羅馬尼亞錦標賽中爭奪 100€ 的大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_R: The fourth Dota 2 Romania tournament where teams compete for a grand prize of over 100€!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sina_Cup_Supernov: 新浪盃超新星刀塔公開賽新賽季歸來！除 8 支受邀隊伍之外，將有 4 支資格賽選拔隊伍共同爭奪 65,000 人民幣總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sina_Cup: Sina Cup Supernova Dota 2 Open is back for another season! In addition to the 8 invited teams, 4 teams will advance through qualifiers to compete for a total prize pool of 65,000RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_Key: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>迎霜節的白霜寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Frosty Treasure of Frostivus</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coronet_of_the_Mortal_Coi: 克蘿貝露絲最華美的頭飾。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cryogenic_Embrac: Includes all of the items in the 'Cryogenic Embrace' set for Ursa plus the Ursa Cryogenic Embrace loading screen

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Romania_I: The fourth Dota 2 Romania tournament where teams compete for a grand prize of over 100 Euros!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Avernus: The Font of Avernus can see through the mist.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_Woods: 在一條古老小徑上，有著一個值得信任的密友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_Woods: A trusted friend on a well-worn path.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Foulfell_Shard: 散發著墮落深淵能量的黑色晶體。其中禁錮的惡魔發出無聲的悸動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Foulfell_Shard: A fragment of black crystal that radiates corrupting, abyssal energy. It throbs with the voiceless hatred of demons imprisoned within.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Formation: If you're spotted, it would be in your best interest not to freeze!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Moss_Cape_: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heaven_Sent: 當人們無邪地凝望著天堂傳送之杖洋溢的迷人光芒時，他們的靈魂受到了寧靜的洗禮，痛苦也隨之消除。奸邪惡人則無法承受這光輝。此物品是光之守衛的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heaven_Sent: When the innocent gaze upon Heaven Sent's internal glow, their souls are awash with tranquility and respite from pain. The wicked cannot bear its light. This is a weapon for Keeper of Light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ironwood_Arms_of_the_Fung: 注入了祖輩菌蕈的精華。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ironwood_Arms_of: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lina_Announcer_P: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the fiery attitude of Lina.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mastery_Gem: 此寶石嵌入物品後裝備該物品的英雄將更改技能效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mastery_Gem: This gem will modify an ability effect on the hero that wears the item it is socketed in.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Lina: 該組合包會將預設的連殺語音替換為聲音熱情奔放的莉娜。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Present_Dynamic:
一份保證內含至少一件稀有物品的貴重禮物。

請對它點擊右鍵並選取「拆開禮物」來開啟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Present_Dynamic:
A valuable present, guaranteed to contain at least a rare item.

Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Training: 此合成圖需要您收集 2 件普通品質物品以合成全新物品：巫醫的自訂嘲諷動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Training: This recipe requires you to collect 2 Common items to craft a new kind of item: A custom Taunt animation for Witch Doctor.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sermon_of_the_Fr: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Sermon of the Frozen Apostle' set for Abaddon:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shining_Booster_500_minut:
使用此物品來在冥魂之夜中獲取閃亮碎片。閃亮碎片可以用來兌換冥魂之夜的骨灰罈。

閃亮碎片加乘器的時效只會在您進行冥魂之夜遊戲模式時進行消耗，這個可以堆疊的加乘器每個都可將全隊所獲取的閃亮碎片數量提升10%。至於觀戰這類的功能則不算數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shining_Booster_:
Use this item to earn Shining Fragments in Wraith-Night. Shining Fragments can be redemeed for Wraith-Night Ossuaries.

Shining Booster minutes are only consumed when you play Wraith-Night and will grant a 10% stackable bonus to each of your cohorts. Features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Fungal_L: 注入了祖輩菌蕈的精華。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Fungal_Lord: 注入了祖輩菌蕈的精華。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Fun: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gama_Brothers: 轎伕兄弟只有一個目標，那就是穿過戰場將物品送給出價最高的人。他們的金色轎子減輕了戰士們裝備與補給的負擔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gama_Brother: The Gama Brothers are driven by one goal, to deliver goods across the battlefield to the highest bidder. With their golden palanquin they ease the burden of weary warriors with armaments and healing tonics.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_TP: 觀看 2013 年的 16 支世界頂級隊伍在國際錦標賽的舞臺一決高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch 2013's top 16 Dota teams from around the world compete in The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Artis: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>奴役工匠的寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的鑰匙並選擇想要開啟的寶藏箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of the Artisan Enthralled</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Artisan_E: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>奴役工匠寶藏鑰匙</font>才能夠開啟寶藏箱。您可以在 DOTA 2 商店購買。每一種不同的寶箱系列均包含不同的寶藏和裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key of the Artisan Enthralled</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest: 一個內容神秘的藏寶箱。您必須透過使用歡迎寶箱鑰匙才能開啟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest: A treasure chest with mysterious contents. You must use a Welcoming Chest Key to open this.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest_Key: 用來開啟上鎖的<font color='#9da1a9'>歡迎寶箱</font>。先在您的軍械庫對鑰匙雙擊滑鼠右鍵，然後選擇您想要開啟的對應寶箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest_: Used to open the locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Welcoming Chest</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Moss_Beard_of_the_Fu: 注入了祖輩菌蕈的精華。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Moss_Beard_: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Obelis_Set: 這些物品是和 Navi 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Obelis_: These items were created in partnership with Navi, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Ossuary: 一份來自君王的獨特禮物。冥魂之夜骨灰罈只能透過閃亮碎片來獲得。而閃亮碎片又只能透過啟用冥魂大帝的恩惠來獲得。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Ossu: A unique gift from the King. Wraith-Night Ossuaries can only be acquired with Shining Fragments.  Shining Fragments are earned by activiting a Wraith King's Favor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Tribute: 一份來自君王的珍貴禮物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Trib: A rare gift from the King.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Favor:
本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高 80% ；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 16% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Fav:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Battle_Point_Booster_:
1月3日後將不再銷售。本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高至 500% ；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 80% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Battle_Point:
Available until January 3rd. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 500% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kangdae_the_Dokkaebi:
死鬼來自韓國的民間故事。他們經常捉弄路上的行人並吹噓自己的摔跤技巧，但並無危險，只是很搞笑。

此物品與 Nexon 贊助聯賽聯合打造，每購買一張門票都會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kangdae_the_Dokk:
The dokkaebi are mischievous creatures in Korean folklore. They're known to play tricks on travelers and boast their wrestling skills, but are usually more humorous than harmful.

This item was created in partnership with Nexon Sponsorship League, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Prosperous_Battle_Poi:
2 月 20 日後將不再銷售。本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高至 500%；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 80% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Prosperous_B:
Available until February 20th. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 500% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fortunes_Favor: 使用此物品您獲得<font color='#fdd692'>火鹽元寶</font>的速率將在 500 分鐘遊戲時間內增加至 <font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font>。此外，您還將以同樣速率獲得<font color='#a1c6bd'>寒翠玉幣</font>並獲得其他玩家 <font color='#9da1a9'>20%</font> 的<font color='#fdd692'>火鹽元寶</font>和<font color='#a1c6bd'>寒翠玉幣</font>疊加速率加乘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fortunes_Favor: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#fdd692'>Flamesalt Ingots</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will earn <font color='#a1c6bd'>Jade Tokens</font> at an increased rate and you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>20%</font> bonus to their <font color='#fdd692'>Flamesalt Ingot</font> and <font color='#a1c6bd'>Jade Token</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GameLadders_Dota_2_League: GameLadders Dota 2 聯賽是由 GameLadders 主辦的賽事，打造斯裡蘭卡的 Dota 2 全新競技體驗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GameLadders_Dota: The GameLadders Dota 2 League is a competition by GameLadders in order to bring a first hand experience of online Dota 2 on a competitive level to Sri Lanka.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garbs_of_the_Eastern_Rang: 包含召喚師「悠遠東方法袍」套裝的全部物品、載入畫面及可選髮型和披風造型：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garbs_of_the_Eas: Includes all of the items in the \"Garbs of the Eastern Range\" set for Invoker including loading screen and alternate hair and wrap styles:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Godhorse: 在西方悲鳴的赤兔馬一直是一個謎，作為先祖軍隊最後的幸存者，它們的騎手都死在了刀劍與弓箭之下，只有這些頑強的駿馬逃入了它們世代居住生長的森林。這一匹赤兔被捕時還是小馬駒，但他完全展現出了先祖戰馬的氣勢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Godhorse: The Redhooves of the Western Wails were long thought a thing of myth.  The last survivors of an ancient army, their riders lost to sword and arrow, these hardy steeds returned to the wilds where they bred and grew more feral with each passing generation.   Caught young, this fiery Redhoof shows all the courage of its warsteed ancestors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Handful_of_Jade_Tokens: 解開禮物並獲得 50 枚寒翠玉幣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Handful_of_Jade_: Unpack this gift to earn 50 Jade Tokens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Healing_Fount_of_the_Lost: 消逝大地的治療之術從未失去其力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Healing_Fount_of: The healing arts of bygone lands have lost none of their potency.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Stone: 碎石的翻滾驚起大地的崩裂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Stone: From simple stones tumbles a raging landslide.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Green_Jade_Dragon: 翠玉小龍肩上的包裹裝滿了好運，將最美好的祝福帶給最英勇的戰士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Green_Jad: With a bag full of luck on its shoulder, the Little Green Jade Dragon brings good fortune to the worthiest of warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OscarCup_Tournament_Seeas: 各個隊伍將在奧斯卡盃中爭奪 $200 大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OscarCup_Tournam: Teams compete for a grand prize of $200 in the Oscar Cup!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pile_of_Flamesalt_Ingots: 拆開此禮物可獲得 300 個火鹽元寶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pile_of_Flamesal: Unpack this gift to earn 300 Flamesalt Ingots.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pile_of_Jade_Tokens: 解開禮物並獲得 150 枚寒翠玉幣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pile_of_Jade_Tok: Unpack this gift to earn 150 Jade Tokens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_New_Bloom_Artifact: 收集年獸的部位以完成此設計圖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_New_Bloom: Collect pieces of the Year Beast to complete this recipe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Seal_of_Vermilion_Renewal: 用於解開<font color='#9da1a9'>丹赤重生的寶藏</font>。雙擊或右擊軍械庫中的印記並選擇想要打開的寶藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Seal_of_Vermilio: Used to access the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Vermilion Renewal</font>. Double click or right-click the seal in your backpack and select the treasure you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Point_Boost:
本物品使用後，單場次遊戲戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高至 150% ；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 5% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Po:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 150% for a single match. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 5% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Balkan_Cup_Se: SteelSeries 巴爾幹盃現已開放，來自巴爾幹地區最具天賦的隊伍將共同爭奪 $1,000 總獎金及 Na'Vi 遊戲外設。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Balk: The SteelSeries Balkan Cup is an open tournament featuring the most talented Balkan teams competing for $1,000 USD worth of Na'Vi gaming gear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strength_of_the_Demon_Sto: 此組合包內含大地之靈「魔化古石之力」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strength_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in 'Strength of the Demon Stone' set for Earth Spirit plus loading screen:
