Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Butchers_Bro: These items were created in partnership with D2L, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_ESPL_Sea: The Electronic Sports Professionals League Season One is a three month long event where amateur teams will compete every week for $100 plus league points. The season will conclude with a finale comprising of two professional teams and the top 6 amateur teams all competing for a $5900 prize pool.

	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the ESPL Season 1.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_King_of_the_North: 曼徹斯特大學電競社為您帶來北方之王聯賽！網路資格賽將在 2 月 15 日及 22 日舉行。資格賽面向英國北部及威爾士的大學生開放。資格賽勝出者將受邀前往曼徹斯特參加今年 3 月 19 日舉行的線下決賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_King_of_: The University of Manchester E-Sports Society brings you King of the North! The online qualifier will run on February 15th and 22nd. Qualifiers are open to any teams made up from university students in the north of England and Wales. The finalists who emerge from these qualifiers will be invited to Manchester on March 19th this year to play in front of a live audience at the event.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: 韓國 Dota 聯賽（KDL）第 1 賽季將推出全新評級系統。KDL 將在四個賽季中累計 6,500,000 韓元的總獎金。全新的系統將為玩家帶來前進的動力，最終的獎金將與勝場相關。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents all new league for 2014, in partnership with SPOTV and KeSPA. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the very first season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in Tier 1 and 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: 韓國 Dota 聯賽（KDL）第 1 賽季將推出全新評級系統。KDL 將在四個賽季中累計 6,500,000 韓元的總獎金。全新的系統將為玩家帶來前進的動力，最終的獎金將與勝場相關。包含蔚藍雷獸信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: The KDL launches its first season featuring all new Tier system. The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 6.5 million worth of prize funding. The new winner system creates more incentive for players to win since prize money accumulates based on the number of wins. Includes the Blue Lightning courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: 韓國 Dota 聯賽（KDL）第 1 賽季將推出全新評級系統。KDL 將在四個賽季中累計 6,500,000 韓元的總獎金。全新的系統將為玩家帶來前進的動力，最終的獎金將與勝場相關。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Amateur_L: Netolic 業餘聯賽是一個免費開放讓全世界隊伍報名的賽事！本賽事每季都將持續 4 週，每月的基礎總獎金為 $1,100！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: The Netolic Amateur League is an open tournament where teams from all around the world are welcome to join for free! Each season will consist in 4 weekends, the base prize pool for this League is $1,100.00 monthly!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_2014_Season_O: 經過三個業餘聯賽，16 支巴西頂尖隊伍將為榮譽而戰，並爭奪南美最大的聯賽之一 SDL 的 1000 雷亞爾總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_2014: After three amateur leagues we have the top 16 Brazilian teams fighting for the trophy and R$1000,00 of SDL, one of the biggest Leagues of South America!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Zotac_Starleague_: Zotac Starleague 2014 是巴西最大的 Dota 2 錦標賽！總獎金也創下巴西歷史記錄（10,000 雷亞爾）！經過兩個資格賽，南美的 32 支頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Zotac_St: The Zotac Starleague 2014 is the biggest Brazilian Dota 2 Tournament ever! It has the biggest prize pool in the history of Brazilian Dota (R$ 10.000,00)! After two qualifiers 32 elite teams of South America will fight for the grand prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema 傾情奉獻 XMG 隊長徵召邀請賽！這是 Dota 2 歷史上首個以隊長徵召為比賽模式的大型賽事！參賽隊伍包括 Alliance、Na'Vi、Fnatic、RoX.KIS、Sigma.int 和 Team Liquid。各個隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 的總獎金！此門票僅用於觀看 XMG 隊長徵召邀請賽的比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_:
DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! 
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the XMG Captains Draft Invitational.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema 傾情奉獻 XMG 隊長徵召邀請賽！這是 Dota 2 歷史上首個以隊長徵召為比賽模式的大型賽事！參賽隊伍包括 Alliance、Na'Vi、Fnatic、RoX.KIS、Sigma.int 和 Team Liquid。各個隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 的總獎金！每張售出門票都將附贈榛榛信使並為總獎金增加 $1.25！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_: DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! Each ticket purchase includes JanJou courier and adds $1.25 to the total prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_League_Se: Netolic 業餘聯賽是一個免費開放讓全世界隊伍報名的賽事！本賽事每季都將持續 4 週，每月的基礎總獎金為 $1,100！此門票僅用於觀賞 Netolic 業餘聯賽第 1 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_:
The Netolic Amateur League is an open tournament where teams from all around the world are welcome to join for free! Each season will consist in 4 weekends, the base prize pool for this League is $1,100.00 monthly!
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Netolic Amateur League Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_League_Se: Netolic 業餘聯賽是一個免費開放讓全世界隊伍報名的賽事！本賽事每季都將持續 4 週，每月的基礎總獎金為 $1,100！包含卓爾遊俠的「近衛遊騎兵」套裝！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_One_Final: 經過三個業餘聯賽，16 支巴西頂尖隊伍將為榮譽而戰，並爭奪南美最大的聯賽之一 SDL 的 1000 雷亞爾總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_: After three amateur leagues we have the top 16 Brazilian teams fighting for the trophy and R$1000,00 of SDL, one of the biggest Leagues of South America!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_XMG_Captains_Draft_In: DotaCinema 傾情奉獻 XMG 隊長徵召邀請賽！這是 Dota 2 歷史上首個以隊長徵召為比賽模式的大型賽事！參賽隊伍包括 Alliance、Na'Vi、Fnatic、RoX.KIS、Sigma.int 和 Team Liquid。各個隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 的總獎金！每張售出門票都將附贈榛榛信使並為總獎金增加 $1.25！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_XMG_Captains: DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! Each ticket purchase includes JanJou courier and adds $1.25 to the total prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Zotac_Starleague_2014: Zotac Starleague 2014 是巴西最大的 Dota 2 錦標賽！總獎金也創下巴西歷史記錄（10,000 雷亞爾）！經過兩個資格賽，南美的 32 支頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪大獎！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zotac_Starleague: The Zotac Starleague 2014 is the biggest Brazilian Dota 2 Tournament ever! It has the biggest prize pool in the history of Brazilian Dota (R$ 10.000,00)! After two qualifiers 32 elite teams of South America will fight for the grand prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Zotac_Starleague_2014_Bun: Zotac Starleague 2014 是巴西最大的 Dota 2 錦標賽！總獎金也創下巴西歷史記錄（10,000 雷亞爾）！經過兩個資格賽，南美的 32 支頂尖隊伍將共同爭奪大獎！包含消逝之島的饋贈套裝！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zotac_Starleague: The Zotac Starleague 2014 is the biggest Brazilian Dota 2 Tournament ever! It has the biggest prize pool in the history of Brazilian Dota (R$10.000,00)! After two qualifiers 32 elite teams of South America will fight for the grand prize! Includes the Gifts of the Vanished Isle set!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Converted_Abundant_Fortunes_Fa: 轉換過的榮華華春玉佩
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Abundant_Fortun:
本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高 400% ；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 80% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Abunda:
Available until January 3rd. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 400% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Fortunes_Favor:
本物品使用後 500 遊戲分鐘數內，戰鬥點數的獲得速率將提高 80%；此外其他玩家的戰鬥點數獲得速度也將提高 16% ，效果可堆疊。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Fortun:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_4: CEVO 第 4 賽季是北美地區的業餘職業聯合賽事，各隊伍將在為期 8 周的常規賽季中同場競技，在接下來的淘汰賽中共同爭奪 $5,000 獎金，並有機會在後續賽季中進入更高級別賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_4: CEVO Season 4 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by playoffs for over $5,000 and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Season_1_: 華碩 ROG 夢幻聯賽第 1 賽季 -  管理員
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 華碩 ROG 夢幻聯賽由華碩 ROG、ROCCAT 和 TV6 聯合贊助。自2014 年 3 月 3 日開始，全球頂尖隊伍將在 84 場比賽及 2014 DreamHack 夏季賽的淘汰賽中共同爭奪 $100,000 的總獎金。購買聯賽手冊，增加獎金總量，暢玩夢幻聯盟！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 1 is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Starting on March 3rd, 2014 of the world's best teams will compete in 84 league matches and the playoffs at DreamHack Summer 2014 for a $100,000 prize pool. Purchase the Compendium, increase the prize pool, and play the Fantasy League!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forge_of_Iron_Will:
鋼鐵的面具下是鋼鐵的意志

此物品為紀念 Valve 的紀錄片《Free to Play》與 Fear 聯手打造，每出售一份他都將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forge_of_Iron_Wi:
An iron mask for an iron will.

These items commemorate the release of Valve's documentary, Free to Play, and were created in partnership with Fear, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_to_Play_Collectors_P:
此物品為紀念 Valve 的紀錄片《Free to Play》。每出售一份影片中的下列選手都將獲得分成 - Danil 'Dendi' Ishutin、Clinton 'Fear' Loomis 和 Benedict 'hyhy' Lim。

此組合包内涵斯溫「鐵志之鑄」套裝、帕吉「血鴉之屠」套裝、末日使者「地獄之冕」套裝中的全部物品，以及獨家守衛「廣角鏡頭」、信使「膠捲仔」和 HUD 介面「景深」：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_to_Play_Col:
These items commemorate the release of Valve's 'Free to Play' documentary. A portion of the purchase will go toward the players featured in the film - Danil 'Dendi' Ishutin, Clinton 'Fear' Loomis and Benedict 'hyhy' Lim.

The bundle includes all of the items in the 'Forge of Iron Will' set for Sven, the 'Murder of Crows' set for Pudge, the 'Crown of Hells' set for Doom and the exclusive 'Wide Angle' Ward, 'Filmtail' Courier and 'Depth of Field' HUD:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gombangdae_Dosa: 包含黑暗賢哲「長菸斗賢哲」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gombangdae_Dosa: Includes all of the items in the 'Gombangdae Dosa' set for Dark Seer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Murder_of_Crows:
看到他最好閉嘴。

此物品為紀念 Valve 的紀錄片《Free to Play》與 Dendi 聯手打造，每出售一份他都將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Murder_of_Crows:
Shoulda' kept your beak out of this.

These items commemorate the release of Valve's documentary, Free to Play, and were created in partnership with Dendi, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Brazil_Rei_de_Mesa: 來自巴西的隊伍將相互角逐爭奪巴西 Dota 2 之王的頭銜！每週都將有來自資格賽的挑戰者向上週的王者發起挑戰。衛冕成功的隊伍將獲得 Ozone Gaming 的外設獎品。此組合包內含 ESL Rei de Mesa HUD 介面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Brazil_Rei_d: Teams from Brazil fight to decide who's becomes the Dota 2 Brazilian king. After the rise of the first king every week a new contestant appears from a qualifier and tries to become the new king. Everytime the king team wins they will receive prizes from Ozone Gaming. Bundle includes the Rei de Mesa HUD!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Brazil_Rei_de_Mesa_Ti: 來自巴西的隊伍將相互角逐爭奪巴西 Dota 2 之王的頭銜！每週都將有來自資格賽的挑戰者向上週的王者發起挑戰。衛冕成功的隊伍將獲得 Ozone Gaming 的外設獎品。此門票僅用於觀賞 ESL 巴西 Rei de Mesa 的全部賽事。

After the rise of the first king every week a new contestant appears from a qualifier and tries to become the new king. Everytime the king team wins they will receive prizes from Ozone Gaming. This ticket only gives you access to view games in the ESL Brazil Rei de Mesa.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema 傾情奉獻 XMG 隊長徵召邀請賽！這是 Dota 2 歷史上首個以隊長徵召為比賽模式的大型賽事！參賽隊伍包括 Alliance、Na'Vi、Fnatic、RoX.KIS、Sigma.int 和 Team Liquid。各個隊伍將共同爭奪 $20,000 的總獎金！每張售出門票都將附贈榛榛信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_: DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! Each ticket purchase includes JanJou courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions_League_S: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽第 2 賽季將集結 10 支來自歐洲和北美的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪 $50,000 總獎金！此門票僅用於觀看 Dota 2 冠軍聯賽的全部比賽。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_Season_4: Dota 聯盟迴歸，10 支北美業餘隊伍將在一個月的時間內每週進行三場比賽，共同爭奪 $400 獎金。此門票內含餘燼之靈的淬煉之刃和精煉之刃對劍套裝！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Bucharest_2014_: 四支世界頂尖 Dota2 隊伍將在 2014 年 Dreamhack 布加勒斯特邀請賽上激烈對抗。基礎獎金為 $25,000，每份出售的門票都將為總獎金增加 $2.50！此門票僅用於觀賞 2014 年 Dreamhack 布加勒斯特邀請賽的全部比賽。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota_Third_Chapter: 來自獨立國協地區頂尖半職業隊伍將共同爭奪 $3,500 總獎金。此組合包內含 Dota 英雄：第三章門票及大地之靈的寧靜之石套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota_Third_: The top semi-pro teams from the CIS region compete for a $3500 prize pool. This bundle gives you access to view games from the Hero Dota: Third Chapter Tournament and the Stone Tranquility Earth Spirit Bundle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota_Third_Chapter_T: 來自獨立國協地區頂尖半職業隊伍將共同爭奪 $3,500 總獎金。此門票僅用於觀賞 Dota 英雄：第三章的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota_Third_: The top semi-pro teams from the CIS region compete for a $3500 prize pool. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Hero Dota: Third Chapter Tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insatiable_Bonesaw: 器械與殘骸的恐怖組合。貪得無厭骨鋸上密布着巨龍的牙齒，能夠輕易鋸穿最堅固的鎧甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insatiable_Bones: A hideous combination of machine and castoff body parts, the Insatiable Bonesaw uses a reticulating row of dragon’s teeth to saw through even the most stubborn of armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_Season_4_E: Dota 聯盟第 4 賽季迴歸，10 支歐洲業餘隊伍將在一個月的時間內共同爭奪 $400 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_S: League of Dota returns with a fourth season for amateur European teams! Teams compete in 10 tournaments over one month for a total prize pool of $400.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Argentina_Dota_2: 各個隊伍將在阿根廷聯賽中爭做阿根廷冠軍！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Argentina_D: Teams will compete in the Argentina League to become champions in Argentina!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Logitech_G_Challenge: 面向馬來西亞頂尖隊伍的公開賽事，共同爭奪 $2,000 現金大獎及 Logitech 外設！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Logitech_G_Chall: An open tournament for all the best teams in Malaysia to compete for a total prize pool of $2,000 cash including gear from Logitech!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_Double_Dash_Tournamen: 由星雲聯盟（SCL）舉辦的業餘 Dota  2 錦標賽。戰隊可自由報名並在兩週時間內爭奪 $150 總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_Double_Dash_: Amateur Dota 2 Tournament of the Star Cloud League. Free and Open for everyone with a total prize pool of over 150$ in two weeks!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Steelseries_Oceania_Cup_S: 2014 年 Steelseries 大洋洲盃將見證來自澳大利亞及大洋洲地區的頂尖隊伍共同爭奪價值 $1,000 的外設獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Steelseries_Ocea: The 2014 Steelseries Oceania Cup will see top teams from across Australia and the Oceanic region compete for Dota 2 gear worth $1,000.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Trash_King_of_the_Hi: Dota Trash King of the Hill 每週三舉行。The King of the Hill 將對戰 Dota Trash 選擇的挑戰者，在三局兩勝的比賽中贏得 $100 獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Trash_King_: Dota Trash King of the Hill takes place every Wednesday.  The King of the Hill faces the challenger selected by Dota Trash staff in a best of three format where $100 will go to the winner.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Season_2: 來自南美的 16 支頂尖隊伍將在巨齒鯊盃第 2 賽季中共同爭奪 1200 雷亞爾總獎金！組合包內含聖憶古廟介面及載入畫面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Se: The top 16 teams in South America compete in the second seasno of the Megalodon Cup for R$1200! Bundle includes the Temple of the Sacred Memories HUD skin and loading screen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Season_2_Ti: 來自南美的 16 支頂尖隊伍將在巨齒鯊盃第 2 賽季中共同爭奪 1200 雷亞爾總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞巨齒鯊盃第 2 賽季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Se: The top 16 teams in South America compete in the second season of the Megalodon Cup for R$1200! This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Megalodon Cup Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pro_Dota_2_Solo_Ranked_Le: Dota 2 獨鬥積分聯賽第 3 賽季將集結 240 名玩家進行兩個不同的聯賽（業餘及半職業），透過未來兩週不間斷的比賽爭奪 $200 總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞 Dota 2 獨鬥積分聯賽的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pro_Dota_2_Solo_:
Season 3 returns in the Pro Dota 2 Solo Ranked League where 240 players fight in 2 different leagues (Amateur and Semi-Pro) non-stop for 2 weeks to claim the prize up to $200!
	
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Pro Dota 2 Solo Ranked League Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Cloud9: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Clo: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit: The Summit 是個世界級的 Dota 2 活動。來自歐洲、美洲以及亞洲的頂尖隊伍將藉由線上賽爭取資格。脫穎而出的前四強將飛往洛杉磯挑戰 Na'Vi 和 DK 這兩支直接獲邀隊伍，藉由線下賽來跟他們爭奪為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金！每張出售的門票都將為總獎金增加 $2.50！此組合內含 DotaTV 門票，還有斧王的「先驅戰神」套裝和載入畫面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! Each ticket purchased increases the prize pool by $2.50! Bundle includes the DotaTV ticket, Harbinger of War Axe set, and loading screen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_Ticket: The Summit 是個世界級的 Dota 2 活動。來自歐洲、美洲以及亞洲的頂尖隊伍將藉由線上賽爭取資格。脫穎而出的前四強將飛往洛杉磯挑戰 Na'Vi 和 DK 這兩支直接獲邀隊伍，藉由線下賽來跟他們爭奪為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞 The Summit 的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_Ticke: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in The Summit.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_Season_1: VietDOTA 聯賽第 1 季是個有著 32 支戰隊參與的線上賽，它會以雙淘汰賽制決定越南地區的前六大 Dota 戰隊是誰。有著為數 $1000 的總獎金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_180_Battle_Point_Booster_:
使用此物品能連續 500 分鐘給予您額外 180% 的戰鬥點數加成 。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 16% 戰鬥點數加成。

戰鬥點數的加成效果持續時間只有在獲得戰鬥點數的過程中才會被消耗，在遊戲內觀戰或者作為教練指導並不會消耗加成時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_180_Battle_Point:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 180% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Item_Trea: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_Ba: 使用此物品能在國際錦標賽結束以前給予您額外 <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> 的 <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。除此之外，與您一同進行遊戲的玩家們都會獲得可疊加的 <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> <font color='#9da1a9'>戰鬥點數</font>加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> until the end of the International. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Guard: 斧王從奧達隆最後的幸存者冰冷的手中接過了這把巨斧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Guard: A blade taken from the cold dead hand of the last of the Red Guard of Ogdaroon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroomling: 在淹沒之森中的所有真菌中，小樹蘑以其對大自然的無畏和對陰暗潮濕的喜愛而聲名遠揚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroomling: Among all the shuffling fungi of Drowned Forest, Shroomlings are renowned for their fearless nature and love of all things dank and dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Zephyr: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Zep: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Triumph: Many will fight.  Few will achieve immortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Private_Games_Brazil_Girl: 巴西首屆 Dota 2 女子聯賽，有著獎金和寶藏鑰匙作為比賽獎品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Private_Games_Br: The first female Dota 2 tournament in Brazil where teams will compete for a cash prize and treasure keys!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_: 此為保加利亞業餘聯賽的第 2 個賽季。這次將有著高達 50 支的隊伍彼此爭奪勝負和獎金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_MarsTV_Dota_Elite_Invitational: MDL 華西盃國際精英邀請賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Championship_Seaso: 32 支南美隊伍將在此賽事爭取 YoDota 錦標賽第 2 賽季中的 8 個席次。取得資格的隊伍將與另外 8 支直接受邀隊伍交戰，爭取價值超過 $700 的獎品。此門票內含 YoDota 錦標賽第 2 賽季載入畫面，以及能供於觀賞 YoDota 錦標賽第 2 賽季全部比賽的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Champions: 32 teams from South America compete to earn one of eight qualifying spots in the second season of the YoDota Championship. The qualifiers will fight against eight invited teams for over $700 in prizes! Bundle includes the YoDota Championship Season 2 loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Championship_Seaso: 32 支南美隊伍將在此賽事爭取 YoDota 錦標賽第 2 賽季中的 8 個席次。取得資格的隊伍將與另外 8 支直接受邀隊伍交戰，爭取價值超過 $700 的獎品。此門票僅用於觀賞 YoDota 錦標賽第 2 賽季的全部比賽。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Cascade: 披風採自隨風而散的花蕊，由魔法蜉蝣編織而成，可謂是集萬千美感與一身，而且出乎意料得實用。她穿上這件披風后，風永遠在背後助陣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Cascade: A cape woven from the finest wind-strewn filaments of enchanted ephemera, this is a garment of both rare beauty and unexpected utility.  For she who wears the cape of the Sylvan Cascade, the wind will be always at her back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Strongbox: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏所蘊藏著無法比擬的價值。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League: 32 支職業和半職業隊將在此對戰，爭奪為數 $1000 的總獎金。此門票將內含帕吉的「原力之鉤」物品，並能供於觀賞 GG 聯賽的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League: 32 professional and semi-professional teams battle it out for the $1000 prize pool. This ticket gives access to view games from the GG League and the Force Hook for Pudge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pennant_ViCi_Gami: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Series: Dota 2 山丘之王賞金獵人係列賽回歸！兩隻受邀隊伍將要共同爭奪 $1000 大獎的機會。組合包内含信使鸚鵡雷克！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Se: The Dota 2 King of the Hill Bounty Hunter Series returns! Two invited teams teams to go head-to-head for a chance to win $1000. Bundle includes Raiq courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Esports_Tourname: 看著東南亞中的最強 Dota 2 戰隊們互相對戰，爭奪為數 $2,400 的總獎金和打入 GEST 挑戰賽的晉升機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Esports: Watch the best Dota 2 teams from South-East Asia battle it out for the $2,000 prize pool and to earn their spot in the GEST Challenge.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_4_WTS_1v1: 這次的 AD2L 週末系列賽將藉助 Valve 最新加入遊戲的模式而得以順利回歸至此系列的原始進行方式：一對一中路單挑賽，和替換聯賽系列。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_4_WT: Home of the AD2L's Weekend Tournament Series featuring a 1v1 mid and the Alternative Tournament Series for friendly tournaments using Valve's newest game modes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Summit_Ticket: The Summit 是個世界級的 Dota 2 活動。來自歐洲、美洲以及亞洲的頂尖隊伍將藉由線上賽爭取資格。脫穎而出的前四強將飛往洛杉磯挑戰 Na'Vi 和 DK 這兩支直接獲邀隊伍，藉由線下賽來跟他們爭奪為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞 The Summit 的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Summ: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in The Summit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit__No_Contributi: The Summit 是個世界級的 Dota 2 活動。來自歐洲、美洲以及亞洲的頂尖隊伍將藉由線上賽爭取資格。脫穎而出的前四強將飛往洛杉磯挑戰 Na'Vi 和 DK 這兩支直接獲邀隊伍，藉由線下賽來跟他們爭奪為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金！此組合內含 DotaTV 門票，還有斧王的「先驅戰神」套裝和載入畫面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit__No_C: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! Bundle includes the DotaTV ticket, Harbinger of War Axe set, and loading screen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_Season_1: 第 1 季的財運之戰聯賽將會聚集 16 支隊伍，並提供為數 3,600 盧布的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_: The first season of Wars of Fortune puts 16 teams against each other fighting for 3600 Rubles!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Challenge_Ticket: 看著東南亞中的最強 Dota 2 戰隊們互相為高達 $10,000 美金的總獎金而戰。本賽事由 Gigabyte 贊助，由 Beyondthesummit 提供賽評。此門票僅用於觀賞 GEST 挑戰賽的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Challenge_T: Watch as the best teams in China and SEA battle it out for a prize pool of 10,000USD. Sponsored by Gigabyte. Commentary will be provided by Beyondthesummit. This ticket will only give you access to view games from the GEST Challenge.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beaver_Knight_Bundle: 包含有著多種替換造型的「海狸騎士」信使和載入畫面。這些物品是和 SingSing 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beaver_Knight_Bu: Includes the 'Beaver Knight' courier with multiple styles plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with SingSing, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bestowments_of_the_Divine: 此組合包內含昆卡「鎮海聖錨的禮物」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bestowments_of_t: Contains all of the items in the 'Bestowments of the Divine Anchor' set for Kunkka plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodrage_Axe: 在歐梅克斯的試煉之地上，勝利者有權奪走手下敗將的武器。布拉德威登拿走這把血怒巨斧，只為紀念他的第一百次勝利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodrage_Axe: On the proving grounds of Omex, the victorious have right to the weapons of any warrior they vanquish.  This Bloodrage Axe was taken by the Bradwarden in remembrance of his 100th victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cadenza_Magic_Master: 此組合包内含祈求者「華彩大魔師」套裝中的全部物品，附贈載入畫面和自訂熔爐精靈樣式。這些物品是與 LGD-Gaming 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cadenza_Magic_Ma: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Cadenza Magic Master' set for Invoker plus loading screen and custom forge spirit. These items were created in partnership with LGD-Gaming, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cicatrix_Regalia: 包含夜神刺客「葉痕徽記」套裝的全部物品，包含四種不同樣式
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cicatrix_Regalia: Includes all items in the 'Cicatrix Regalia' set for Nyx Assassin and includes 4 different styles:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artisan_of_Havoc: 此組合包包含發條技師「浩劫技師」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artisan_: Contains all of the items in the 'Artisan of Havoc' set for Clockwerk plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dragonfire: 包含莉娜「炎龍之焰」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dragonfi: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragonfire' set for Lina plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Dryad: 如果那位古代的法師指導這把神杖的腐蝕之力將會對世界產生怎樣的衝擊，那麽他一定會把它焚燒掩埋，再向那被詛咒的焚坑中撒鹽。如果阿哈利姆神杖落入了石拳手中，它將會釋放森之妖精，敵人將無一幸免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Dryad: Had the ancient mage but known what corruption his scepter would inflict upon the world, he would have burned and buried it, and sown salt over its cursed grave.  For when carried in a fist of stone, Aghanim's scepter unleashes the spirit of the Crystal Dryad, and no foe is safe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Scavenger: 包含米波「晶礦清道伕」套裝的全部物品，附贈技能圖示和載入畫面。這些物品是與 Fnatic 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Scavenge: Contains all of the items in the 'Crystal Scavenger' set for Meepo including ability icons and loading screen. These items were created in conjunction with Team Fnatic, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Angel: 此組合包內含痛苦女王「黑暗天使」套裝的全部物品以及載入畫面。這些物品是和 SOLO 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Angel: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dark Angel' set for Queen of Pain. These items were created in partnership with SOLO, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Reef_Escape: 包含斯拉克「暗礁流亡者」套裝中的全部物品，附贈載入畫面。這些物品是與 Team Empire 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Reef_Escape: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dark Reef Escape' set for Slark plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Team Empire, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diabolical_Appendages: 惡魔之附上包含邪惡魔法，充斥著夢魘之物，僅是它的外表就足以讓許多人陷入癲狂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Diabolical_Appen: A demon magic most foul, these diabolical appendages are the stuff of nightmares, and have driven many to madness just by their appearance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonfire: 包含莉娜「炎龍之焰」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonfire: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragonfire' set for Lina plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragons_Ascension: 此組合包内含龍騎士「神龍飛升」套裝中的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragons_Ascensio: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dragon's Ascension' set for Dragon Knight plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Everlasting_Heat: 此組合包內含莉娜「永恆熱力」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。這些物品是和 DD 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Everlasting_Heat: Includes all of the items in the 'Everlasting Heat' set for Lina. These items were created in partnership with DD, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Geodesic_Eidolon: 就連虛靈也非生來平等。有些虛靈是在宇宙中連光也無法逃離的黑暗中心由多個奇異的重力場不斷拉扯鍛製而成。宛如劃過彎曲空間的測地線一般，這些虛靈將會成為您的敵人最短的死路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Geodesic_Eidolon: Not all eidolons are created equal.  Some are forged of strange gravities in the dark heart of the universe where even light cannot escape.  Like lines across curved space, they provide the shortest distance to your enemy's death.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavenly_General: 包含風暴之霛「天蓬元帥」套裝中的全部物品及載入畫面。這些物品是與 ZSMJ 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavenly_General: Contains all of the items in the 'Heavenly General' set for Storm Spirit plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with ZSMJ, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_with_No_Name: 包含賞金獵人「無名獵人」套裝中的所有物品及載入畫面。這些物品是與 Funn1k 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_with_No_N: Includes all of the items in the 'Hunter with No Name' set for Bounty Hunter plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Funn1k, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_League_Seaso: Nexon 為您呈獻加入了 SpotTV 和 KeSPA 的韓國 Dota 聯賽第 2 季。新加入的參賽隊伍將分派至各自不同的位階。韓國 Dota 聯賽將持續 4 個賽季，有著高達 650 萬韓元的獎金。此組合包內含「騎士雕像」守衛造型，以及斯拉克「深海惡棍」套裝！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_Lea: Nexon presents the second season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier.  The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 6.5million ($6,370) worth of prize money. Bundle includes the Knight Statue ward and Deep Sea Scoundrel Slark set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_League_Seaso: Nexon 為您呈獻有著 SpotTV 和 KeSPA 加持第二期韓國 Dota 聯賽。新加入的參賽隊伍將分派至各自不同的位階。韓國 Dota 聯賽將持續 4 個賽季，有著高達 6.5 億韓元的獎金。觀賞第 1 階和第 2 階中的前 10 強隊伍在 KDL 第 4 季中對決。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_Lea: Nexon presents the second of KDL with SpoTV and KeSPA, Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million ($638,506) worth of prize money. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mystic_Instruments_of_Tan: 此組合包内含暗影薩滿「童乩祕器」套裝中的全部物品及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mystic_Instrumen: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Mystic Instruments of Tang-Ki' set for Shadow Shaman plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Oculopus: 這些在星體研究中長期受挫的章魚其實從古代開始便从試圖了解周圍的世界和它們在宇宙中的地位。研究的突破出現在某一天，一片神聖科技之物從天神那裏飄落，這份聖潔的禮物能夠解開世界的秘密。就這樣，獨眼章魚聲名鵲起，成爲家喻戶曉的偉大天文學傢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Oculopus: Long-thwarted in their astrological studies, Octopi have since time immemorial sought to better understand the world around them and their place in the larger universe.  The breakthrough came when a powerful piece of divine technology drifted down from the gods above, an anointed gift, that the secrets of the world be unlocked.  Thus did Oculopus rise to prominence, the greatest underwater astronomer that the world had ever known.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Relic_Sword: 就像殘疾的戰士會對著並不存在的肢體瘙癢，這把神聖遺物也有難忍之癢。只有鮮血才能讓它感到舒爽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Relic_Sword: As a maimed warrior might scratch an itch on a phantom limb, so too the Relic Sword has its own itch to scratch.  And only blood will satisfy.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Witch_Hunter: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Witch Hunter' set for Anti-Mage plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Navi, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Possible_Heroes_Cup_Seaso: Possible Heroes 盃第 1 季將有著 16 支隊伍參與，以及多達 300 件的遊戲稀有物品作為獎品。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rainmaker: 這把弓取材自西方森林中最高的那棵樹。據説這棵樹直上雲端，才得此神力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rainmaker: This bow is crafted from the wood of tallest tree in all of the Western forests. It is said that the tree's branches reach the rain clouds, giving the the bow its power.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Season_1_: 華碩 ROG 夢幻聯賽 - 獎金終結
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 1 - No Contribution
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 華碩 ROG 夢幻聯賽由華碩 ROG、ROCCAT 和 TV6 聯合贊助。自 2014 年 3 月 3 日開始，全球頂尖隊伍將在 84 場比賽及 2014 DreamHack 夏季賽的淘汰賽中共同爭奪 $100,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 1 is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Starting on March 3rd, 2014 of the world's best teams will compete in 84 league matches and the playoffs at DreamHack Summer 2014 for a $100,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladesrunner: 包含劍聖「刃行者」套裝中的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladesrunner: Contains all of the items in the 'Bladesrunner' set for Juggernaut:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5: CEVO 第 5 賽季是個將持續 8 週的北美賽事。其淘汰賽將提供為數 $1,000 的獎金，以及在未來的賽季中晉升至更高技術分區的機會。組合包內含劍聖的「刃行者」飾品套裝，且將隨著每售出一份使賽事獎金增加 $1.25。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5: CEVO Season 5 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. Bundle includes the Bladesrunner Juggernaut set and gives $1.25 to the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5_Ticket: CEVO 第 5 賽季是個將持續 8 週的北美賽事。其淘汰賽將提供為數 $1,000 的獎金，以及在未來的賽季中晉升至更高技術分區的機會。此門票僅用於觀賞 CEVO 第 5 賽季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5_Ti: CEVO Season 5 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This ticket only gives you access to view games from CEVO Season 5.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Tears: 正如變體精靈同時存在于凡間與天界兩大位面，虛淚之刃也一樣是變化多端的武器，虛非虛，無非無。只有亡者的淚滴才是真實的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Tears: Just as Morphling exists on two planes at once--both terrene and astral--the blade of tears is a weapon of extreme versatility, both ethereal and not.  Only the tears of the slain are real.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Wolf_Hunter: 內含德魯伊「狼獵者套裝」的所有物品及靈熊、真實形態的載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Wolf: Contains all of the items in 'The Wolf Hunter' set for Lone Druid plus Spirit Bear, True Form and loading screens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean: 天怒一族流傳著一個莎爾德拉的傳説，她揮舞著黑色的雙翼想要前往更加漆黑的天空，希望能夠面見天上的諸神。她歸來的時候全身披覆著金色羽毛，手持聖潔的蒼天之刺。據説她的王國延續了千年又一年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean: 'Tis told among Skywrath-kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean, a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom endured for a thousand years and one.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Genuine_Shadow_Flame: 包含戴佐「暗影烈焰」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。內含的頭巾部件有替換樣式可選。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Genuine_Shadow_F: Includes all of the items in the 'Shadow Flame' set for Dazzle plus an additional style for the Headdress and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Newbee: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_New: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dormant_2014_Compendium_Gem: 沈靜的 2014 年互動手冊寶石
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Bestowments_of_: Promo Bestowments of the Divine Anchor
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Ensemble_of_the_Crystall: 促銷 冰晶彗星禮服
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Ensemble_of_the: Promo Ensemble of the Crystalline Comet
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Guardian_of_the_Eternal_: 促銷 永恆之季守衛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Guardian_of_the: Promo Guardian of the Eternal Seasons
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Lord_of_the_Scouring_Dun: 促銷 沙丘之蝕領主
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Lord_of_the_Sco: Promo Lord of the Scouring Dunes
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Mentor_of_the_H: Promo Mentor of the High Plains
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_The_Boreal_WatchReforged: 促銷 加強版北風之查
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Vengeance_of_the_Sunwarr: 促銷 驕陽戰士的復仇
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Vestments_of_the_Fallen_: 促銷 隕落公主華服
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Vestments_of_th: Promo Vestments of the Fallen Princess
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_WarVestments_of_the_Magn: 促銷 半人犀牛戰爭法袍
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Champions_: Champions League Season 2 將會有多達 10 支的歐美頂尖戰隊參予相互爭奪 50,000 獎金！此門票將只會給您 Champion's League 的觀賽權。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: Champions League Season 2 will feature 10 top teams from Europe and North America fighting for $50,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Dota 2 Champion's League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_of_the_S: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Doomling: 末日小子來也，一隻走過焦土卻未被大火吞噬的信使。他的個頭雖然矮了好幾截，但他仍舊是路西法，熱烈的黑暗君主。而以他的這種來歷來看，光是做為您的信使就足以讓末日降臨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Doomling: Fear Doomling, the courier who burns and is not consumed.  What he lacks in size, he makes up for by being Lucifer, fiery lord of Darkness.  For One such as Doomling, being your courier is hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hwytty__Shyzzyrd: 『這次遲到是意外！』年邁的老騎士沙啞地嘟噥著，但他的話並沒有減輕詛咒——妻子的不悅。突然，這對始終拖拉的拍檔發現雙方互換身體了！儘管渾身都是老毛病，基拉還是背上了沉重的行囊。看著那頂魔法帽就知道他們的關係了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hwytty__Shyzzyrd: \"We encountered unexpected delays!\" the old rider croaked, but his words did nothing to lessen the curse-wife's displeasure. In an instant, the perpetually tardy partnership found itself vendor-swapped! Despite his many infirmities, the elder Hwytty must now strap on Shyzzyrd's saddlebags. And it's plain to see who wears the magic hat in this relationship!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtus_Werebear: 此信使包含多種樣式，是與 Virtus.Pro 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtus_Werebear: This courier includes multiple styles and was created in partnership with Virtus.Pro, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Titan: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Tit: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Doomling: 末日小子來也，一隻走過焦土卻未被大火吞噬的信使。他的個頭雖然矮了好幾截，但他仍舊是路西法，熱烈的黑暗君主。而以他的這種來歷來看，光是做為您的信使就足以讓末日降臨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Doomling: Fear Doomling, the courier who burns and is not consumed.  What he lacks in size, he makes up for by being Lucifer, fiery lord of Darkness.  For One such as Doomling, being your courier is hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean: 天怒一族流傳著一個莎爾德拉的傳説，她揮舞著黑色的雙翼想要前往更加漆黑的天空，希望能夠面見天上的諸神。她歸來的時候全身披覆著金色羽毛，手持聖潔的蒼天之刺。據説她的王國延續了千年又一年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean: 'Tis told among Skywrath kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom lasted for a thousand years and one.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelmaw: 大地之力創造萬物，也能將他們碾做塵土，徹底毀滅。史前石巨人建立的城池，如今已經化爲一望無際的卵石之海。石海中心裂開一條溝壑，其中充滿了數不盡的砂石碎礫。只有一根石柱的一小段，依然保留著這段古老文明消亡的印記。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelma: That which the strength of earth may create, the strength of earth may destroy, chewed into dust by shifting rock. Where once, in a time before knowledge of time, great stone giants built their cities, now lies an endless sea of pebbles. At its center yawns a great fissure, filled with the gravel remains of the countless many. Only a single segment of a single pillar remains to mark a grave for this ancient civilization.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing_Crest: 直面狹窄迷宮的守衛就是放棄輪回。但世間就是有人敢與命運抗爭，與折磨抗爭，一次次被擊倒。不久他們便發現自己在最黑暗的冥河之上，命運無常不斷飄搖，生生世世如此。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing: To face the guardians of the Narrow Maze is to deny eternity itself. Yet there are those who would dare defy their fate and strike at the source of their torment, only to be thrown down time and again. These insolent few may soon find themselves flung to the darkest reaches of the herebetween, and left to wander fateless, for all eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull: 這是什麽奇怪的野獸？原來是弗魯爾，一直忠誠的四足搬運工。她是一只野獸，她更是一位女士，你的貨物對於她永遠不是負擔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull: What strange beast is this? Why, it's Frull--faithful four- footed freighter of mercantile wares. She may be a beast but she's also a lady, and your goods are never a burden to her!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forcipule: 基迪島最黑暗的 叢林正式可怕生物的家園。作爲濺毒蟲的遠方親戚，飛濺蜈蚣經常在這些樹根之間潮濕的縫隙中生長。它們一身都固定在一個地方，時常向周圍噴射毒液，如果有愚蠢的神物在附近徘徊，那麽定然是要命喪黃泉，慢慢被消化。一旦靈魂出竅，腐化的屍體就會迅速被周圍的土地吸收，以便蜈蚣再次汲取它們的營養。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forc: The darkest wilds of Jidi Isle are home to wondrous horrors. A distant relative to the Spitterpede family, the Splattering Forcipule can often be found growing in damp crevices or between the roots of trees. They will spend their entire lives bound to a single location, and the toxic venom they eject upon any creature foolish enough wander nearby is often more than sufficient to poison the hapless victim, as well as begin its digestion. Once this poor soul expires, their melting remains are quickly absorbed into the earth where they fall, allowing the Forcipule's subterranean root-tendrils to absorb the nutrients.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Champions_Chest: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Champions_Chest: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_of_Radia: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 加拿大盃回來了！這次將會有來自北美和南美的傑出隊伍參與其中。此組合包還內含了一隻小白熊信使，有著曲棍球棒樣式可進行切換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. This bundle includes the Bearzky courier, now with added Skatestick style!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 加拿大盃回來了！這次將會有來自北美和南美的傑出隊伍參與其中。此門票僅用於觀賞 Dota 2 加拿大盃第 3 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Dota 2 Canada Cup Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Latino_Cup_Season_: Dota 2 Latino 步入全新的第二季並加入了對 DreamLive TV 的支援，在這次將會有 32 支拉丁美洲隊伍參戰為 $300 的頭獎相互較量！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Latino_Cu: Dota 2 Latino enters its second season with support from DreamLive TV and will feature 32 Latin American teams competing for a grand prize of $300!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gamersportperu_Season_6: Gamersportperu 第六季將會有 32 支隊伍參加以及 2,000 新祕魯幣的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gamersportperu_S: 32 teams will compete in the sixth season of Gamersportperu with a prize pool of 2,000 Peruvian Nuevos!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Judge_of_the_Battlefield: 此組合包內含軍團指揮官「戰場審判官」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Judge_of_the_Bat: Includes all of the items in 'Judge of the Battlefield' set for Legion Commander:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_3: Dota 2 加拿大盃第 3 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_3_Tic: Dota 2 加拿大盃第 3 季門票
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Conceit_of_the_Wandering_Harle: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩的傲杖
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Array_of_Tranquility: 此組合包內含風行者「靜謐之服」套裝的全部物品以及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Array_of_Tranqui: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Array of Tranquility' set for Windranger plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Nymph: 此組合包內含帕克「永恆仙女」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Nymph: Contains all of the items in the 'Eternal Nymph' set for Puck plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Father_of_the_Forest: 此組合包內含自然先知「森林之父」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。武器會散發出特殊的氛圍粒子特效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Father_of_the_Fo: Includes all of the items in the 'Father of the Forest' set for Nature's Prophet plus loading screen. The weapon includes an ambient particle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Firestarter: 此組合包內含蝙蝠騎士「縱火者」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Firestarter: Contains all of the items in the 'Firestarter' set for Batrider plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grimoire_The_Book_Wyrm: 魔典小龍多年來已經被人遺忘，他在湮滅學院的大圖書館中忘我地學習。受到書的束縛，他時刻聽從主人的吩咐，但他始終懷有希望，能夠使自己再度解放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grimoire_The_Boo: Grimoire is a long forgotten Book Wyrm, who literally lost himself studying the books in the great library of The Ultimyr Academy. Bound to the book, he does his master's bidding, forever hopeful he will find the incantation to set himself free once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Relics: 包含黑暗賢者「帝國遺物」套裝中的全部物品，附贈載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Relics: Includes all of the items in the 'Imperial Relics' set for Dark Seer plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_League_Augus: 北美地區最具天資的玩家們將在此以傳統的內戰規則進行為期 4 週的競賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format for four weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Emerald_D: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含單獨物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wandering_Harlequins_Rega: 此組合包內含拉比克「哈利奎恩的遊蕩小丑華服」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。武器有著特殊的氛圍和攻擊粒子特效以及攻擊動畫。所有物品還皆有各自含帶一個自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wandering_Harleq: Contains all of the items in the 'Wandering Harlequin's Regalia' set for Rubick plus loading screen. The weapon includes ambient and attack particles and an attack animation. All items include an ability icon.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Father_of_the_Forest_: Father of the Forest Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Imperial_Relics_Loading_Screen: 帝國遺物 載入畫面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_NADota_Elite_League_August: NADota 精英聯賽 八月賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_SDL_2014_Season_3: 2014 年 SDL 第 3 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wandering_Harlequin_Loading_Sc: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩載入畫面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wandering_Harlequins_Cape: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩的披風
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wandering_Harlequins_Crest: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩的頭冠
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wandering_Harlequins_Mantle: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩的披肩
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wandering_Harlequins_Regalia: 遊蕩小丑哈利奎恩的華服
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon 為您呈獻有著 SpotTV 和 KeSPA 加持的韓國 Dota 聯賽第 3 季。新加入的參賽隊伍將分派至各自不同的位階。韓國 Dota 聯賽將持續 4 個賽季，有著高達 6.5 億韓元的獎金。觀賞第 1 階和第 2 階中的前 10 強隊伍在本季繼續對決！此組合包內含「死亡信徒」信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the third season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD $605,000) prize pool. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2! Bundle includes the Boooofus courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon 為您呈獻 Korean Dota League 的第三個賽季，本聯賽在這季加入了 SpotTV 以及 KeSPA 的支援。新晉級的各支隊伍均已加入了各自的階位。KDL 將會進行總共 4 季的比賽，有著高達六億五千萬韓元（約 $605,000 美金）的總獎金。趕快觀賞來自前 2 階的 10 支頂尖隊伍相互較量吧！此門票僅用於觀賞韓國 Dota 聯賽第 3 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the third season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD $605,000) prize pool. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Korea Dota League Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Tier_3_: Dota 2 KDL 的第 3 階位是由 AMD Dota 2 業餘聯賽以及 PC bang 聯賽組合而成的聯賽。在第 3 階位中表現最好的隊伍將獲得 KDL 階位積分靠著這些積分爭取晉升到第 2 階位的機。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Dota 2 KDL Tier 3 is composed of AMD Dota 2 Amateur League and PC bang League. The best teams in Tier 3 leagues will receive KDL Tier points and have chance to advance to Tier 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_Season_3: joinDOTA 聯賽是個能讓全球的玩家參予的 Dota 2 聯賽。以分區 1 和分區 2 的所有比賽做為特色。共有歐洲、美國，和亞洲這三個區域類別。每個區域的前 10 名接著將晉升至超級聯賽並在那一較高下。本聯賽的總獎金會隨著每售出一張門票而增加 $1.00。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_: The global Dota 2 league for everyone. Featured are all of the matches from division 1 and 2. There are three leagues: Europe, America, and Asia. The top 10 from each league meet in the premier division. $1.00 from each ticket purchased will go directly into the prizepool.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_New_Star_Tou: The new tournament from the Star Cloud League. The event is 4 weeks of Dota matches at 2 skill levels!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Challenge: 歐洲巔峰挑戰賽是個採循環制的聯賽，有著來自歐洲的職業戰隊和為數 $1,000 的總獎金！此組合包內含「預兆之眼」守衛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Chall: The Top Europe Challenge is a round robin tournament featuring professional teams from Europe competing for a prize pool of $1,000! Bundle includes the Eye of Foresight ward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Challenge_Tick: 歐洲巔峰挑戰賽是個採循環制的聯賽，有著來自歐洲的職業戰隊和為數 $1,000 的總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞歐洲巔峰挑戰賽的全部比賽。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague: IMBATV 為您介紹一個能夠讓業餘戰隊能夠與世界各地的頂尖戰隊一同較量的全新聯賽。在業餘聯賽中表現最好的隊伍將會對上職業隊伍。最後八強的定奪舞台將會在中國上海。每份售出的組合包都將為總獎金增加 $2.50 並均有附贈虛空假面的武器「虛空之錘」！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague: IMBATV present a new league where amateur teams are able to compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from the amateur tournament will face the professional team. In the final stage the top 8 teams will compete in Shanghai,China. Each bundle purchased increases the prize pool by $2.50 and includes the Voidhammer!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Ticket: IMBATV 為您介紹一個能夠讓業餘戰隊能夠與世界各地的頂尖戰隊一同較量的全新聯賽。在業餘聯賽中表現最好的隊伍將會對上職業隊伍。最後八強的定奪舞台將會在中國上海。此門票僅用於觀賞 i-League 聯賽的比賽。

The best teams from the amateur tournament will face the professional team. In the final stage the top 8 teams will compete in Shanghai,China. Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomnia52_Dota_: Insomnia52 今年所舉辦的最大 Dota 2 聯賽：華碩 ROG Dota 2 盃。橫跨歐洲各地的戰隊將會在英國最大的電玩盛事中一較高下，為玩家帶來三天滿滿的精彩賽事。每支隊伍都得逼出自己的最大本事才能抱走 £6,500 英鎊，和英國最強戰隊的頭銜！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomni: Insomnia52 hosts their biggest Dota 2 tournament of the year: the ASUS ROG Dota 2 Cup. Teams from across Europe will compete at the UKâs biggest gaming festival, bringing you three full days of heated action culminating in a Main Stage Final. With Â£6,500 on the line, each team will be pulling out all the stops to be crowned the greatest Dota 2 team in Britain.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VPGAME: VPG 聯賽的目的是為了要促進 VP games 和 Dota 2 之間的結合度，以讓其使用者能夠輕鬆地藉由競技賽事享受 Dota 2 的世界。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hookblade_of_Skadi: 在暗黑之礁的深處，斯拉克挖出了這把由早已流逝在時光中的囚犯所埋藏的絲卡蒂鉤刃。就是這把神秘武的器在當時賜予了斯拉克逃出暗黑之礁的一切所需，並沿途伴隨著斯拉克暗影軌跡一次又一次地劃掉了獄卒們的聲線。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hookblade_of_Ska: In the depths of Dark Reef Prison, Slark dug up this Skadi Blade, buried by some long-forgotten inmate. This mysterious weapon encouraged him in his escape from Dark Reef, and silenced at least one guardian's cry of alarm along the way.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions_League_S: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽第四賽季回歸！世界頂尖戰隊將會共同爭奪 $50,000 的縂獎金，每售出一份組合包還有 $2.5 進入縂獎金！組合包内含巨牙海萌信使，附贈其載入畫面！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup_Ticket: 波斯灣盃將集結當地的最強隊伍，供他們在此爭取為數 $1000 的總獎金！此門票僅用於觀賞波斯灣盃的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup: The Persian Gulf Cup pits the best teams from the Persian Gulf region against each other for a prize pool of $1000! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Persian Gulf Cup.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PinoyDota_Online_Battle_S: PinoyDota 線上賽回來了！在第 3 季中 7 支合格的業餘隊伍將會對上衛冕冠軍 MSI-EvoGT.TRIC ，一起爭奪 $40,000 比索的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PinoyDota_Online: PinoyDota Online Battle is back! Now on its 3rd season seven qualifying amateur teams will face the defending champion MSI-EvoGT.TRIC for a P40,000 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_Season_2: VietDOTA 聯賽第 2 季是個分有超級聯賽、業餘聯賽、女子 Dota 表演賽這三個級別的線上賽。各級區均有著為數 $1000 的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_: VietDOTA League Season 2 is an online tournament that contains of three tiers: Premier League, Amateur League and Girl Dota Showmatch. All compete for a prize pool of $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_NADota_Elite_League_September: NADota 精英聯賽 九月賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: Starladder 的原創 Star 系列聯賽將在這個十月邁入它的 10 週年囉！在第 10 季中將會有世界強的戰隊們正面交鋒，看誰能在歷史上多添一個 Dota 冠軍頭銜。此門票僅用於觀賞 SLTV Star Series 第 10 賽季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: This October marks the 10th anniversary of Starladder's original Star Series. In Season 10, the world's strongest teams will face off and compete for the right to mark down their names in the history books as champions. This ticket only gives you access to view games from SLTV Star Series Season 10.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarlet_Quarry: 包含「緋紅晶石」套裝中的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarlet_Quarry: Contains all of the items in the 'Scarlet Quarry' set for Tiny.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Head_of_the_Iron_Cloc: Head of the Iron Clock Knight

Tokens.DOTA_Item_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_10_Tic: SLTV Star Series 第 10 賽季門票

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Techies: 這項物品將會用爆破技工隊的史奎和史布林的爆炸性聲腔取代預設的廣播語音！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Techie: This item replaces the Default announcer with explosive commentary from Squee and Spleen of Techies Demolitions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assured_Victory_Shout: 在戰局開始前使用這個來進行吶喊去嘲諷對面並做出勝利預言。若您贏得了該場遊戲，您的勝利預言寶石將會獲得一分，戰敗則會導致寶石喪失所有點數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assured_Victory_: Use this shout before the round begins to taunt the other team and predict a victory. If you win the match, your Victory Prediction gem will gain a point. If you lose, your Victory Prediction gem will lose all of its points.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axes_Access: 內含斧王「盛怒重裝」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axes_Access: Includes all of the items in the 'Axe's Access' set for Axe plus a loading screen:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Wyrm_Bow_H: Contains all of the items in the 'Black Wyrm Bow Hunter' set for Drow plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cavalier_of_Anarchy: 此組合包內含渾沌騎士「混亂騎士」套裝的全部物品以及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cavalier_of_Anar: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Cavalier of Anarchy' set for Chaos Knight plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Current_Prediction_Streak: 追蹤勝利預言成功實現的連續次數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Current_Predicti: Tracks the current streak of successful victory predictions made by a victory prediction taunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Gabriel: 包含幽鬼「黑暗天使」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Gabriel: Includes all of the items in the 'Dark Gabriel' set for Spectre plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Geode: 包含虛空假面「闇之晶洞石」套裝的全部物品以及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Geode: Contains all of the items in the 'Dark Geode' set for Faceless Void plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Despair_Emoticon_Pack:
用「絕望」表情符號包解鎖 5 款表情符號：
:aaaah: :burn: :hide: :iceburn: :tears:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Despair_Emoticon:
Unlocks the 5 emoticons in the Despair Emoticon Pack:
	:aaaah: :burn: :hide: :iceburn: :tears:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Techies: 這項物品將會用爆破技工隊的史布倫的熱情口吻取代預設的廣播語音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Techie: This item replaces the Default announcer with the explosive enthusiasm of Spoon of Techies Demolitions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rabbit_Bundl: 此組合包內含「月兔美妮」信使和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rab: Contains the Mei Nei Jade Rabbit courier and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Arsenal: 爆破技工隊專門為豬砲製造過上百個特殊訂做的高爆砲彈，但史布林認為那些砲彈實在是太可愛了，讓他實在捨不得將它們裝填進艦載砲裡頭然後就這樣送給敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Arsenal: Techies Demolitions built hundreds of custom-built explosives to use with The Swine, but Spleen thought they were so adorable he couldn't bear to part with them as they were loading the cannon onboard the galley.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Helmet: 在豬砲的建造期間，爆破技工隊也為它的砲組人員打造了專屬的時髦頭盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Helmet: When constructing The Swine, Techies Demolitions also forged some stylish headgear for its crew.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Powder_Barrel: 豬砲只要用一種特別混製而成的可燃火藥就可安全地進行發射。只是恰巧史奎當初完完全全忘了跟買下那門大砲船員們講罷了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Powder_Bar: Safely firing The Swine requires a custom mix of flammable powders, which Squee completely forgot to mention to the crew of the doomed galley who purchased the cannon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Visor: 基於某種原因，將豬砲搭載上船的那位艦長並未收下技工隊為豬砲製做的專屬頭飾。不要就拉倒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Visor: For some reason, the galley captain who commissioned The Swine didn't want the headgear that came with it. His loss.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Techies_Squint_and_: 技工隊對什麼事都不正經，尤其是對面的敵人。本物品為「2014 國際錦標賽互動手冊」持有者的贈品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Techies_Sq: Techies take nothing seriously, least of all their enemies. Granted to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Arcana: 在經過幾個月的汗水之後，爆破技工隊驕傲地發表了他們的最新作品：豬砲 -- 世上威力最猛的大砲。然而在它於一艘正於返航一途的低舷大帆船上頭的測試期間，豬砲驚天懾海的震波將船身撕裂成碎片，並使豬砲本體向後朝岸邊衝了過去。直到數日後才被人發現深深卡進剛好位於創造者工坊下方那遍佈岩石殘骸的峭壁中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Arcana: After months of work, Techies Demolitions proudly unveiled their latest commission: The Swine, the most powerful cannon ever designed. Yet during its first frantic use aboard a homebound galley, the Swine's awesome blast tore its host ship asunder, rocketing the cannon itself backwards toward the shore. It was found days later, deeply embedded in a rocky cliffside just below its makers' workshop.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Bombastic_Box: 包含技工隊廣播語音、「林布哥小瘋魔」信使，以及「小心火燭」HUD 介面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Bombasti: Includes Techies Announcer, Nilbog the Mad courier and Detonation HUD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2014_Mu: 讓得獎作曲家 Chance Thomas 所配製的歌曲伴隨您遨遊戰場。持有 2014 國際錦標賽互動手冊的玩家都會獲贈此物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Ride into battle with epic music from award-winning artist Chance Thomas. Granted to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Swine_of_the_Sunken_G: 在經過幾個月的汗水之後，爆破技工隊驕傲地發表了他們的最新作品：豬砲 -- 世上威力最猛的大砲。然而在它於一艘正於返航一途的低舷大帆船上頭的測試期間，豬砲驚天懾海的震波將船身撕裂成碎片，並使豬砲本體向後朝岸邊衝了過去。直到數日後才被人發現深深卡進剛好位於創造者工坊下方那遍佈岩石殘骸的峭壁中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Swine_of_the: After months of work, Techies Demolitions proudly unveiled their latest commission: The Swine, the most powerful cannon ever designed. Yet during its first frantic use aboard a homebound galley, the Swine's awesome blast tore its host ship asunder, rocketing the cannon itself backwards toward the shore. It was found days later, deeply embedded in a rocky cliffside just below its makers' workshop.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Forged_Fu: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Zephyrus_Flight: 此組合包內含風行者「仄費洛斯之翔」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zephyrus_Flight: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Zephyrus' Flight' set for Windranger plus loading screen.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Great_Sword_of_the_Rh: Great Sword of the Rhinoceros Order

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Swine_of_the_Sunken_G: Swine of the Sunken Galley Bundle
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Taunt_Techies_Squint_and_Laugh: 嘲諷：技工隊的斜視和大笑

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_the_Baphomet: 此組合包內含末日使者「烈燄巴風特」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_the_Bap: Contains all of the items in the 'Fires of the Baphomet' set for Doom plus loading screen.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Genuine_Mei_Nei_: Contains a Genuine Mei Nei Jade Rabbit courier and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift: 此組合包內含蜜拉娜「月痕」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift: Contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rift' item set for Mirana plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift_Style: 有兩種樣式可切換，有面罩和無面罩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift_Style: Has two styles, Mask and No Mask
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Fires_of_the_Baphomet: Fires of the Baphomet Loading Screen

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_Seaso: 保加利亞業餘聯賽第 3 賽季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Central_Europe_: 中歐大戰將有著 64 支參戰隊伍為爭取 8 個晉級名額彼此交戰，以獲得與 8 支直接邀請隊伍較量和贏得 $500 總獎金的機會！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Centra: In the Battle of Central Europe 64 registered teams compete to qualify with 8 invited teams for a $500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_: 此為保加利亞業餘聯賽的第 3 個賽季。這次將有著高達 50 支的隊伍彼此爭奪勝負和獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateu: This is the third season for the Bulgarian Amateur League. It's an open league with up to 50 teamscompeting for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_European_Elite_League_Sep: 歐洲最為天賦異稟的 Dota 好手們將會以傳統的內戰賽制進行為期 4 週的比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_European_Elite_L: The most talented players in Europe compete in the classic inhouse league format for four weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Show_Dota_2_League: 在九月 11 至 13 日期間六支頂尖的歐洲戰隊將會為 $50,000 的總獎金而戰。賽事屆時將會用六種不同語言進行實況轉播。決賽將在莫斯科舉辦的 DreamHack 活動上進行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Show_Dota_2: On 11-13 September six European teams will compete for the prize pool of $50,000. The tournament will be casted in six languages. Final matches will be played at DreamHack Moscow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revival_ESports_Dota_2_Op: Revival 電競 Dota 2 公開賽的第一個系列將會有著 32 支業餘至半職業的戰隊參與，爭奪為數 3,000,000 印尼盾的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revival_ESports_: The first series of the Revival E-Sports Dota 2 Open Tournament featuring 32 amateur to semi-pro Indonesian teams who will complete for a prize pool of IDR 3,000,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rise_of_the_Myrimidons: 匈牙利的 Dota 戰隊們將在本賽事為了爭取廠商贊助和為數 $1500 的總獎金彼此競爭！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rise_of_the_Myri: Hungarian teams compete to receive a sponsorship and a $1500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_1v1_Mirror_Series: 你自認是頂尖好手？在星雲聯賽中的 1v1 鏡子系列賽證明自己吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_1v1_Mirror_S: Are you the best? Show us your skills in the new 1v1 Mirror Series of the Star Cloud League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Seaosn_5: 新浪盃的第 5 個賽季將有著多支中國戰隊參與，和為數 ¥100,000 人民幣的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Seaosn_: The fifth season of the Sina Cup has Chinese teams competing for a prize pool of 100,000 Yuan!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TP_Anatolian_Cup: 土耳其的首屆 Dota 2 聯賽，由 dota2lig.com 舉辦。將有著 8 支當地隊伍和為數 $500 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TP_Anatolian_Cup: The first tournament in Turkey by dota2lig.com.There will be 8 teams from Turkey competing for a $500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_European_Elite_League_Septembe: 歐洲精英聯賽 九月賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Revival_ESports_Dota_2_Open_To: Revival 電競 Dota 2 公開聯賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Moon_Rift: 此組合包內含蜜拉娜「月痕」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Moon_Rif: Contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rift' item set for Mirana plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Taunting_Swin: 史布倫在他們要測試豬砲的地方造了一個特殊路標來警告民眾。當然，他們打從一開始就一直沒找到測試那門大砲的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Taun: Spoon built a special sign to warn people away from where they intended to test the Swine cannon. Of course, they never got around to testing the cannon in the first place.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Burning_Iron: 口吐著熱火和死亡，這隻機械飛獸的輪廓將伴隨著騎士的身影將劃過被熱燄照亮的天空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Burning_Ir: Belching fire and death, he screams across burning skies. Can't stop the rider!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Beyond_the_Summit_HUD: Beyond the Summit 介面造型
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rage_of_the_Three: 此組合包內含遣雷使「三重雷霆」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rage_of_the_Thre: Includes all of the items in the 'Rage of the Three' set for Disruptor including a loading screen:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Rage_of_the_Three_Loa: Rage of the Three Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alpha_Predator_Set: 此組合包內含夜神刺客「首席掠奪者」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alpha_Predator_S: Includes all of the items in the 'Alpha Predator' set for Nyx Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Suitings_Se: 此組合包內含自蝙蝠騎士「炎紉衣料」套裝的全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Su: Includes all of the items in the 'Flamestitched Suitings' set for Batrider:

Tokens.DOTA_Item_D2INT_Southeast_Asia_Dota_2_Cu: D2INT 東南亞 Dota 2 盃
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2INT_Southeast_Asia_Dota: D2INT 東南亞 Dota 盃邀請了所有業餘好手在八場資格賽間分出高下，取得晉級決賽去與職業隊和半職業隊較量的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2INT_Southeast_: The D2INT Southeast Asia Dota 2 Cup invites all amateur players to face off against each other in eight qualifier matches to face professional and semi professional teams in the finals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lima_Five_Peru_Season_6: 祕魯利馬 Five 聯賽的第 6 個賽季中將會有 32 支南美戰隊參戰，獎金以現款發放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lima_Five_Peru_S: 32 South American teams compete in the 6th season of the Lima Five Peru for a cash prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nvidia_Game24_Invitationa: 用一場連續進行 24 小時的電玩盛會慶祝 PC gaming 吧！世上最佳的四支西方隊伍將於本活動以單淘汰、五戰三勝制的方式爭奪為數 $15,000 的獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nvidia_Game24_In: Celebrate PC gaming with a 24 hour gaming extravaganza. Four of the best Western teams in the world fight it in in a single-elimination, best-of-five bracket all for $15,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OGSeries_Dota_2_Online_#1: 來自西班牙的戰隊們將會在首屆 OGSeries Dota 2 線上聯賽為 250 歐元而戰！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OGSeries_Dota_2_: Teams from Spain compete in the first OGSeries Dota 2 Online tournament for 250 Euros!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Champions_: 冠軍聯賽在第 3 季中將會有著來自歐洲和北美的頂尖戰隊為高達 $50,000 的獎金而戰！包含「巨靈獵殺者」套裝。每張出售的門票都將為總獎金增加 $2.50！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: Champion's League Season 3 will feature the top teams from Europe and North America fighting for $50,000! Includes the Djinn Slayer set plus every ticket purchased increases the prize pool by $2.50!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ElPadrinoth_American_Cup: 6 支職業隊以及 10 支合格隊將會為 $2000 相互比拼。ElPadrinoth 美國盃為繼拉丁盃之後的第二個 ElPadrinoth 聯賽，這次將把戰線擴大至全美。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ElPadrinoth_Amer: Six professional and Ten qualifying teams will fight for the $2000 prize pool. The ElPadrinoth American Cup is the second ElPadrinoth League following up the Latin Cup but now extends the qualifier to all of America.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_5: The 5th season of the Amateur Dota 2 League is an open league where players compete for in-game items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Online_Tournam: 由 Barganizer 所舉辦的第二屆線上聯賽。將有 96 支印尼業餘隊伍參與，以及為數 $1200 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Onlin: The second online tournament organized by Barganizer. 96 amateur teams from Indonesia compete for the $1200 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyber_Gaming_Indonesia_Co: 64 支印尼隊伍將爭奪總額 $680 的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyber_Gaming_Ind: 64 teams from Indonesia compete for the $680 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions_League_S: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽第 3 季將有著來自歐洲和北美地區的頂尖隊伍互相爭奪為數 $50,000 的獎金！內含斯拉達的「深海巨靈」套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions: Champion's League Season 3 will feature the top teams from Europe and North America fighting for $50,000! Includes the Djinn Slayer set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Windforce_Dota_2: 技嘉風之力盃將有著東南亞最好的戰隊們為 $3,000 的總獎金而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Windfor: The Gigabyte Windforce Cup features the best teams in South-East Asia competing for a total prize pool of $3,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceborn_Trinity: 此組合包内含娜迦海妖「三冰一體」套裝的全部物品，附贈載入畫面。這些物品是與 iceiceice 聯合打造，每售出一份對方都將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceborn_Trinity: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Iceborn Trinity' set for Naga Siren plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with iceiceice, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_Season_6: Dota 聯盟為展開第 6 季回來了，這次將有著為數 $1000 的現款總獎金分佈於 16 場為北美及歐洲隊五舉辦的賽事中。本賽事由 GameVox 贊助。此門票將用於觀賞 Dota 聯盟第 6 季的全部比賽，以及包含著「異類仙子守衛」造型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_S: League of Dota returns for a 6th season, featuring $1000 in cash prizes spread across 16 tournaments for North American and European teams. Sponsored by GameVox. This ticket grants you the Neokin Faierie Ward and access to watch League of Dota Season 6 games.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Season_1: 此公開賽有著多達 64 支來自俄羅斯中部的隊伍為證明誰是當區王者而戰。此門票能用於觀賞 TEvent Dota 2 第 1 季的全部比賽，並附有全能騎士的「輝天聖光」套裝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Se: This open tournament contains 64 teams from Central Russia competing for the rights to call themselves the best team in the region. This ticket grants the Heavenly Light Omniknight set and access to view games from TEvent Dota 2 Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Season_1_Ti: 此公開聯賽將有著 64 支來自俄羅斯中部的隊伍參與，在此爭取自稱是該區域最強的機會。此門票僅用於觀賞 TEvent 第 1 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Se: This open tournament contains 64 teams from Central Russia competing for the rights to call themselves the best team in the region. This ticket only gives you access to view games from TEvent Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2: The Summit 2 是個受人期待已久的全球性 Dota 2 活動！世界強隊將藉由線上賽爭取即將於今年 12 月舉辦的線下賽決賽名額，並在那挑戰 Evil Geniuses 和另一支直接獲邀隊伍，與他們爭奪為數超過 $100,000 的總獎金。此組合包每筆收益的 25% 都將用於增加本賽事的總獎金。此組合包內含本賽事的互動手冊和 DotaTV 門票，還有一隻自訂信使、和一個載入畫面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2: The Summit 2 is the long-awaited sequel to a global Dota 2 event! The world's best teams will fight online for 4 slots at the LAN Finals this December, where they will challenge Evil Geniuses and another invited team for $100,000+. 25% of each bundle sold goes towards the prize pool and the bundle includes Compendium access, a courier, loading screen, and DotaTV ticket!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2_Ticket: The Summit 2 是個受人期待已久的全球性 Dota 2 活動！世界強隊將藉由線上賽爭取即將於今年 12 月舉辦的線下賽決賽名額，並在那挑戰 Evil Geniuses 和另一支直接獲邀隊伍，與他們爭奪為數超過 $100,000 的總獎金。此門票僅用於觀賞 The Summit 2 的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2_Tic: The Summit 2 is the long-awaited sequel to a global Dota 2 event! The world's best teams will fight online for 4 slots at the LAN Finals this December, where they will challenge Evil Geniuses and another invited team for $100,000+. This ticket only gives you access to view games from The Summit 2.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_Presents_the_X: DotaCinema 為您呈獻隊長徵召聯賽的進化版。8 支頂尖的西方隊伍將藉由本賽事獨特的隊長徵召模式進行比賽。這個模式將產生隨機產生可用的英雄陣容給進行角色選禁的隊長們帶來挑戰，也為比賽帶來變化。其組合包要價中的 25% 將用於增加賽事的總獎金。組合包內含一本聯賽互動手冊、DotaTV 門票、巫妖的飾品套裝、蜜拉娜的坐騎、特殊的聊天表情符號，和更多東西！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_Prese: DotaCinema presents the second version of their popular Captains Draft tournament. Eight of the best western teams battle in the unique Captains Draft mode, from which its limited hero pool is sure to keep team captains on their toes. 25% of each bundle will contribute to the prizepool. The bundle contains a full compendium, DotaTV ticket, Lich set, Mirana mount, special emotes and much more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_XMG_Captains_D: DotaCinema 為您呈獻隊長徵召聯賽的進化版。8 支頂尖的西方隊伍將藉由本賽事獨特的隊長徵召模式進行比賽。這個模式將產生隨機產生可用的英雄陣容給進行角色選禁的隊長們帶來挑戰，也為比賽帶來變化。其組合包要價中的 25% 將用於增加賽事的總獎金。組合包內含一本聯賽互動手冊、DotaTV 門票、巫妖的飾品套裝、蜜拉娜的坐騎、特殊的聊天表情符號，和更多東西！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_XMG_C: DotaCinema presents the second version of their popular Captains Draft tournament. Eight of the best western teams battle in the unique Captains Draft mode, from which its limited hero pool is sure to keep team captains on their toes. 25% of each bundle will contribute to the prizepool. The bundle contains a full compendium, DotaTV ticket, Lich set, Mirana mount, special emotes and much more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Cinema_Emoticon_Pack:
用「DotaCinema」表情符號包解鎖 5 款表情符號：
:fail: :goodjob: :headshot: :heart: 及 :horse:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Cinema_Emot:
Unlocks the 5 emoticons in the Dota Cinema Emoticon Pack:
	:fail: :goodjob: :headshot: :heart: and :horse:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldwurms_Touch: 此組合包內含卓爾遊俠「厄爾多姆之觸」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldwurms_Touch: Contains all of the items in the 'Eldwurm's Touch' set for Drow plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherhutch: 雅加婆婆越來越懶得打掃她的雞籠了，因此她施展魅術將其打掃乾淨，並賦予了它生命。不過她在施法前應該檢查一下裏面有沒有小雞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherhutch: Having grown tired of her dilapidated chicken hutch, Babka the Bewitcher cast an enchantment to spruce it up and give it some life. She should have made sure there wasn't a chicken inside before she cast the spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Matriarch: 此組合包內含死亡先知「煞白魔女」套裝的全部物品、載入畫面，以及一個自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Matriarc: Contains all of the items in the 'Ghastly Matriarch' set for Death Prophet plus loading screen and custom exorcism bat with an ability icon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon 為您呈獻有著 SpotTV 和 KeSPA 加持的韓國 Dota 聯賽第 4 季。新加入的參賽隊伍將分派至各自不同的位階。韓國 Dota 聯賽將持續 4 個賽季，有著高達 6.5 億韓元的獎金。觀賞第 1 階和第 2 階中的前 10 強隊伍在 KDL 第 4 季中對決。此門票僅用於觀賞韓國 Dota 聯賽第 4 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the fourth season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the  fourth season of KDL featuring the top 10 teams from the tier 1 and 2 leagues. This ticket only gives you access to view games from KDL Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korean_Dota_League_Season: Nexon 為您呈獻有著 SpotTV 和 KeSPA 加持的韓國 Dota 聯賽第 4 季。新加入的參賽隊伍將分派至各自不同的位階。韓國 Dota 聯賽將持續 4 個賽季，有著高達 6.5 億韓元的獎金。觀賞第 1 階和第 2 階中的前 10 強隊伍在 KDL 第 4 季中對決。此組合包內含帕吉「蛇蜥之身」套裝，並能供於觀賞韓國 Dota 聯賽第 4 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korean_Dota_Leag: Nexon presents the fourth season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the  fourth season of KDL featuring the top 10 teams from the tier 1 and 2 leagues. This bundle includes the Scavenger of the Basilisk Pudge set and grants access to view games from KDL Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_Infernal_Wings: 此組合包內含萊恩「地獄之翼遺物」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_Infern: Contains all of the items in the 'Legacy of Infernal Wings' set for Lion plus loading screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Monstrous_Reprisal: 包含力丸「滔天復仇」套裝中的全部物品，附贈載入畫面、技能圖示和簽名寶石。這些物品是與 VeRsuta 聯合打造，每出售一份對方將獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Monstrous_Repris: Contains all of the items in the 'Monstrous Reprisal' set for Riki plus loading screen, ability icons and an autograph. These items were created in partnership with VeRsuta, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fiend_Cleaver: 此組合包內含斯溫「屠魔浪人」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fiend_Cleave: Contains all of the items in 'The Fiend Cleaver' set for Sven plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Rotted_Ga: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。此寶藏內的物品除了稀有物品之外均無法在 2015 年 2 月 1 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。若此寶藏是藉由套娃寶藏獲得的，則上述限制對於包括其內容物在內的所有物品將延至 2015 年 3 月 14 日後才解除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until Feb 1st, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction.  The Nested Cache version of this treasure and all its contents will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Sapphire_SabreLynx_Loading_Scr: 寶藍戎裝猞猁載入畫面
