Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Balance_of_the_Bladekeepe: 此套裝的販售收益將會捐助至 XMG 隊長徵召模式 2.0 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Balance_of_the_B: Purchases of this set contributes to the XMG Captain's Draft 2.0 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CSPLRU_Dota_2_League_Season_2: CSPL.RU Dota 2 聯賽第 2 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPLRU_Dota_2_League_Seas: 第 2 季將延續上一賽季，集結超過 500 位選手彼此競爭，爭奪大獎和冠軍頭銜！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPLRU_Dota_2_Le: The second season of the lasting battle, where more than 500 players will compete for the prize and the championship title!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2LPR_Season_2: 將有 16 支隊伍參賽，並提供現金獎金。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadly_Gaming_Cup_Season_: 將邀請 16 支職業隊伍競爭為數 $10,000 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadly_Gaming_Cu: 16 professional teams compete for the $10,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2FP_Atlantic: 將有 50 支隊伍和為數 $50 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2FP_Atlantic: Up to 50 teams compete for the $50 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2Feed_1v1_Solo_Mid_Cu: 來自獨立國協的 32 位選手將為超過 100 項遊戲內稀有物品而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2Feed_1v1_So: 32 players from the CIS region compete for over 100 Rare in-game items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Gonzaga_Festival: 貢薩加業餘節為您呈獻來自印尼的 Dota 2 業餘聯賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Gonzaga_F: Gonzaga Amateur festival presents Amateur Dota 2 teams from Indonesia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_DCL_Season_2: 來自獨立國協國家的業餘隊伍將會為現金獎金和遊戲內稀有物品而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_DCL_Seas: Amateur teams from CIS countries will compete for cash prizes and rare items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_League__Se: 有著 16 支隊伍參加，和為數 6,400 盧布的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_L: 16 teams battle it out for the 6,400 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Dota_Cup_Season_2: 有著 16 支隊伍參加，和為數 5,000 盧布的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Dota_Cup_Sea: 16 teams compete for the 5,000 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Solo_Cup_Season_2: 有著 32 位選手參加，和為數 1,600 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Solo_Cup_Sea: 32 players compete for a 1,600 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GCDL_Season_8: 隨著 Dota 2 區網王者聯賽結束，Gamer.LK 很榮幸在此為您呈獻 Gamer.LK Clans DOTA 2 League (GCDL) 的第 8 季。GCDL 是斯里蘭卡地區持續最長久的聯賽！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GCDL_Season_8: With Kings of LAN DOTA 2 done and dusted, Gamer.LK is proud to present Season 8 of the Gamer.LK Clans DOTA 2 League (GCDL). The GCDL is the longest running online league of its kind in Sri Lanka!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season_2: 16 支職業隊伍將為 1,500 總獎金而戰。此組合包內含大地之靈「安穩基石」套裝的全部物品，並能供於觀賞 GG 聯賽第 2 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season: 16 professional teams compete for the $1,500 prize pool. This bundle grants the Bedrock Serenity Earth Spirit set and access to view games from GG League Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season_2_Ticket: 16 支職業隊伍將為 1,500 總獎金而戰。此門票僅用於觀賞 GG 聯賽第 2 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season: 16 professional teams compete for the $1,500 prize pool. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the GG League Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Impact_Gaming_Season_1: 巴基斯坦內最強 Dota 2 戰隊們的對決將在此展開！看著參賽隊伍們為現金獎金以及一個受到大行號贊助以出國比賽的機會而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Impact_Gaming_Se: The battle between the best Dota 2 teams in Pakistan in on! Watch as they game fiercely to win the grand cash prize and a chance to be sponsored by the big names in corporate alliance to compete Internationally.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_KDL_Season_4__Tier_3: 韓國 Dota 聯賽第 3 階由 AMD Dota 2 業餘聯賽以及 PC Bang 聯賽組成。第 3 階中的最佳隊伍們將在此獲得 KDL 的位階積分和晉升至第 2 階的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_KDL_Season_4__Ti: Dota 2 KDL Tier 3 is composed of the AMD Dota 2 Amateur League and the PC bang League. The best teams in Tier 3 leagues will receive KDL Tier points and have chance to advance to Tier 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MOL_Dota_2_Tournament: MOL Dota 2 聯賽的冠亞軍將會代表印尼出戰 2014 馬來西亞 Game Mater 賽事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MOL_Dota_2_Tourn: The top two teams of the MOL Dota 2 Tournament will represent Indonesia at the Game Master 2014 Malaysia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Persia_Grand_League: 8 支該地區的最佳隊伍將為爭取遊戲內獎品持續對戰 14 天。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Persia_Grand_Lea: 8 of the best teams from the region compete over 14 days for in-game items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_4: 2014 SDL 的最後一季將有 64 支隊伍參戰，為獎金和榮耀而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_: 64 of the best teams from the region fight for the prize and glory at the last season of SDL 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Silver_Dota_League_2: Dota 銀星聯賽是個業餘聯賽，將有超過 100 支南美隊伍參加，並提供遊戲內物品和現金做為比賽獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Silver_Dota_Leag: The Silver Dota League is an Amateur league featuring more than 100 South American teams competing for in-game items and a cash prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Uprise_Champions_Cup_Seas: 本賽事將有著來自獨立國協的一些頂尖隊伍參戰，為爭取崛起勇士盃中的決賽名額而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Uprise_Champions: Some of the top teams from the CIS region fight for their spot in the Uprise Championship Finals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_League_Season_3: 聾啞電競聯盟是為為聾啞團體而創立的賽事，將在第 3 季中集結世界各處的隊伍共同參與。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_League_S: The deafESL behind the third season in a tournament made ​​for the deaf community, bringing teams from around the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Electro_Dota_2_League__Season_: Electro Dota 2 聯賽 - 第 2 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GG_League_Season_2_Ticket: GG 聯賽第 2 季門票
Tokens.DOTA_Item_KDL_Season_4__Tier_3: 韓國 Dota 聯賽 第 4 季第 3 階
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_Gigabyte_2014_Finals: 隨著持續一整年的 MPGL 賽事進入尾聲，取得最後決賽門票的隊伍們將受到主辦單位的全額資助起程前往馬尼拉，在那如火如荼地進行為期兩天的最終決戰。此門票的販售所得將有助於提升本賽事的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_Gigabyte_20: The completion of the year long event with all qualified teams gathering for an all expense paid trip to Manila for a 2 day event of non-stop Dota 2 action. Purchase the ticket to help increase the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_Season_2: 財運之戰聯賽第 2 季。有著 16 支參賽隊伍和為數 6,400 盧布的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_: Second season of the tournament Wars of Fortune. 16 teams for the 6,400 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wars_of_Fortune_Season_2: 財運之戰聯賽 第 2 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Acid_Hydra: 此組合包內含劇毒術士「毒酸蛇妖」套裝的全部物品還有載入畫面、自訂瘟疫守衛造型、自訂滑鼠游標，並有著三種不同的色彩樣式可做切換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Acid_Hydra: Contains all of the items in the 'Acid Hydra' item set for Venomancer. Includes three color styles, custom ward, loading screen and custom cursors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Defenders_Vi: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「失落神話寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於兵靈之迴的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與失落神話寶藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Def: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Defender's Vision. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Defender's Vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_Vashundol: 此組合包內含末日使者「法軒昂都之焰」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。這些物品與 Evil Geniuses 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_Vashund: Contains all of the items in the 'Fires of Vashundol' set for Doom plus ambient particles and loading screen. Created in partnership with Evil Geniuses, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy: 一尊擺著姿勢的英雄雕像，在裝備之後能用於擺設在基地中做為裝飾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy: A posed hero statue that can be equipped to customize your base.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_Ore_Compend: 此物品為 2014 國際錦標賽互動手冊持有者獨有的物品，能用於創造出一尊英雄雕像。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_Or: Use this item to create a Heroic Effigy.  This material is exclusive to owners of the International Compendium 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Flame_Swords_Pac: 包含餘燼之靈的無尚焰刃及副手武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Flame_S: Contains the Imperial Flame Sword and Imperial Flame Offhand Sword for Ember Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Phantom_Assassin_Gravesto:
用「魅影刺客墓碑表情符號」解鎖：
:grave:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Phantom_Assassin:
Unlocks the Phantom Assassin Gravestone emoticon:
	:grave:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Foreseers_Con: 將此寶石嵌入至一件物品來追蹤魅影刺客完成的任務數量。她的多源悖論會隨著完成的任務數量越多而越強大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Fore: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track Phantom Assassin's completed contracts. The more contracts completed, the more powerful her Manifold Paradox becomes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: SLTV 的第 11 屆 StarSeries。世界強隊將在這個規模數一數二的 Dota 2 聯賽中較量，爭取為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金。此組合包內含露娜的「暮光兇獸」套裝，以及供於觀賞 SLTV StarSeries 第 11 賽季全部比賽的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 11th Season of SLTV's own StarSeries. The best teams in the world compete in one of the largest Dota 2 Tournaments around for the $80,000+ prize pool. This bundle grants the Dusklight Marauder Luna Set and access to view games from SLTV Star Series Season 11.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: SLTV 的第 11 屆 StarSeries。世界強隊將在這個規模數一數二的 Dota 2 聯賽中較量，爭取為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金。此門票僅用於觀賞 SLTV StarSeries 第 11 賽季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 11th Season of SLTV's own StarSeries. The best teams in the world compete in one of the largest Dota 2 Tournaments around for the $80,000+ prize pool. This ticket only gives you access to view games from SLTV StarSeries Season 11.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Steam_Chopper: 包含伐木機「蒸汽切割機」套裝中的全部物品，附贈載入畫面和自訂滑鼠遊標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Steam_Chopper: Contains all of the items in the 'Steam Chopper' set for Timbersaw plus loading screen and custom cursors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Fury_2014: 2014 狂戰聯賽將有著 16 支隊伍參予，以及為數 $5,000 的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Fury_: The Battle Fury 2014 consists of16 teams from Latin American competing for $5,000 in prizes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trash_Tier_Inhouse_League: 業餘和休閒玩家們將聚集於此，進行長達 30 天的聯賽。沒有獎金，但有雄心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trash_Tier_Inhou: Casuals and amateurs come together for a 30 day league with no prize except pride in their hearts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Defenders: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。此寶藏內的物品除了稀有物品之外均無法在 2015 年 2 月 1 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。若此寶藏是藉由套娃寶藏獲得的，則上述限制對於包括其內容物在內的所有物品將延至 2015 年 3 月 14 日後才解除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until Feb 11th, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction. The Nested Cache version of this treasure and all its contents will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Season_2: IMBATV 為您呈獻 i-League 第 2 季。業餘隊伍將在此與來自世界各地的頂尖隊伍交手。前 8 強的決戰地點將在上海、中國舉行。此組合包內含聖堂刺客「翩然紫晶」套裝，及供於觀賞 i-League 第 2 季全部比賽的門票。購買此組合包來提高賽事總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Season_2: IMBATV presents i-League Season 2 where  amateur teams are able to show themselves and compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from amateur tournament will face Pro teams. The finals consists of the 8 best teams competing in Shanghai, China. This bundle grants the Fluttering Amethyst Templar Assassin item set and access to view games from i-League Season 2. Buy the bundle and increase the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Season_2_Ticket: IMBATV 為您呈獻 i-League 第 2 季。業餘隊伍將在此與來自世界各地的頂尖隊伍交手。前 8 強的決戰地點將在上海、中國舉行。此門票僅用於觀賞 i-League 第 2 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Season_2: IMBATV presents i-League Season 2 where  amateur teams are able to show themselves and compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from amateur tournament will face Pro teams. The finals consists of the 8 best teams competing in Shanghai, China. This ticket only gives access to view games from i-League Season 2.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_Frost: 使用此物品為您最喜愛的英雄打造一座寒霜英雄雕像！選好英雄的姿勢、寫好提詞就能進行製作；製作完成後進行裝備，雕像就會出先遊戲內己方基地中，讓所有人都能看見。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_: Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of Frost! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_Triumph: 使用此物品為您最喜愛的英雄打造一座勝利英雄雕像！選好英雄的姿勢、寫好提詞就能進行製作；製作完成後進行裝備，雕像就會出先遊戲內己方基地中，讓所有人都能看見。此物品為 2014 國際錦標賽互動手冊持有者獨有的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of Triumph! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
	
	This effigy material is exclusive to owners of the International Compendium 2014.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_Wrap: 使用這個禮物包裝來將另一個物品包裝起來，然後將妥善保裝好的禮物送給您的親朋好友。禮物包裝會在 Dota 2 商店中販售直到 2015 年 1 月 15 日為止。包裝若未使用將於 2015 年 3 月 15 日過期。

Use this Gift Wrap on another item to package it up. The wrapped gift can then be delivered to someone on your friends list. 
	
	Gift Wrap is available on the Dota 2 Store until January 15th, 2015. It will expire on March 15th, 2015 if unused.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Usher: A mysterious blade long rumored to exist.  Its razor sharp edge ushers enemies straight into hell.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Igneous_Stone: 此組合包內含小小「炎煉之石」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面。這些物品與 Team Empire 聯合打造，每售出一份對方將會獲得分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Igneous_Ston: Contains all of the items in the 'Igneous Stone' set for Tiny. These items were created in partnership with Team Empire, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_True_Crow: 此組合包内含暗影薩滿「精純之鴉」套裝中的全部物品及載入畫面：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_True_Crow: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'True Crow' set for Shadow Shaman plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Fearless_Sple: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內的物品均無法在 2015 年 3 月 1 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Fear: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Frosted_F: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。此寶藏內的物品除了稀有物品之外均無法在 2015 年 3 月 15 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。但若此寶藏是藉由套娃寶藏獲得的話則稀有物品依然會受到上述限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 15, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction unless this treasure is attained through the Treasure of the Nested Cache.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vespertine_Guard: 此組合包內含亞巴頓「薄暮守衛」套裝及載入畫面：

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrapped_Gift: A mysterious wrapped gift. It must be from a friend! Open it to find out what's inside.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_3rd_BoraDota_Cup: BoraDota 盃進行到第三屆，這次將有著 64 支南美隊伍參與，為爭取 $1000 比賽獎金而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_3rd_BoraDota_Cup: The 3rd Edition of BoraDota Cup with 64 South American teams fighting for $1000 dollars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Online_Tournam: 由 Barganizer 所舉辦的第三屆線上聯賽。前兩屆的前三強在這次將成為本屆 Barganizer 線上聯賽的直接獲邀隊伍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Onlin: Season 3 of barganizer online tournament which from top 3 from season 1 until season 3 gonna be invited to the last season of Barganizer Online Tournament !
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BelNation_Dota_League_7: 來自俄國的別爾哥羅德地區和伽洛則米亞的隊伍將為爭取為數 24,000 盧布的總獎金而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BelNation_Dota_L: Teams from the Belgorod region and Chernozemya will fight for the prize fund of 24,000 rubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6: CEVO 第 6 賽季是個將持續 8 週的北美賽事。其淘汰賽將提供 $1,000 加上組合包收益的獎金，以及在未來的賽季中晉升至更高技術分區的機會。此組合包內含術士「秘湮學院的黑暗館長」套裝，以及供於觀賞 CEVO 第 6 賽季全部比賽的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6: CEVO Season 6 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 + bundle sales and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This bundle grants the Dark Curator of Ultimyr Warlock Set and access to view games from CEVO Season 6.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6_Ticket: CEVO 第 6 賽季是個將持續 8 週的北美賽事。其淘汰賽將提供 $1,000 加上組合包收益的獎金，以及在未來的賽季中晉升至更高技術分區的機會。此門票僅用於觀賞 CEVO 第 6 賽季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6_Ti: CEVO Season 6 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 + bundle sales and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This ticket only gives access to view games from CEVO Season 6.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_2: 我們很高興向您宣佈英雄盃的第二屆開打。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_2: Are pleased to announce that the declared set of commands on the Dota 2 tournament Cup of Heroes. We hasten to glorify your team or just to test your skills!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberviews_1x1_Cup_Season: 來自獨立國協地區的選手們將在本中路單挑賽中較量，爭取贏得 1,000 盧布的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberviews_1x1_C: Players fans from the CIS region will compete in the tournament 1x1 for a prize of 1000 rub.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DGC_AMLeague: 於本聯賽取得前 4 名成績的隊伍將獲得與職業隊較量的晉級機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DGC_AMLeague: The top 4 teams from this qualifying league guarantee their spot to compete against the pros.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA2cz_Mirror_event_2014: 8 名位於捷克和斯洛伐克的頂尖好手將在此爭取價值超過 30 歐元的遊戲內獎品。此賽事將於耶誕節前後舉行，雙方將使用相同英雄，不能使用河道神符，不能使用中立野怪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA2cz_Mirror_e: Eight top Czech and Slovak players will compete for in-game prizes of over 30 . The tournament will run about Christmass. Same picks, no bottles, no runes, no neutral creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dongyang_Games: Dongyang Games 聯賽將提供參賽隊伍爭取冠軍寶座的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dongyang_Games: Teams compete for the top spot in the Dongyang Games.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaLAN_Winter_2015: Dota-LAN 是德國最積極舉辦且規模也是最大的 Dota 線下派對。本次續辦的第 12 屆 Dota-LAN 將採 5 對 5 的方式進行，並提供多達 2,100 歐元的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaLAN_Winter_2: Germany's biggest Dota dedicated LAN party returns for it's 12th edition. The 5on5 tournament will be rewarded with a prize pool of up to 2,100 EUR.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Solo_League_by_Pha: Dota 2 單打聯賽第 2 賽季由 Phazy 舉辦，將有 16 名選手參與其中爭取現金獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Solo_Leag: 16 players will compete for a cash prize in second season solo league by phazy
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_League__Se: Electro Dota 2 聯賽的第 3 個賽季將有 16 支隊伍參與爭奪冠軍寶座。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_L: 16 teams will compete to become champions of the Electro Dota 2 League - Season 3
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GamerPVP_InHouse: 這個位在拉丁美洲的內戰聯賽將讓業餘選手培養職業精神。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GamerPVP_InHouse: Latinamerican Inhouse league with the purpose of bringin profesionalism to amateur players.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malu_Dota_Series_Finale: 「我們先前在 2013 年舉辦了四場公開的 Dota 2 聯賽。現在，Malu Dota 系列決賽將做為我們所踏出的下一步。雖然較短的賽程會對很多人來說比較好，但我們還是認為應要維持使 joinDOTA 能成為更適合容納所有層級玩家的目標。」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malu_Dota_Series: In 2013 we have hosted a total of four open Dota 2 tournaments. Now it's time to do the next step. While short cups are great for a lot of people, it was still our goal to make joinDOTA an even more stable place to compete for teams of any skill level.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_League_Janua: 北美地區最具天分的選手們將於本賽事以經典的內戰規則一較高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NCups_Season_1: 16 支業餘隊伍將會為爭奪 1000 盧布的獎金而戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NCups_Season_1: 16 amateur teams will compete for the prize of 1000 rubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pikabu_GL_Tournament: Pikabu GL 聯賽將供業餘隊伍參與，讓他們能在此爭取現金獎金和其它獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pikabu_GL_Tourna: Amateur teams will compete for cash prizes and other valuable rewards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ProDota_League_season_3: 本賽事將提供選手為數 3000 多盧布的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ProDota_League_s: Players compete for the 3,000+ ruble prize pool
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ShowMatch_Coliseo: 由 Isurus Gaming 以及 Not Today 所舉辦的第一屆 ShowMatch Coliseo 聯賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ShowMatch_Colise: The first season for the ShowMatch Coliseo league hosted by Isurus Gaming and Not Today.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SngLadder_Season_One: SngLadder 的首季聯賽將有上百位選手在此爭奪冠軍寶座和貴重獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SngLadder_Season: Hundreds of players fight for the top spot and valuable prizes in the SngLadder Season One League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summertime_Madness_Champi: 看著 24 支南非隊伍在第一屆的盛夏狂熱錦標賽中激烈角逐冠軍
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summertime_Madne: Watch 24 South African teams battle it out in the first annual Summertime Madness Dota 2 Championship
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtute_League_Season_1: 此賽事將提供 $100 以上的獎金供參賽隊伍爭取。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtute_League_S: Teams compete for the $100+ prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Wars_2015__DSP_Tic: 此聯賽採公開報名制，任何隊五皆能前往 Legionbattles.com 申請爭取 $1200 獎金的機會。此門票僅用於觀賞 Winter Wars 2015 聯賽的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Wars_2015: This tournament is open registration, and any team can sign up for free at Legionbattles.com to compete for $1200. This ticket only grants access to view games from the Winter Wars 2015 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_okDOTA_2__GG_2014_Ticket: ok.- DOTA 2 盃是東南亞和大洋洲地區最大規模的 DOTA 2 賽事，有著為數 $50,000 新加坡元的現金獎金。參賽隊伍為 2 支合格隊伍以及 6 支受邀的地區隊伍。ok.- DOTA 2 聯賽 (2014-2015) 的第一季賽事將同時開打，讓參與的 32 支隊伍爭取其中獎金。此門票僅用於觀賞 ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_okDOTA_2__GG_201: ok.- DOTA 2 CUP is SEA+Oceania's LARGEST DOTA 2 Competition with more than SGD $50,000 of cash prize up for grabs. It will feature 2 qualified Singapore teams against 6 invited regional teams. The ok.- DOTA 2 LEAGUE (2014-2015) will be kicking off Season 1 concurrently, and 32 teams will fight for a part of the prize pool. This ticket only grants access to view games from ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_okDota_2__GG_2014: ok.- DOTA 2 盃是東南亞和大洋洲地區最大規模的 DOTA 2 賽事，有著為數 $50,000 新加坡元的現金獎金。參賽隊伍為 2 支合格隊伍以及 6 支受邀的地區隊伍。ok.- DOTA 2 聯賽 (2014-2015) 的第一季賽事將同時開打，讓參與的 32 支隊伍爭取其中獎金。此門票包含斧王武器「蛇蜥戰斧」，並能供於觀賞 ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_okDota_2__GG_201: ok.- DOTA 2 CUP is SEA+Oceania's LARGEST DOTA 2 Competition with more than SGD $50,000 of cash prize up for grabs. It will feature 2 qualified Singapore teams against 6 invited regional teams. The ok.- DOTA 2 LEAGUE (2014-2015) will be kicking off Season 1 concurrently, and 32 teams will fight for a part of the prize pool. This bundle grants the Battleaxe of the Basilisk Axe Weapon and grants access to view games from ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 league.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Electro_Dota_2_League__Season_: Electro Dota 2 聯賽 - 第 3 季

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Virtute_League_Season_1: Virtute  聯賽 第 1 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Asia_Championship_: 使用 2015 亞洲邀請賽來持續關注今年亞洲大賽的戰況。獲取獎勵、升級手冊，和更多東西等著你發掘！這是僅次於親臨大賽現場的最棒東西！藉由此手冊獲取之獎勵在 2015 年 3 月 1 日前將無法進行交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Asia_Cham: Use the DAC 2015 Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Earn rewards, level up, and more! It's the next-best thing to being there. Rewards from the Compendium will not be tradable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Nested_Ca: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含的所有寶藏、物品，和稀有物品均會在 2015 年 3 月 14 日後變得可用於交易和列入社群市集。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. All treasures and items within, including rare items, will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_64Quarters_Fast_Cup_: 此賽事將藉由速戰 5 回的方式提供業餘隊伍爭取現金獎金的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_64Quarters_Fast_: Amateur Dota 2 teams will compete in 5 fast cups by 64Quarters Cups for the cash prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Revenant: 隨著一陣風暴在戰場上興起，接踵於雷鳴電閃之後的盡是剃刀的鞭斥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Rev: A new storm is blowing across the battlefield.  Where there is thunder, there is sure to be lighting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Amateur_Cup: 一個在澳洲地區舉行的聯賽，讓當地業餘隊伍參與並在其中學習成長以助 Dota 2 在澳大利亞地區的往後發展。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Amate: An Australian tournament targeting the Amateur teams of the region to help them learn, grow, and to further promote Australian DotA 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bishkek_Stars_League: 供比斯凱克當地隊伍參與的聯賽。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Revenant: 隨著一陣風暴在戰場上興起，接踵於雷鳴電閃之後的盡是剃刀的鞭斥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_R: A new storm is blowing across the battlefield.  Where there is thunder, there is sure to be lighting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bridon_League_Open_Cup: 4 支殺出資格賽的隊伍將和客座明星爭取獎品和為數 500,000 盧布的獎金
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bridon_League_Op: 4 teams from qualification will compete with guest stars for a prize of 500,000 RUB
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CI_Cyber_League_Open_Cup: 16 支業餘隊伍將在此爭取比賽獎品。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Clash_of_Pubs: 此聯賽將供休閒玩家們展現他們認真的一面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Clash_of_Pubs: A league for the causal pubers to show their competitive spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DossierChannel_Classic_To: DossierChannel 為您呈獻僅經典聯賽。經典泰國隊伍由 melonbox.com 贊助。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_and_joinDOTA_2015: MLG 及 joinDOTA 將從 2015 年一月開始聯手舉辦多季賽事，並計劃於年終以世界決賽作為尾聲。收益中的 20% 將用於累積第 1 季賽事中的總獎金，另外 5% 則用於累積其世界決賽總獎金。此組合包內含剃刀「幽魂之殼」飾品套裝，以及用於觀賞 joinDOTA / MLG 聯賽的門票。

This bundle grants the Shard of the Revenant Razor Set and access to view games from the MLG/joinDOTA 2015 league.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_Season_3: Dota 戰坑聯賽回來了！來自北美和歐洲的頂尖隊伍將在第 3 季中一較高下，爭取為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金。此組合包內含帕吉「屠宰手術裝」套裝的全部物品和載入畫面，以及「戰坑之心」HUD 造型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_: The Dota Pit League is back with Season 3! Top teams from NA and EU will compete against each other for a prizepool of at least $80,000. This bundle grants access to the Surgical Precision Pudge Set, Hearth of the Pit HUD Skin, and Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_Season_3_: Dota 戰坑聯賽回來了！來自北美和歐洲的頂尖隊伍將在第 3 季中一較高下，爭取為數至少 $80,000 的總獎金。此門票僅用於觀賞 Dota 戰坑聯賽第 3 季的全部比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_: The Dota Pit League is back with Season 3! Top teams from NA and EU will compete against each other for a prizepool of at least $80,000. This ticket grants access to the compendium items and to view games from Dota Pit Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Drowned_Horseman: 地獄聖泉的君王將自己沉浸在聖符的洗禮之下，然後以轉變之姿從深不可測的深處重新崛起。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Conservator: 隨著幽鬼進行了無數次的聚合，她發現到自己也隨著戰事不斷變化。一次又一次地，她的外表已然形成更利於戰鬥的樣子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Conserv: In her myriad manifestations, Spectre finds herself adapting to the exigencies of war. Slowly, she has converged on a more suitable form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Surgical_Precision: 平常的宰殺對屠夫來說已顯得枯燥乏味，於是他著起手術裝看看會不會有啥差。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Surgical_Precisi: Bored with careless slaughter, the butcher takes aim at a new occupation, though he brings the same talent for slaughter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arch_Temptress: 經她搔首弄姿，連命運都變得心癢難耐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arch_Temptre: She tempted fate, and even fate could not resist.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Hallowed_: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含的所有寶藏、物品，和稀有物品均會在 2015 年 4 月 23 日後變得可用於交易和列入社群市集。本商品的 10% 收益將貢獻至 Dota 戰坑聯賽第 3 季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. All treasures and items within, including rare items, will be tradable and marketable after April 23rd, 2015. 10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards Dota Pit League Season 3.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bearzky: 新增曲棍球棒替換造型！
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Cudgel: 雖然利維坦上次與他的大敵昆卡的艦隊狹海相逢已經是好多年前的事情了，但他是直到最近才又在因緣際會之下找到那支艦隊的殘骸。而這次利維坦索性將旗艦上頭的船桅取下，心想誰敢招惹他就用這根大棍和攀附在上頭的章魚給對方好看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Cudgel: After many years, Leviathan recently stumbled upon the sunken wreckage of his rival's fleet. He now wields the mast of their flagship as a cudgel, and woe betide any who get in his way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coliseum_League_2: 哥羅塞姆聯賽第 2 季將有 32 支隊伍參與，爭取名列 Dota 哥羅塞姆聯賽名人堂中的機會。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 結合最優秀的北美和南美隊伍的 Dota 2 加拿大盃回來了！此組合包內含潮汐獵人「深潮古獸」套裝的全部物品，以及供於觀賞 Dota 2 加拿大盃第 4 季比賽的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Dota 2 Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. This bundle grants the Tidosaurus Tidehunter set and access to view games from the Dota 2 Canada Cup Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 結合最優秀的北美和南美隊伍的 Dota 2 加拿大盃回來了！此門票僅用於觀賞 Dota 2 加拿大盃第 4 季的全部比賽。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Chilena_D2G: D2G 智利聯賽將在第 1 季中提供業餘隊伍爭取 500 美金獎金的機會。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffon:
很久以前在個高掛著新月的夜晚，蜜拉娜在錯綜複雜的銀夜森林的一個角落拯救了一隻獅鷲幼獸。而那隻曾在月之公主懷裡的獅鷲寶寶，現在已經是隻準備好載著主人四處奔走的銀月獅鷲。

此物品包含特殊的閒置動畫、著裝動畫，以及「飛躍」的自訂音效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffon:
On a night of a crescent moon, Mirana found a griffin cub in the maze of Nightsilver woods. Now the strange little beast is eager to serve his mistress.

This item includes custom Leap sound, idle and loadout animations.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_League_Febru: 北美地區最具天分的選手們將於本賽事以經典的內戰規則一較高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NN_Dota_2_League_Season_2: NN Dota 2 聯賽步入第 2 季，這次將會聚集許多來自獨立國協的隊伍並提供爭取現金獎金的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NN_Dota_2_League: The second season of NN Dota 2 league will gather many teams from CIS, which will compete for a cash prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Armor_of_Tustakuri: 內含敵法僧「星隱戰甲」套裝的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Armor_of_T: Includes all of the items in 'The Armor of Tustakuri' set for Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapier_of_the_Burning_God: 這些聖物的曾擺放在燃燒要塞內好一段光陰。但眾人平時欣賞到的僅只是冰冷的表象。這對聖劍直到由炘經手時才湧現出它們的真正力量，讓潛藏其中內熱再次復燃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapier_of_the_Bu: These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapiers_of_the_Burning_Go:
餘燼之靈武器

這些聖物的曾擺放在燃燒要塞內好一段光陰。但眾人平時欣賞到的僅只是冰冷的表象。這對聖劍直到由炘經手時才湧現出它們的真正力量，讓潛藏其中內熱再次復燃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapiers_of_the_B:
Ember Spirit Weapons

These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sapphire_Cask: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內的物品均無法在 2015 年 3 月 1 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sapphire_Cask: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skittering_Desolation: 當編織者劃越時間時牠在時間裂縫的另一頭發現了不可思議的東西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skittering_Desol: When Weaver slipped through time, he found something impossible just beyond the rift.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TPD2_Season_1: 16 支來自獨立國協的隊伍將在此爭取為數 30 的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TPD2_Season_1: 16 CIS teams will battle for a prize pool of 30 dollars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Armor_of_Tustakuri: 內含敵法僧「星隱戰甲」套裝的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Armor_of_Tus: Includes all of the items in 'The Armor of Tustakuri' set for Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winterblight: 竭冬冰鋒是用冰川的冰晶和石材所打造而成的。傳說其刀鋒具有冰冷到足以令人打從內心枯竭的冥魂之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winterblight: Carved of stone and glacial ice, its edge is said to be cold enough to freeze the very souls of its victims.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YCSL_Season_3: 此賽事將有 16 支隊伍參與爭取為數 $300 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_YCSL_Season_3: Sixteen teams will compete for a $300 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_#5: joinDOTA 聯賽是個能讓全球的玩家參予的 Dota 2 聯賽。這次將包含半職業的第 2 分區以及其它業餘分區的比賽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_: The global Dota 2 league for everyone. This includes most matches from the semi-pro division 2 and some matches from the amateur divisions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_rapier_burning_god_weapon: 這些聖物的曾擺放在燃燒要塞內好一段光陰。但眾人平時欣賞到的僅只是冰冷的表象。這對聖劍直到由炘經手時才湧現出它們的真正力量，讓潛藏其中內熱再次復燃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_rapier_burning_g: These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_serrakura: 宛如一朵摘不得的美麗櫻花，春櫻牙只要輕輕一劃就會有血泊因它鋒利無比的齒鋒而綻放。因此當初當遮面島的鑄劍師完成這件作品時，他便以充滿敬畏的口吻說道「此花甚美，致引殺機。」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_serrakura: The Serrakura is a blossom of incredible deadliness, its petals serrated like the sharpest knife.  When the masked swordsmith finished this blade, he spoke with reverence.  Here, at last, is a killing kind of beauty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_4: Dota 2 加拿大盃第 4 季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_4_Tic: Dota 2 加拿大盃第 4 季門票
Tokens.DOTA_Item_European_Elite_League_February: 歐洲精英聯賽 二月賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_NADotA_Elite_League_February: NADota 精英聯賽 二月賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_NN_Dota_2_League_Season_2: NN Dota 2 聯賽第 2 季
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Rapier_of_the_Burning: Rapier of the Burning God Offhand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twin_Blades_of_Aureli: 恆輝雙劍是在失落的地下古城以輝煌的製金術鑄造出的，它們曾代表著某個失落文明最偉大的煉金成就。它的材質不再是鋼鐵，但又不算是黃金，而是比兩者都還來得更加堅固和稀有的東西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twin_Blades_: Forged in the gilded smithery beneath the forgotten city, the Eternal Radiance Blades are a lost civilization's greatest achievement in alchemical transmutation.  No longer steel, but not quite gold, the twin blades are something rarer and stronger than both.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Perfect_World_Stalwart_Player_: 完美世界中堅玩家物品包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie: 此信使在 2015 年 3 月 1 日前將無法交易以及列入市集販售。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie: This courier will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie_Upgrade: 此物品將於樣式選單中升級「柔豚八戒」信使的樣式。此升級在 2015 年 3 月 1 日前不可交易、不可列入市集出售。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie_Upgrade: This item enables the upgraded texture to be unlocked on 'Bajie' through the style menu. This upgrade will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Butter_Blunder: 既笨拙又忙碌，憨厚勤傭以油黃色的粗大手指聞名。而雖然他們手腳不太靈巧，他們卻有著勤奮的誠摯態度以令任何老闆滿意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Butter_Blunder: As busy as they are clumsy, butter blunders are known for their butterfingers.  What they lack in dexterity, they make up for in their earnest desire to please.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASP_Mars_Gaming_League: 此為西班牙 Dota 2 聯賽，將有著超過 30 支隊伍參與並提供超過 600 歐元的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASP_Mars_Gaming_: A spanish Dota 2 league, featuring more than 30 teams competing in various divisions for a 600 Euro prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Frostfangs: 這把弓的起源不為人知，但可確定的是它曾由雪惡魔拿著去挑戰卓爾遊俠。而雖然霜獠之弓確實厲害，但雪惡魔本身卻不怎麼厲害。於是翠拉克希絲便在擊敗雪惡魔後獲得了一把新武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Frost: A great bow of unknown origins, it was wielded by a snow demon that came to challenge the Drow Ranger. The Demon's skill was found wanting and so Traxex found a new weapon for herself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CI_Cyber_League_Second_Cu: 此賽事將有 32 支業餘隊伍參與，爭取獲勝大獎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CI_Cyber_League_: 32 amateur teams compete for the grand prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forward_to_victory_cup#2: 32 支來自獨立國協的隊伍將藉此賽事爭取價值 $100 的獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forward_to_victo: 32 teams from the CIS will battle for a prize of 100$
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Ninja_2015: Game Ninja 是個由 PC World Bulgaria 一年一度舉辦的電玩活動。今年舉辦項目將囊括 Dota 2 ，賽事由 Dota 2 保加利亞安排。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Ninja_2015: Game Ninja is yearly gaming event, created by PC World Bulgaria. This year is the first which will include Dota 2 and the tournament will be organized by Dota 2 Bulgaria.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glowbat: 在基迪的叢林深處，生物演化在此走了不可思議的歧途。雨林中的生光蝙蝠所發出的光芒能催眠獵物，引領他們舒服地踏入死亡陷阱，然後被酸性毒液活活燒死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glowbat: Deep in the jungles of Jidi, evolution has taken a strange turn. The bioluminescent bats of the rainforest lure their prey with a comforting glow, only to incinerate their unsuspecting victims with a caustic venom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_InsaLan_X: 16 支法國隊伍將藉由這場在法國雷恩市舉辦線下賽分出高下，爭取名利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_InsaLan_X: 16 french teams will fight for wealth and glory at this LAN event in Rennes, France.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Possible_Heroes_1x1_Seaso: 32 位選手將在 Possible Heroes 的第一屆單挑賽中比試，爭取 1600 盧布總獎金的一部份。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Possible_Heroes_: 32 players will compete for a prize pool of 1600 RUB in the first season of the Possible Heroes 1x1 tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Romania__Hall_of_Fame: 羅馬尼亞 - 名人堂是個供業餘玩家在競技環境中展現自我實力和資質的賽事。前 20 強的玩家將會受邀前往在羅馬尼亞首都布加勒斯特舉辦的線下決賽，然後在那爭取為數 1000$ 的現金獎金和商品獎品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Romania__Hall_of: Hall of Fame is a tournament dedicated to amateur players willing to show off their skills and talent in a competitive environment. The best 20 players will be invited to LAN Finals in Bucharest where they can win 1000$ in cash and merchandise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywarriors_Countenance: 久遠的雲際之城艾瑟麗拉的歷代國王傳承下來的神聖遺物，這個充滿魔法頭盔上印著鷹女神的面容，只有天際中最為精銳的戰士才有資格配戴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywarriors_Coun: A holy relic passed down from the emperors of the ancient clouded city of Aesthera, this spellbound helm bestows the golden visage of the vulture goddess upon only the most elite warriors of the realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tomsk_Dota_2__Champion_So: 西伯利亞的玩家們將在此賽事爭取為數 1000 盧布以上的獎金，以及賽事的冠軍頭銜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tomsk_Dota_2__Ch: Players from Siberia will fight for a prize of 1000+ rubles and the title of the best player in the tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Asia_Championship_HUD: Dota 2 亞洲邀請賽 HUD 造型
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Forward_to_Victory_Cup_2: 邁向勝利聯賽第 2 屆
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Tomsk_Dota_2__Champion_Solo_Mi: 托木斯克 Dota 2 - 1x1 單中冠軍賽
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Belt_of_the_Bloody_: 特典 血腥開膛手腰帶
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Compendium_Belt_of_th: Compendium Belt of the Bloody Ripper
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Blades_of_the_Blood: 特典 血腥開膛手鋒甲
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Compendium_Blades_of_: Compendium Blades of the Bloody Ripper
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Bloody_Ripper_Loadi: 特典 血腥開膛手載入畫面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Mask_of_the_Bloody_: 特典 血腥開膛手面具
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Compendium_Mask_of_th: Compendium Mask of the Bloody Ripper
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Scorched_Fletcher_G: 特典 焦骨射手手套
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Scorched_Fletcher_H: 特典 焦骨射手頭盔
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Scorched_Fletcher_L: 特典 焦骨射手載入畫面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Scorched_Fletcher_P: 特典 焦骨射手肩甲
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Scorched_Fletcher_Q: 特典 焦骨射手箭袋
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Compendium_Wraps_of_the_Bloody: 特典 血腥開膛手纏手帶
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Compendium_Wraps_of_t: Compendium Wraps of the Bloody Ripper
Tokens.DOTA_Item_DAC_Compendium_2015_Emoticon_P: 2015 亞洲邀請賽表情符號包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_1000_Year_Beast_Ability_P: 1000 技能點數供您在年獸之爭遊戲模式中升級您隊伍的年獸！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_1000_Year_Beast_: 1000 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Year_Beast_Ability_Po: 100 技能點數供您在年獸之爭遊戲模式中升級您隊伍的年獸！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Year_Beast_A: 100 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2400_Year_Beast_Ability_P: 2400 技能點數供您在年獸之爭遊戲模式中升級您隊伍的年獸！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2400_Year_Beast_: 2400 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloody_Ripper: 此組合包內含噬魂鬼「血腥開膛手」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloody_Ripper: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bloody Ripper' set for Lifestealer plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_Fragment: 這東西用途不多，但把它回收掉還是能對地球有不少幫助！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_Fragment: It's not really useful for much, but you can always recycle it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Crucible_Jew: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「坩珠護符之寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與坩珠護符之寶藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Cru: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crucible Jewel. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Resulting items cannot be traded but sets may be gifted once.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Bloody_Ripper: 此組合包內含噬魂鬼「特典 血腥開膛手」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Blood: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Bloody Ripper' set for Lifestealer plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Scorched_Fletc: 此組合包內含克林克茲「特典 焦骨射手」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Scorc: Includes all of the items in the 'Compendium Scorched Fletcher' set for Clinkz, plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DAC_Compendium_2015_Emoti: 藉由 2015 亞洲邀請賽互動手冊來解鎖聊天表情符號。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DAC_Compendium_2: Unlocks emoticons earned via the Dota Asia Championship 2015 Compendium.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_Jade: 使用此物品為您最喜愛的英雄打造一座翠玉英雄雕像！選好英雄的姿勢、寫好提詞就能進行製作；製作完成後進行裝備，雕像就會出先遊戲內己方基地中，讓所有人都能看見。2015年3月2日之前可於 Dota 商城中購買 。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of Jade! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
	Available on the Dota Store until March 2, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche: 有人說，這件衣服最初是一位古代女王大婚時所穿的喜袍，其他人則說這曾是冰霜食人魔的戰鬥斗篷。事實上，這塊帶有魔力的布料就如雪崩一樣富塑性，形態萬千。最新的形態，吸引了一頭孤獨的幼狼成為最忠誠的夥伴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche: Some say the garment began as the wedding gown of an ancient queen.  Others say it was once a battle cloak of a frost ogre. In truth, the enchanted fabric is as malleable as an avalanche, and can mold itself into various forms. This form has attracted a lone wolf pup, who has now become a hardy and loyal companion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche_Bundle: 內含冰晶聖女的奧祕物品「坍雪寒裘」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche_: Contains the 'Frost Avalanche' arcana for Crystal Maiden.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Harmonies_of_New_Bloom_Mu: 由出自社群的作曲家 Pumodi 作曲
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Year_Beast_: 由社群藝術家 Danidem 創作，受遊戲官方正式採用，並於 2015 年立春祭宣傳片「Coming of the Year Beast / 年獸來襲」出現。此組合包內含以下載入畫面：「年獸之落」、「年獸之戰」及「年獸之兆」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Ye: Created by community artist Danidem and featured in the \"Coming of the Year Beast\" trailer for the 2015 New Bloom Festival, this bundle contains the following loading screens: Fall of the Year Beast, Battle of the Year Beast, Terror of the Year Beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Sol_Guard: 此組合包內含天怒法師「天陽衛兵」套裝的全部物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_S: Contains all of the items in the 'Regalia of the Sol Guard' set for Skywrath Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Store_Scorched_Armor_of_t: 此組合包內含克林克茲「焦骨射手」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Store_Scorched_A: Includes all of the items in the 'Scorched Fletcher' set for Clinkz, plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Offerings: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2CL_Season_5: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽第 5 季開打！歐洲以及中國地區的頂尖戰隊們將為本屆 D2CL 的冠軍頭銜而戰。本屆的決賽將藉由線下賽的方式舉行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2CL_Season_5: Dota 2 Champions League is back with Season V! Best teams from Europe and China will clash for the title of a new D2CL champion. Tons of thrilling online matches, epic LAN final and sea of emotions  this is D2CL!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessing_of_the_Crested_U: 此組合包內含復仇之魂「冠羽本影祝福」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessing_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Blessing of the Crested Umbra' set for Vengeful Spirit plus a loading screen and icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crucible_of_Light: 此組合包內含光之守衛「歷練之光」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crucible_of_Ligh: Includes all of the items in the 'Crucible of Light' set for Keeper of the Light plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2CL_Season_5_Bundle: Dota 2 冠軍聯賽第 5 季開打！歐洲以及中國地區的頂尖戰隊們將為本屆 D2CL 的冠軍頭銜而戰。此組合包內含 D2CL 第 5 季門票、D2CL 第 5 季 HUD 造型、D2CL 第 5 季載入畫面，以及天怒法師「天陽衛兵」套裝。斯拉克「鳥翼之刃」武器。此組合包收益中的 25% 將捐助至 D2CL 第 5 季！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2CL_Season_5_Bu: Dota 2 Champions League is back with Season V! Best teams from Europe and China will clash for the title of a new D2CL champion. The bundle contains the D2CL Season 5 ticket, the Regalia of the Sol Guard set, the Slark Crawblade weapon, and D2CL Season 5 HUD and Loading screen. 25% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards D2CL Season 5!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riders_Eclipse: 此組合包內含露娜「月蝕騎士」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riders_Eclipse: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Rider's Eclipse' set for Luna plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Rams_Rene: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含全套物品。此寶藏內的物品除了稀有物品之外均無法在 2015 年 3 月 20 日前進行交易以及列入 Steam 社群市集販售。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until May 20, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Agon_League: Agon 所舉辦的首屆 Dota 2 業餘聯賽將有 10 支隊伍進行為期 6 週的對戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Agon_League: Agon's first amateur Dota 2 League consisting of 10 teams who will battle each other over the course of 6 weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Reverant_Dota_2_Cup_#1: 首屆的 Reverant Dota 2 盃將有著 48 支來自俄羅斯西伯利亞的隊伍參與，爭取為數 $2000 的總獎金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternally_Exiled_Cup_Seas: 16 支業餘隊伍將在此爭取奪冠大獎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternally_Exiled: 16+ amateur teams will compete for the grand prize of 1600 rubles.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gladius_TGD2: There are many players, but only one Champion of TGD2!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Hyeonmu_Tu: Upgrades for this evolving courier can be earned by playing at PC Bangs. Level up through different accessories, colors, particles, armor and banners until you achieve the final Level 17 gold version!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Butterfly_Cup_Ve_Dota2: Ve_Dota2 在此呈獻蝴蝶盃！16 支拉丁美洲隊伍將在此爭取超過 $300 的獎金以及王者榮耀。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_3: 我們很高興向您宣佈英雄盃的第三屆開打。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_3: We are pleased to announce the start of the Cup of Heroes Season 3 tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Divine_Sorrow: 有著面罩、兜帽，以及頭冠這三種樣式可切換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Divi: Has the Mask, Hood and Crown styles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RoXe_Tournament_Season_2: 來自歐洲和俄羅斯的 16 支隊伍將在此爭取為數 50$ 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RoXe_Tournament_: 16 teams from Europe and Russia fight for a 50$ prize pool
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Emoticon_Pac: 使用此表情符號包解鎖 5 款表情符號。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Emo: Unlocks 5 emoticons for The Summit Emoticon Pack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Ticket: 本屆的 The Summit 3 承襲著前幾屆的精神將和來自世界各地的頂尖隊伍在 Byond the Summit 位於洛杉磯的工作室繼續一同帶來悠閒且淵博的觀賽體驗。此組合包內含食人魔法師的「南轅北轍」套裝、召喚師的「聖愁面罩」飾品、The Summit 3 HUD 造型，以及 The Summit 3 表情符號包和滑鼠游標包。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Tic:
Continuing the the spirit of previous iterations, The Summit 3 will be another laid-back, intimate experience with the best teams from across the globe duking it out in the Beyond the Summit studio in Los Angeles.
	Includes the Antipodean Allies set, the Mask of Divine Sorrow, The Summit 3 HUD, and The Summit 3 Emoticon and Cursor Packs.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Helmet_and_hood_of_th: Helmet and hood of the Antipodeans

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Razer_Think_Fast_Season_2: 12 支獲邀隊伍以及 4 支合格戰隊將在西伯利亞首屆此等規模的線下賽中隊抗。此組合包內含巫醫的「踉蹌神棍」套裝及載入畫面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Razer_Think_Fast: 12 invited and 4 qualified teams compete at the first LAN event of this size in Serbia. Includes The Shambling Trickster set and Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_Wolf_Training: 此寶石將會追蹤您拆除了多少個敵方守衛。當拆除量達到一定數目後，極光幼狼將會解鎖新的替換樣式和動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_Wolf_Tra: This gem tracks when enemy Wards are successfully killed.  When enough Wards are killed, Aurora, the Wolf Pup will unlock new skins and behaviors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SEL_March_2015: 南美洲地區最具天資者將在此藉由經典內戰規則一較高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SEL_March_2015: The most talented players in South America compete in the classic inhouse league format.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Forgotten_My: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「失落神話寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與失落神話寶藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_For: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Forgotten Myth. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Forgotten Myth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Rams_Renewal: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「新春飛揚寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與新春飛揚寶藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Ram: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Ram's Renewal. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Ram's Renewal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Spring_Bloss: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「開春之花寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與開春之花寶藏相同的交易限制。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Palladium_Amateur_Battle: 半職業及業餘隊伍將在此一同爭取為數 $60 的總獎金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Palladium_Amateu: Semi-pro and amateur teams gather to play for the prize pool of $60.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Summits_R: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏內含的所有物品和稀有物品均會在 2015 年 6 月 20 日後變得可用於交易和列入社群市集。本商品收益中的 10% 將捐助至 The Summit 3 第 3 季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. All treasures and items within, including rare items, will be tradable and marketable after June 20, 2015. 10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards The Summit Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Writhing_Executioner: 此組合包內含夜神刺客「蜿蜒劊子手」套裝的全部物品及載入畫面。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tools_of_the_Final_Ut: Tools of the Final Utterance Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotA2_UNITRY_Tournament_M: 4 支泰國隊伍將在此藉由雙淘汰制的三戰兩勝格式進行比試來爭取冠軍寶座。本賽事 UNITRY 贊助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotA2_UNITRY_Tou: The top 4 Thai teams compete for the champion's seat in a double elimination Bo 3 format. (Sponsored by UNITRY)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Room_Dota_2_Commun: 世界各地的 Dota 2 社群將於 2015 年春季面對面。每個社群都將選派出一支代表隊伍。贏家將為隊上成員還有隊伍的所屬社群贏得大獎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Room_Dota: This Spring 2015, Dota 2 communities around the world will be facing off. Each community will have a team that takes part in the Dota 2 Communities Battle 2015. The winning team and also winning community will share a big bounty of loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato_Dota_League: 拉美地區的頂尖隊伍將在此比試，爭取榮譽和榮耀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato_Dota_Lea: The best team in Latin America compete for honor and glory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_I_Dota2_Canarias_Tourname: 經過數個月的等待後 GofioDT2 舉辦的聯賽終於成真！此賽事將有 8 支隨機組成的隊伍，每隊都有 4 位菜鳥玩家隨著比賽全心全意向做為教練的老鳥的學習。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_I_Dota2_Canarias: At last, the tournament that took months of waiting, GofioDT2 tournament! Eight teams chosen at random. In each of these, four noobs learn all they can from their teacher and present battle with dignity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_7_Qualifi: 前往馬來西亞的起點將從 MPGL 第 7 賽季東南亞資格賽開始。東南亞中的各支隊伍將在此爭取 11 個屆時於 5 月前往在馬來西亞舉辦的 MPGL 第 7 賽季東南亞決賽，並在那爭奪 50,000USD 獎金的名額。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_: Road to Malaysia start with MPGL SEA Season 7 Qualifiers. All teams in South East Asia will fight for the 11 slots in MPGL SEA Season 7 Final in Malaysia on May for 50,000USD
Tokens.DOTA_Item_DotA2_UNITRY_Tournament_March_: DotA2 UNITRY 聯賽 2015 三月場

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 華碩 ROG 夢幻聯賽第 3 季。Dota 2 的世界強隊將藉此賽事每週進行對戰以前往將於夏天舉辦的 2015 DreamHack Summer。基礎總獎金為數 $100,000。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 3. The World's best Dota 2 teams fighitning every week to reach the playoffs at DreamHack Summer 2015. Base prize pool $100,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Summits_Roos: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「峰頂之棧寶藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與峰頂之棧寶藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Sum: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Summit's Roost. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Summit's Roost.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyclopean_Marauder: 此組合包內含斯溫「獨目掠奪者」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: Dota 2 加拿大盃回歸！這次將匯聚北美及南美的各支勁旅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Dota 2 Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: Dota 2 加拿大盃回來囉！這次將匯聚北美及南美的各支勁旅。此組合包內含斯溫的「獨目掠奪者」套裝。本商品的 12.5% 收益將貢獻至 Dota 2 加拿大盃第 5 季！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu:
The Dota 2 Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. 
	
	Includes the Cyclopean Marauder Set for Sven.
	
	12.5% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards Dota 2 Canada Cup Season 5!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ravening_Wings: 此組合包內含魅影刺客「貪掠之翼」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面和自訂技能圖示。本商品收益中的 10% 將捐助至 SLTV Star Series 第 12 賽季的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ravening_Wings: Contains all of the items in the 'Ravening Wings' set for Phantom Assassin plus loading screen and ability icons. 10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the SLTV Star Series Season 12 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Bull_Battle_Grounds_B:
二十支隊伍爭取代表當地出戰淘汰賽的機會。淘汰賽的前二強將於 2015 年 5 月 10 日前往美國加州的舊金山，在那進行全程實況轉播的總決賽。快來看各支隊伍為爭取為數超過 75,000$ 的總獎金以及成為第一屆紅牛戰場冠軍而戰吧。此組合包內含沙王的「禁域沙皇」套裝，和克林克茲的「墮落隱俠」套裝。

本商品的 20% 收益將貢獻至紅牛戰場的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Bull_Battle_:
Twenty teams battle for the right to represent their region at the playoffs. The top two playoffs teams will play at a live Grand Finals in San Francisco, CA on May 10, 2015. Watch as teams fight for their share of $75,000+ and to be the first ever Red Bull Battle Grounds: Dota 2 champions.
	
	Bundle contains the Majesty of the Forbidden Sands set for Sand King, as well as the Fallen Cloak set for Clinkz.
	
	20% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the Red Bull Battle Grounds Prize Pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Grey_Gallant: 此組合包內含全能騎士「灰鎧豪俠」套裝的全部物品。本商品收益中的 10% 將捐助至 SLTV Star Series 第 12 賽季的總獎金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Grey_Gallant:
Contains all of the items in the 'Grey Gallant' set for Omniknight.
	
	10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the SLTV Star Series Season 12 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tine_of_the_Behemoth: 內含的自訂技能圖示將在裝備後生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tine_of_the_Behe: Includes custom ability icons when equiped.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tine_of_the_Behemoth_Bund: 此組合包內含撼地者「巨獸之牙」套裝的全部物品，以及載入畫面、自訂技能圖示，和滑鼠游標包。本商品收益中的 10% 將捐助至 SLTV Star Series 第 12 賽季的總獎金！!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tine_of_the_Behe:
Contains all of the items in the 'Tine of the Behemoth Bundle' set for Earthshaker, plus loading screen, ability icons and cursor pack.
	
	10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the SLTV Star Series Season 12 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_i_League_Season_3: IMBATV 為您呈獻一個能讓業餘隊伍與來自世界各地的頂尖強隊較量來證明自己的賽事。最為出類拔萃的業餘隊伍將與其它前 8 強隊伍在上海和中國舉辦的決賽對決。此組合包內含梅杜莎的「視者之心」飾品套裝，以及供於觀看 i league 聯賽第 3 季全部比賽的門票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_i_League_Season_: IMBATV present the championship, where every amateur team is able to prove themselves and compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from amateur tournament will face the top professional teams with the top 8 teams competing in the finals in Shanghai, China. This bundle grants access to the Eye of the Beholder Medusa Item Set and access to view games from i league Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_i_League_Season_3_Ticket: IMBATV 為您呈獻一個能讓業餘隊伍與來自世界各地的頂尖強隊較量來證明自己的賽事。最為出類拔萃的業餘隊伍將與其它前 8 強隊伍在上海和中國舉辦的決賽對決。此門票僅用於觀賞 i league 聯賽第 3 季的全部比賽。

joinDOTA MLG 職業聯賽第 2 季。本商品收益中的 20% 將貢獻至本賽事的總獎金，5% 將貢獻至即將於 2015 年尾舉辦的世界決賽總獎金。此組合包內含巫醫的「惡煞老千」飾品套裝及其載入畫面、「冷顏魔幽」自訂信使，以及用於觀賞 joinDOTA MLG 職業聯賽第 2 季的門票。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_The_Inter:
使用此物品為您最喜愛的英雄打造一座國際錦標賽英雄雕像！選好英雄的姿勢、寫好提詞就能進行製作；製作完成後進行裝備，雕像就會出先遊戲內己方基地中，讓所有人都能看見。

此為 2015 國際錦標賽互動手冊購買者的獨有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of The International! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
	
	Available exclusively to purchasers of The International Compendium 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Reforger: 此物品將能讓您重製一尊英雄雕像，包括其使用的英雄是誰、定為姿勢的動畫畫格，以及題詞的內容。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Reforger: Allows you to reforge a Heroic Effigy, making it possible to edit the effigy's hero, animation frame, and inscription. To use, right-click on the Heroic Effigy you would like to edit and select Reforge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Effigy_Block_of_Th:
使用此物品為您最喜愛的英雄打造一座國際錦標賽黃金英雄雕像！選好英雄的姿勢、寫好提詞就能進行製作；製作完成後進行裝備，雕像就會出先遊戲內己方基地中，讓所有人都能看見。

此為 2015 國際錦標賽互動手冊購買者的獨有物品。

Available exclusively to purchasers of The International Compendium 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Crucible_Jew: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「坩珠護符之寶藏 II」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得之物將無法交易，但套裝將有一次贈與他人的機會。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Cru: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crucible Jewel II. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Resulting items cannot be traded but sets may be gifted once.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_of_the_Cruci: Treasure of the Crucible Jewel II
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Grimsneer: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。每一個販售物品的 15% 收入都將貢獻至 joinDOTA MLG Pro League Season 2。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. 15% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards joinDOTA MLG Pro League Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_VirtusPro: 購買這面隊旗來展現您對此隊伍的支持！將它裝備在玩家裝備的「粉絲欄位」中就能向其他觀眾表明您支持的是哪一隊，還能夠升級旗幟來展現您的熱情！除此之外，裝備旗幟可以讓您在觀看您所支持的隊伍在客戶端內實況比賽時能夠獲得掉落物品。旗幟能夠與其他旗幟合成來升級您的隊伍旗幟等級，您的隊伍旗幟等級將會提升在觀賞職業聯賽中所支持隊伍的粉絲人數總值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Vir: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crafter's Relic. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Crafter's Relic.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Sculptors_Pi: 在全選遊戲模式的開頭使用本護符來預測自己將會贏得該場遊戲的勝利。成功預測 3 次勝利即可獲得「雕刻家之柱藏」。預測錯誤先達 2 次則將獲得一個用於物品回收的「護符碎片」。藉由本護符獲得的物品將有著與雕刻家之柱藏相同的交易限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Scu: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Sculptor's Pillar. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Sculptor's Pillar.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lockless_Luckvase: 此寶藏已經解鎖，無需封印或鑰匙即可開啟。此寶藏的內容物與 2015 無鎖幸運瓶相同，同時還有一個簽名神符和一件巧匠鑿刀。
